title: Customizing AI for your needs with Azure OpenAI Service fine-tuning
description: Dive deep into the world of fine-tuning with Azure OpenAI Service. We will guide you through the techniques and best practices that enable you to tailor AI models to meet your specific needs, optimizing performance for your unique applications. This session is perfect for developers and data scientists seeking to maximize AI effectiveness.

title: Making AI agents work for you with Azure OpenAI Service and Azure AI
description: Explore how Azure AI seamlessly integrates with agents to create intelligent, responsive systems. Marco and Mads will walk you through the latest advancements, offering practical examples and best practices for implementing AI-powered assistants in various business contexts.
speakerNames: Mads Bolaris, Marco Casalaina, Lambert Ninteman

title: Azure AI Search for RAG: retrieval for better results, scale & answers
description: Azure AI Search is a full-featured knowledge retrieval system, built to power enterprise-ready RAG applications. Join this session to learn about our latest announcements and our continuous momentum for delivering trend-setting search, superior retrieval quality and enabling RAG at scale.

title: Unveiling new real time speech and video translation innovations
description: Communicating effectively with people in different languages is the new necessity of our age. Enterprises are looking to eliminate conversation barriers with their customers and internal stakeholders. Join us as we unveil new real-time speech translation and video translation capabilities in Azure AI Speech. These along with custom avatars and voices are elevating brand value for customers across the globe.

title: Build multimodal apps with Azure AI
description: Join us as we unveil Project Bumblebee, our latest innovation for handling diverse data types. Discover how this new Azure AI service streamlines data processing workflows with efficient setup, grounding mechanisms, and confidence scores. We'll unveil its multimodal capabilities, supporting speech, documents, images, video, and audio. Project Bumblebee extracts information from any unstructured data into customizable output formats using LLMs and SLMs.
speakerNames: Marco Casalaina, Evan Kahan, Vinod Kurpad

title: Mitigate risks in GenAI apps with advanced responsible AI tools
description: New challenges and threats are emerging as AI evolves. Learn how Azure AI’s advanced responsible AI tooling, including Azure AI Content Safety and built-in safety tools in Azure AI Studio like evaluations and monitoring, can help mitigate these risks. This session covers responsible AI tooling announcements from Azure and will equip you with essential strategies and tools for deploying responsible AI applications.
speakerNames: Sarah Bird, Mehrnoosh Sameki, Paul Shealy

title: Tailoring AI: Customize Phi and SLMs for optimal performance
description: Due to their size SLMs are prime candidates to customize for specific tasks. In this session, we will delve into fine-tuning and customizing Phi and Small Language Models (SLMs) to meet specific use cases and enhance performance. Join us to learn how to harness the full potential of Phi and SLMs through fine-tuning and customization, and take your AI projects to the next level.
speakerNames: Martin Cai, Olivia Shone, Adina Trufinescu

title: Coding the future of AI
description: From Visual Studio Code to GitHub, Azure AI is everywhere your developers want to be. Learn how Microsoft's Copilot stack, inclusive of code-first development experiences, is helping customers innovate faster, easier, and more securely.

title: Breaking barriers: EY & Azure AI's journey toward inclusive innovation
description: Microsoft and EY are driving a more inclusive AI industry through groundbreaking collaboration. EY’s Neuro-Diverse Center of Excellence and Microsoft’s Azure AI came together in an iterative co-design process to improve accessibility in Azure AI Studio, driven by a shared inclusive design philosophy. Hear firsthand experiences from developers, and discuss how inclusive innovation can lead to a more equitable AI-driven world, allowing developers of all abilities to thrive in the age of AI.
speakerNames: John Franzen, Ailsa Leen, David Mondello, Heather Tartaglia

title: Lessons from Toyota for building durable multi-agent copilots
description: Discover the power of GenAI in Toyota’s powertrain development. Learn how Toyota improves information collection, enhances decision-making, and boosts productivity for powertrain engineers with a multi-agent system built with Azure AI and Azure Cosmos DB. Join us to get a glimpse into the future of agent technology and data management with Azure, and hear from Toyota first-hand how they are using AI to innovate vehicle design.
speakerNames: Mark Brown, Marco Casalaina, Kohei Tanaka, 健二 大西

title: Exploring cutting-edge advancements in Azure AI model catalog
description: Join us for an in-depth session where we explore the cutting-edge advancements in Azure AI model catalog featuring new model launches like tsuzumi from NTT Data, Bria, Gretel, and more. We'll also delve into new provisioning offers and discuss enterprise-ready promises, including VNet , AAD authentication, model inference API, and more. We'll invite NTT Data to present a demo on tsuzumi and how customers can customize this domain-specific SLM in Azure AI.
speakerNames: Manoj Bableshwar, Sergio Marco del Fresno, Facundo Santiago

title: Accelerate AI to production: GenAIOps with Azure AI
description: Unlock the power of GenAIOps and accelerate your AI apps from development to production with familiar tools. Learn to get started with AI templates, streamline prompt engineering with Prompty, build apps with SDKs like LangChain, and automate deployment using GitHub Actions. Plus, hear from a real customer who successfully implemented GenAIOps with Azure AI. Get ready to scale your AI projects effortlessly!
speakerNames: Callum Anderson, Marlene Mhangami, Trupti Vinayak Parkar, Dan Taylor

title: Train and fine-tune custom LLMs with distributed training in Azure AI
description: Unlock the potential of custom large language models (LLMs) with Azure AI's powerful infrastructure. This session explores Azure Machine Learning and Azure AI infrastructure, including ND H100 and H200 series. Learn how to leverage distributed training to enhance scalability, performance, and efficiency. We'll cover practical techniques for optimizing LLM training workflows, ensuring you can harness the full potential of Azure AI to accelerate your AI projects.
speakerNames: Manash Goswami, John Lee, Ben Levine, Alejandra Rico

title: Beyond chat: Using LLMs for veterinary diagnostics & anomaly detection
description: Explore how Mars R&D revolutionized veterinary diagnostics using Mistral AI models, improving average precision by 38% through machine learning techniques, including labeling and chain-of-thought prompting. Additionally, discover how Methanex leverages TimeGEN-1 on Azure to detect anomalies in its methanol production system, integrating sensor data to prevent catastrophic failures and enabling immediate maintenance action. Learn how foundation models drive innovation across industries.
speakerNames: Sharmila Chockalingam, Julio Figueroa, Michael Fitzke, Raj Madhavan

title: Build secure GenAI apps with Azure AI Studio
description: Join us for a deep dive into Azure AI Studio with a focus on security and IT governance. This session is tailored for IT admins, security pros, and developers committed to shifting left in their security practices. We'll explore enterprise security promises in Azure AI, including capabilities and controls for network security, data encryption, and identity management to ensure your GenAI projects remain secure and compliant throughout the GenAI development lifecycle.
speakerNames: Andy Aviles, Aashish Bhateja, Dennis Eikenboom

title: Tailoring AI to your enterprise: The power of model customization
description: In today’s rapidly evolving AI landscape, using Large Language Models (LLMs) as-is can be limiting. To unlock their full potential, customization is essential. This session explores the importance of model personalization, covering prompt engineering, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and fine-tuning with proprietary data. Learn how tailored AI solutions enhance accuracy, relevance, and efficiency, driving value and keeping your organization at the forefront of AI-driven innovation.
speakerNames: Manoj Bableshwar, Sharmila Chockalingam, Bala  Venkataraman

title: How Docusign innovates intelligent agreement management with Azure
description: Explore how Docusign is transforming business with its new SaaS Intelligent Agreement Management platform. Docusign will show how they architected their platform with Azure AI, data, and app services to automate agreement workflows and surface insights from business data. Learn how Docusign is driving innovation and achieving global scale with Azure. This is a must-attend session for enterprise architects looking to learn from real-world examples how to build AI-powered SaaS apps in the cloud.
speakerNames: Deborah Chen, Kunal Mukerjee, Olivia Shone

title: More than a storefront, unlocking value through the marketplace
description: With a comprehensive set of solutions pre-vetted and ready to deploy, the Microsoft commercial marketplace makes it easier for organizations to discover, try, purchase, and manage cloud and AI solutions so they can spend smarter and move faster. Learn what new capabilities are available in the marketplace to help buy vendor solutions with confidence and drive AI innovation.
speakerNames: Anthony Joseph, Will Kearl, Darren Sharpe, Jatin Suri, Diego Tamburini

title: Productive AI with Semantic Kernel
description: In this session, learn how Semantic Kernel enhances business processes with AI. Discover the latest innovations that empower employees and customers to complete tasks efficiently and accurately. The product team will showcase demos of their new framework in action, explaining how you can implement this technology in your apps, and you will hear from customers who are leveraging AI today to gain a competitive edge.

title: Unlocking AI: Ontada McKesson's fight against cancer with Azure AI
description: Join us for an engaging session where we explore McKesson's transformative journey in leveraging Azure AI to revolutionize the healthcare industry. As a Fortune 10 company, McKesson plays a pivotal role in the healthcare economy. This session will showcase how Ontada, an entity within McKesson to digitize patient data across oncology centers across the US and leveraged generative AI to create new revenue streams.
speakerNames: Jay Hugalavalli, Amit Mukherjee, Wanmei Ou

title: Data-driven decision-making with a multi-agent solution
description: Agents come in all shapes and sizes. This session will showcase a multi-agent solution built using Azure OpenAI Service by Capgemini for Unilever Food Solutions to boost sales through more effective interactions. The GenAI solution, developed with Azure AI Studio, integrates seamlessly with a communications platforms for personalized responses and Microsoft Teams integration for enhanced collaboration. Join this technical session to learn how to build an innovative multi-agent system.
speakerNames: Henk Boelman, Douwe van de Ruit, Sjoukje Zaal

title: Enable trustworthy AI with Microsoft
description: Join us for an enlightening session on building and using trustworthy AI applications that prioritize safety, security, and privacy. Discover best practices for AI security and mitigating emerging threats, learn how to develop applications with built-in safety and guardrails, manage compliance, and safeguard sensitive data.

title: Commercial optimization with Azure OpenAI
description: Learn how to leverage Azure OpenAI for commercial optimization. Chris and Sethu will explore strategies for cost-saving, driving customer engagement, and maximizing ROI through AI. This session will provide actionable insights for business leaders looking to capitalize on AI’s potential in commercial operations.
speakerNames: Chris Hoder, Jay Hugalavalli, Wanmei Ou, Sethu Raman

title: Innovate with AI: govern, manage and secure your AI platform
description: Are you ready to adopt AI? This session will explore the Azure Essentials AI adoption guidance and provide actionable steps and best practices. You'll learn how to establish a solid foundation that aligns with your business goals, incorporate robust governance to design reliable and secure workloads, and optimize your AI deployments to maintain ongoing performance and efficiency.
speakerNames: Ben Brauer, Praveen Gururaja, Rajani Janaki Ram, Stephen Sumner

title: Helping customers with the essentials of AI adoption
description: Are your customers ready to embrace Azure AI? Over 60,000 customers are building with Azure AI today. Microsoft has created a framework that you can use to help customers be ready to innovate with AI. Dive into the details of this framework and explore essentials Microsoft offers to adopt AI at scale, including Trustworthy AI and powerful developer tools, to ensure your success in this AI-driven world.

title: Best practices for building and monetizing your AI applications
description: The convergence of Generative and Analytical AI is revolutionizing the software industry, presenting unprecedented opportunities for innovation. This session offers best practices and guidance to maximize your AI product’s success: product strategy, considerations for your technology choices, GTM, and pricing. Get an actionable plan to build and monetize your AI software.
speakerNames: Nanditha Ram, Alois Reitbauer, Dave Uppal

title: Unlock AI: Assess your app and data estate for AI-powered innovation
description: In today's rapidly evolving technological landscape, the ability to harness the power of Artificial Intelligence (AI) is becoming a critical differentiator for businesses. However, the journey to AI innovation begins with a thorough assessment of your app and data estate. This session will provide you with the insights, best practices and tools necessary to wholistically assess your app and data estate to streamline and accelerate AI innovation through modernization.

title: Power AI transformation: Scaling app modernization for business growth
description: Delivering successful application modernization projects is a multi-step process which can be sometime challenging but doesn't have to be. With the right methodology, partnership, and tools modernizing applications can be a lot easier. Explore best practices, tools, strategies, approaches, and patterns to assess, plan, and modernize your app and data estate and innovate with AI.
speakerNames: Ayobami Ayodeji, Aarthi Murugan, Ikenna Okeke

title: Getting the most out of Azure DevOps and GitHub
description: Learn about all the new (and planned) ways we are making it easier to acquire and use Azure DevOps and GitHub together. Hear about the new features we are launching within GHE, with updates to Issues and data residency. Use GitHub repositories, Copilot, Codespaces, and Advanced Security to improve your developer’s productivity while leveraging your existing assets in Azure Boards, Pipelines, and Test Plans to keep your enterprise development teams moving forward.

title: Accelerate and secure development with DevSecOps and AI
description: Discover how to create a swift and secure development workflow from code to cloud without sacrificing velocity. Prevent vulnerabilities as quickly as 28 minutes and reduce your organization's security debt with developer-focused tools like AI-powered code scanning secret scanning and dependency scanning. Bolster your cloud defenses in runtime with threat protection that uses code-to-cloud context for end-to-end monitoring and protection.
speakerNames: Brendan Burns, Lara Goldstein, Brittany O'Shea, Johnson Shi

title: Discover GitHub Copilot's untapped potential in Visual Studio
description: Explore how GitHub Copilot, integrated into Visual Studio 2022, and the latest features of .NET 9 are revolutionizing development. Discover smarter, more secure AI-driven tools like breakpoint expressions and refined code completions that streamline coding, enhance comprehension, and boost collaboration—all within the powerful Visual Studio IDE.
speakerNames: Dalia Abo Sheasha, Scott Hanselman, Jessie Houghton

title: Building AI apps: Technical use cases and patterns
description: Explore the essential technical patterns and best practices for developing AI-powered applications. Attendees will gain insights into the latest tools and frameworks available on Azure, and learn how to implement these patterns to solve real-world problems. Through a series of case studies, we will demonstrate how AI can be leveraged to enhance user experiences, optimize operations, and drive innovation across various industries.

title: Building serverless intelligent apps with Flex Consumption and GPUs
description: Discover how to build and deploy high-performance intelligent applications. Leverage the Azure Functions Flex Consumption plan for event-driven apps with instant burst scale, ideal for high throughput scenarios like data ingestion and document intelligence. Learn to use Azure Container Apps for cost-efficient, compute-intensive AI workloads with serverless scalability. Join us for demos and insights to ensure your serverless apps are enterprise-ready for production.

title: Streamline AI App development with Azure App Platform
description: Discover how to efficiently deploy scalable applications by leveraging the Azure Application Platform, using the best tool for the job. This demo-heavy session will provide insights on integrating AI into your applications with Azure’s robust developer tools and services like Azure App Service, Azure Kubernetes Service, Azure Functions, and Azure Container Apps. Learn AI app development best practices to optimize resource utilization, reduce costs, and enhance performance and security.
speakerNames: Scott Hunter, Abdul Rehman, Naga Surendran

title: Modernize and scale enterprise Java applications on Azure
description: Unlock the full potential of your enterprise Java apps on Azure and accelerate innovation with comprehensive solutions for Spring, Tomcat, JBoss EAP, WebSphere, and Oracle WebLogic apps. General Motors will explain how they modernized their Java app workloads on Pivotal Cloud Foundry to Azure Container Apps. We will also showcase how you can bring together app, data, and AI for building intelligent solutions for even greater impactful business outcomes.
speakerNames: Denver Brittain, Sonja Gu, Asir Selvasingh

title: Beyond VDI: Get secure cloud dev environments with Microsoft Dev Box
description: Learn how Dev Box, Visual Studio, and Azure Deployment Environments empower development teams with secure, ready-to-code, workstations and self-service app infrastructure. This session covers tool flexibility, self-service, and best practices. Hear how Microsoft deployed Dev Box to over 30K developers, what they learned, and how it's influenced the product development.
speakerNames: Anthony Cangialosi, Dhruv Chand, Varsha Iyer, Denizhan Yigitbas

title: Modernizing applications with .NET, AI, and Cloud-Native practices
description: Learn how to modernize .NET applications using AI, cloud-native practices, and the .NET Aspire framework. Discover how to enhance resilience, scalability, and observability with Azure AI services and .NET’s built-in features. See how .NET Aspire simplifies cloud-native development and deployment with features like service discovery and managed identity.
speakerNames: Tulika Chaudharie, Jeff Fritz, Michael Jones, Luis Quintanilla, Cory Waddingham

title: Modernize enterprise integration with Azure Integration Services
description: Modernizing enterprise integration is key to staying competitive. Join us to explore Azure Integration Services and its potential. Discover how Azure Logic Apps can enhance processes with AI, enabling automation and smarter decision-making. Learn about hybrid deployment models to connect on-premises systems with cloud. Finally, explore transitioning from BizTalk to Azure Integration Services, leveraging your existing investments while adopting a cloud-native approach.

title: Platform engineering: creating scalable and resilient systems
description: Organizations have diverse application estates that lead to operations teams managing variable application stacks and complex integrations that are error-prone and difficult to re-use. This session covers platform engineering best practices so you can provide development teams with a consistent and automated experience that empowers them to ship new functionality quickly, securely, and use cloud services as efficiently as possible.

title: GitHub Copilot and VS Code: Your AI thought partner
description: GitHub Copilot started as an AI-powered autocomplete tool. Since its release, Copilot's capabilities have grown and made their way into the entire software development lifecycle. Learn how GitHub Copilot is becoming an AI-powered thought partner able to help you not just with code, but with ideas, prototypes, delivery process, and even security. Plus, get a sneak peek into what's next for AI developer tooling.

title: Scale, secure, and optimize Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)​
description: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and Azure provide an ideal platform for modernizing your applications to take advantage of modern architectures and capabilities. This session will show you how to modernize and optimize your apps using AKS, enhancing scalability, reliability, and security. Learn best practices, see real-world examples, and get hands-on demonstrations to drive innovation and efficiency in your organization.
speakerNames: Brendan Burns, Patrick Healy, Jorge Palma

title: Choose the right AI app use case for your business
description: In today’s rapidly evolving digital landscape, selecting the right intelligent app use case can significantly impact your business’s efficiency, innovation, and competitive edge. This session will guide you through the process of identifying and implementing AI-driven applications tailored to your unique business needs. We will explore various industry-specific use cases, from enhancing customer experiences, supporting employees, and accelerating innovation through real-world customer stories.

title: Build and modernize AI apps on Azure and delight your customers
description: Explore the market potential of AI app development and learn how to leverage Microsoft’s unique value and comprehensive technologies to build and modernize AI apps. Discover popular use cases, best practices for customer conversations, and tailored offers and resources for your success.

title: Maximize developer efficiency with GitHub Copilot for partner success
description: Discover how Microsoft’s developer productivity solutions boost efficiency and innovation. Learn to harness GitHub Copilot alongside Microsoft's comprehensive toolset to tap into new market opportunities. We’ll cover best practices, CSP partner benefits, and leveraging Azure Innovate offerings for secure, intelligent applications and improved customer engagement.
speakerNames: Andrew Flick, Justine Modot, Wenqi Ou

title: Elevating frontline operations with generative AI and Dynamics 365
description: Join us to explore how Dynamics 365 Field Service is driving significant transformation with the frontline workforce. Learn how generative AI can help managers, dispatchers and technicians improve workflows, maximize schedules, boost operational efficiency and accelerate decision-making. Gain insights from customer success and learn from their experiences.
speakerNames: Ronit Bohrer Hillel, Hector Garcia Tellado

title: Unleashing new AI innovations for customer service in Dynamics 365
description: Discover how generative AI is unlocking opportunities to redefine customer service. Join us to explore how new advancements in Dynamics 365 Customer Service and Dynamics 365 Contact Center help transform your customer experience and enhance operational efficiency. Learn about the next wave of AI innovations and hear how Microsoft’s service and support organization is using these innovations to improve productivity and drive measurable business value. Don’t miss this chance to see what’s new in service
speakerNames: Daniel Pickworth, Sundar Raghavan, Edgar Wilson II

title: See what’s new with Microsoft 365 Copilot role-based agents
description: Discover how Microsoft 365 Copilot agents can  empower sales, service, and finance teams with purpose-built Copilot agents. This session explores how role-specific insight and workflows powered by Copilot agents can have impact on business functions.  You’ll learn about the latest product innovations, see how providers are enriching customer connections, and gain practical guidance from other real-world examples on driving business success with these Copilot agents.

title: Reinvent employee helpdesk experiences with generative AI
description: Empower your internally focused service teams with a robust set of capabilities that deliver speed, automation and operational efficiencies. Leverage solutions based on Microsoft Power Platform, Dynamics 365 Customer Service and Contact Center to reimagine the way you care for your employees, using conversational self-service, omnichannel engagement and advanced case management. Don't miss this opportunity to explore the latest products and technologies from Microsoft to modernize your ITSM and other internal contact center scenarios!

title: Dynamics 365 Sales: Latest features and customer success
description: Dive into the latest trends and new innovations in Dynamics 365 Sales. Discover how AI can boost seller efficiency and help drive impactful results. Learn from EY and Cooper Surgical's success with Dynamics 365 Sales and Copilot. Gain insights on implementation strategies, adoption best practices, and real-world use cases to transform your sales organization.
speakerNames: kareem@Kareem.com Amin, Dan Grapengiesser, Keith Mescha, Jayme Mesecher, James Nakashima, Edgar Wilson II

title: What's new with Copilot Studio and agents
description: Over the past 6 months, Copilot Studio has rapidly grown. Join us to hear the latest about how Copilot Studio is enabling organizations to build Agents and realize value from M365 Copilot. We'll highlight major recent improvements and discuss what comes next.
speakerNames: Omar Aftab, Giovanni Della-Libera, Ray Smith

title: Better together: Copilot Studio and Azure AI
description: Learn how custom copilots can empower your business processes with AI. Copilot Studio and Azure AI work together to enable you to make everything from the simplest to most complex custom Copilot using the tools you are most familiar with. Hear how Microsoft is improving both products to make it easier to build with both.
speakerNames: Mads Bolaris, Giovanni Della-Libera, Bobby Van Groningen

title: Developers guide to building your own agents
description: Deep dive into the new agent development tools and learn how everyone from internal IT to ISV’s can take advantage of new SDK’s and tools to build your own agents, publish to your own environment or use Copilot agents to enhance Microsoft 365 Copilot. Learn how to leverage the Microsoft graph and M365 to take your agents even further while keeping the organization secure.
speakerNames: Matthew Barbour, Sébastien Levert, Jeremy Thake

title: Build Autonomous agents and personal automations
description: Agents come in all shapes and sizes. In this session learn how Copilot agents will help end users to automate daily tasks directly within Microsoft 365 Copilot, and how those automations can be expanded and improved via Microsoft Copilot Studio.

title: Extending M365 Copilot with Copilot agents: Best practices
description: Learn how organizations are using Copilot Studio to extend M365 Copilot. In this session, we will cover top Copilot agents you should build and deploy org-wide, best practices for enabling anyone to build Copilot Agents with the Copilot Studio agent builder, and rules to live by for IT governance and management.

title: The Future of Power Platform: Intelligent Apps
description: Discover the future of business apps -- what they can do, how they're built, and how they're governed. We'll dive into the roadmap for Power Apps, Power Pages, and Managed Environments focusing on how Copilot is driving rapid evolution, all in this session packed with demos and customer success stories.

title: Build Intelligent Applications with AI and Power Apps
description: Learn all about building, running, and managing intelligent apps! In this session, we will introduce a business problem and, using the new AI-powered designer, build a series of apps infused with AI to solve the problem. We'll explore how these intelligent apps enhance productivity and satisfaction at work with in-app AI assistance. And show you how you can monitor and govern them at scale. Join us to learn how you can get the most out of the apps of the future today!
speakerNames: Evan Lew, Anthony Uitz, Leon Welicki

title: Unlock Productivity with AI Assistance in Power Apps
description: Discover how intelligent apps with personalized experiences, intelligent assistance, and autonomous workflows help get business done faster, smarter, and with less effort. Explore how Copilot dynamically tailors user experiences based on individual needs, offers contextual assistance for tasks like filling forms, drafting text, filtering data, answering questions and others, so that people can focus on more energizing parts of their jobs.

title: Deep Dive: Create, monitor and optimize enterprise apps with Power Apps
description: Learn how Power Apps revolutionizes the development landscape with a suite of advanced features to build, deploy, monitor and optimize enterprise-grade intelligent applications. Explore the innovative new maker experiences designed to facilitate the development of applications, incorporating sophisticated AI capabilities. Get familiar with how Power Apps continuously monitors and provides intelligent recommendations to drive improvement in the solutions they build and maintain.

title: Revolutionize the way you work with Power Automate and AI
description: Join us for a glimpse into the future of automation! This session offers an exclusive look at how AI is transforming Power Automate. The product team will share a high-level roadmap, and demo new AI features showcasing real-world applications. Whether you’re an automation expert or just beginning, you’ll gain practical knowledge to leverage these powerful tools in your projects. Stay ahead of the curve and elevate your workflows with AI—don’t miss out!
speakerNames: Joe Fernandez, Jonathan Kendall, Sangya Singh

title: Automate e-mail, doc, and image processing with GPT in Power Automate
description: Power Platform's prompt builder has been enhanced to handle multi-modal content, now supporting both documents and images. When integrated with the structured outputs feature in a Power Automate flow, these capabilities allow you to automate the processing of incoming emails, documents, and images, leading to significant improvements in efficiency and productivity.
speakerNames: Gwenael Bego, Jonathan Kendall, Maria Remolina Gutierrez

title: Unlock innovation with practical strategies in Power Automate
description: Are you using the products you have to their maximum potential? Get the most from your investments by discovering practical strategies to responsibly roll out innovation across your organization. Discover how to encourage open communication, centralize workspaces, and promote cross-functional collaboration to make the complex simple and drive continuous improvement.

title: Enterprise Scale: Administer and Govern Power Pages websites with Ease
description: Learn how to govern Power Pages websites with ease using the Administration and Governance Capabilities offered in the platform.
speakerNames: Rahul Dey, LaTresha Howland, Dileep Singh

title: Build Next-Generation Intelligent Portals with AI and Power Pages
description: Learn how Power Pages can help accelerate building Web Applications connected to your line of business systems using Copilot driven experiences.
speakerNames: Rahul Dey, Justin Graham, LaTresha Howland

title: Enterprise Scale: The Future of Power Platform Governance + Security
description: The Power Platform provides control, visibility, and efficiency for your low-code solutions across Power Apps, Power Automate, Power Pages, Dataverse, and Microsoft Copilot Studio. Learn about the latest innovations to govern, protect, monitor, and manage your large-scale deployments. Through real-world use cases, discover effective strategies to enhance your governance posture and safeguard the Power Platform at scale with new, powerful tools. Join us to revolutionize your low-code management.
speakerNames: Ryan Jones, Shawn Nandi, Lianne Zelsman

title: Get the most of your enterprise knowledge with Copilot Studio
description: In this session, we will explore how to effectively leverage your enterprise knowledge within Microsoft Copilot Studio to enhance your agents with more relevant and contextual answers. You’ll discover the diverse types of knowledge available and learn how to optimize them to meet your specific needs.

title: Get started with best-in-class Copilot connectors in Copilot Studio
description: Explore the future of Copilot connectors and revolutionize the way agents interact with business and productivity data. Learn how Copilot connectors enable you to effortlessly unify business data stored in Microsoft Dataverse with productivity data from Microsoft Graph, all within a single tool. No more switching between different platforms—Copilot connectors allow you to access, manage, and act on all your data from one interface, streamlining workflows and simplifying your daily tasks.

title: Accelerate your Dynamics 365 practice: Partnering for success
description: In the AI era, Business Applications partners are leading the charge in maximizing value by streamlining and optimizing business processes for customers. The upcoming years will witness a surge in business process transformation, focusing on each role and function to enhance efficiencies and achieve cost savings with AI. In this session, we’ll look at key growth areas within Business Applications and highlight partner opportunities that can help you realize maximum value for your customers.

title: Growth your CRM practice in the age of AI
description: In today's fast-paced market, Dynamics 365 is revolutionizing the way businesses interact with customers, drive sales, and foster long-lasting relationships. This exciting session is designed to accelerate your CRM practice and help you unlock the potential of co-sell resources to enhance your deal win rates. Learn about investments and materials in the new CRM Vision and Value funded engagement and how to leverage and apply them with your customers to drive mutual growth and success.
speakerNames: Matthew Davis, Keith Overa, Girish Smith

title: Investments to accelerate ERP migrations and your practice
description: In today's rapidly evolving market, Dynamics 365 is transforming the way businesses manage their operations, streamline processes, and drive efficiency. This engaging session is designed to accelerate your ERP practice and help you unlock the potential of co-sell resources to enhance your deal win rates. Learn about go-to-market investments and materials and how to effectively apply them with your customers to drive mutual growth and success.
speakerNames: Niels Jensen, Becky Lymberis, Ragnar Pitla

title: Maximize partner profitability with AI in low code
description: In today’s fast-paced digital landscape, agility and speed are paramount, and Low Code partners are leading the way in providing customers with innovation at scale. This insightful session is designed for partners looking to harness the power of low code and AI. Partners building practices focused on automation and app modernization are increasing profitability and time to value by integrating Power Platform into their practice – and providing a holistic AI offering.

title: Use the power of your data to fuel transformative apps and AI
description: Data is the fuel for innovation, driving the development of transformative applications and artificial intelligence (AI). This session will explore how harnessing the power of data across the Azure databases portfolio can lead to groundbreaking advancements that enhance operational efficiency, deliver personalized user experiences, and revolutionize the way we interact with technology.
speakerNames: James Codella, PhD, Charles Feddersen, Aditi Gupta, Sirigada Aravind Rao, Shireesh Thota, Arun Ulagaratchagan, Bob Ward

title: Supercharge your applications with Azure Cache for Redis
description: Supercharge your applications with Azure Cache for Redis, the high-performance caching solution that enhances scalability and performance. Offering low latency and high throughput, it ensures seamless data access and real-time analytics. With advanced data structures compatibility and seamless integration with Azure services, optimizing your applications is effortless. Join our session to discover how Azure Cache for Redis can elevate your applications and drive innovation in your projects.

title: Improving accuracy of GenAI apps with Azure Database for PostgreSQL
description: The success of GenAI apps in the enterprise is decided by the accuracy of their responses. Using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), you can improve accuracy by grounding GenAI app responses in your data. In this session, explore advanced RAG techniques in Azure Database for PostgreSQL, and see how customers are using these techniques to deploy an easy-to-use corporate development platform for GenAI apps.
speakerNames: Maxim Lukiyanov, Orhun Oezbek, Jay Yang

title: Driving enterprise performance with Azure Database for PostgreSQL
description: PostgreSQL is highly favored by developers and enterprises for its extensibility and scalability. Azure Database for PostgreSQL is introducing new innovations in scalability, performance, and optimizations, allowing developers to focus more on application logic and less on tuning and optimization. In this demo-rich session, discover all the latest enhancements to Azure Database for PostgreSQL that enable building mission critical applications.

title: Use AI with the latest Azure SQL innovations to transform your data
description: GenAI applications and Copilots are transforming the SQL experience. Join us to learn how Microsoft delivers an optimal platform for new AI workloads using vectors and RAG patterns, while ensuring ROI, performance, and security your business demands today. Discover the latest innovations for Azure SQL for gen AI applications and database context-aware Copilots, powered by Azure SQL Database Hyperscale. Ensure your SQL estate is future-ready in this era of intelligent applications and analytics.

title: Serverless GenAI: building scalable RAG apps with Azure Cosmos DB
description: In this session, we’ll explore advanced strategies for scalable serverless RAG applications using Azure Cosmos DB and DiskANN. Topics include architecture simplification, data synchronization, scalability challenges, and multi-tenancy. We’ll discuss the latest developments in vector search, full-text search, and hybrid search in Azure Cosmos DB, showcasing real-world use cases from our customers like EY. Learn how to get started easily with LangChain and Semantic Kernel.

title: Cosmic efficiency: mastering performance and cost in Azure Cosmos DB
description: Are you ready to build high-performance, cost-efficient apps? Join us to master Azure Cosmos DB! This session covers serverless vs. autoscale options, data modeling, query optimization, and advanced features for top performance. Learn how to quickly build apps that can easily grow to planetary scale with data partitioning and fine-tuning strategies. Join us to hear about best practices and insider tips to design cloud-native apps with unmatched performance, scalability, and cost savings!

title: The SQL Server roadmap: The next generation database AI platform
description: In this session, we will explore the roadmap of SQL Server including future capabilities for AI applications deeply integrated into the security zone of the SQL Server engine.  We will also show you AI assisted experiences to help you manage SQL Server including tools like SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS), Query Store, Intelligent Query Processing and Azure Arc. Learn how AI can streamline your workflow, reduce context switching, and boost overall efficiency.
speakerNames: Joe Sack, Erin Stellato, Bob Ward

title: Power AI apps with unified data and insights in Microsoft Fabric
description: Discover the future of data management with Microsoft Fabric and unlock new scenarios that drive your business forward. Join us as we showcase a new workload experience in Microsoft Fabric that empowers you to quickly harness the power of an AI-driven analytics platform. Learn how to access both transactional and analytical data in one place without compromising application performance.
speakerNames: Panos/Panagiotis Antonopoulos, Anna Hoffman, Asad Khan

title: Boost productivity with Microsoft Fabric​, Copilot, and AI
description: Explore how AI is revolutionizing the data analytics landscape. Microsoft Fabric serves as the center of data gravity for both business and technical users. We'll delve into real-world scenarios showcasing the power of combining Microsoft Fabric with AI to enhance data insights, analyze customer interactions, and customize machine learning models. ​Join us to understand the impact of AI on data analytics and take the next steps to leverage Microsoft Fabric for your organization’s success.
speakerNames: Mohammad Ali, Nellie Gustafsson, Kelly Richardson-Lewis

title: Accelerating ESG progress with sustainability data solutions in Fabric
description: Discover how Microsoft Fabric can power your sustainability journey with valuable insights and actionable data. Learn from real-world examples as Volvo shares their story and the tangible benefits they gained from using Fabric. This session will showcase the ease of use and powerful capabilities of Fabric, helping you unlock the full potential of your data, transform your sustainability initiatives, and lead the way in environmental stewardship.

title: Unlock the power of Real-Time Intelligence in the era of AI
description: Real Time Intelligence is a transformative technology designed to empower businesses with real-time data insights and analytics. This session will cover the journey of Real Time Intelligence from its inception to its current state, highlighting key features, capabilities, and the impact it has on operational efficiency and decision-making processes. We will also highlight customer success stories and showcase how you can revolutionize your data strategy and unlock new opportunities for growth.
speakerNames: Yitzhak Kesselman, Tessa Kloster, Niraj Revankar, Nandini Srinivasan

title: Build, integrate and monetize AI-ready apps with Microsoft Fabric
description: Microsoft Fabric has continued to grow as a platform of choice for building applications for enterprises and ISVs. Learn how large enterprises like LSEG are building data distribution platforms, and how industry leading ISVs are harnessing the power of Fabric’s unified data management and workload dev APIs to accelerate app development. The session includes a high-level demo of Fabric’s Workload Development Kit and monetization guidance via Azure Marketplace.
speakerNames: Teddy Bercovitz, Dipti Borkar, Phil Cheetham

title: Ingest, govern, and secure your data with OneLake
description: With the massive growth in the volume of data and data sources, managing an entire organization-wide data estate is becoming increasingly complex. This session will explore the latest capabilities coming to OneLake, Fabric’s multi-cloud data lake, that can help you bring in data from any source and then govern and secure that data. Discover how new mirroring and governance tools in Fabric can help you manage your data estate and unlock deeper insights.
speakerNames: Joshua Caplan, Wilson Lee, Adi Regev, Anudeep Sharma

title: Power BI in Microsoft Fabric: unveiling the latest innovations
description: Join us as we unveil the latest announcements for Power BI in Microsoft Fabric. Explore how Copilot's advanced AI capabilities are transforming data analytics by automating report creation, generating intelligent insights, and enhancing data visualization. Discover how Power BI seamlessly integrates to enable smooth data flow and enhance collaboration. We'll also share real-world success stories, demonstrating the profound impact of this innovation on data analytics.

title: Supercharge your lakehouse with Azure Databricks and Microsoft Fabric
description: Azure Databricks Unity Catalog’s integration with Microsoft Fabric enhances the lakehouse experience in Azure, combining data and AI solutions for faster value. Catalog data, schema, and tables from Unity Catalog are made available in OneLake in real time, leveraging Microsoft Fabric capabilities which include data engineering, data science, real-time intelligence, and optimized Direct Lake mode delivering blazing fast insights with Power BI.

title: Microsoft Fabric: what's new and what's next
description: Microsoft Fabric is the unified, open, governed, and AI-powered analytics platform fueling your next wave of business innovation. We're excited to share a full slate of innovations with customers and partners, including some that will be category disrupting. Hear from the Fabric leadership team on the progress we’ve made, the new ground we’re breaking, and why we believe Fabric can accelerate your organization's transformation in the era of AI.
speakerNames: Anna Hoffman, Amir Netz, Arun Ulagaratchagan

title: How to run a successful Azure migration project
description: Migrating your on-premises workloads is an exciting first step toward the cloud, but what can go wrong? Join us to hear about the top mistakes to avoid and how to make your project a success. Microsoft experts will present the most common pitfalls they see based on thousands of customer engagements.

title: Azure Cache for Redis: Powering GenAI with speed and scalability
description: Discover the future of AI optimization! Scaling AI from proof-of-concept to production often strains cost and performance. Discover "semantic caching," an innovation that slashes LLM costs while accelerating response times. Join our experts to explore how Azure Cache for Redis can transform your GenAI apps as a vector database and semantic cache for Azure OpenAI Service, and more. Don't miss this chance to accelerate your GenAI apps!

title: Unlock the power of open-source databases in Azure
description: Microsoft is making significant investments in relational and NoSQL open-source databases. Learn about Azure Database for PostgreSQL, Azure Database for MySQL, Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB, with new enterprise-ready features to support daily business operations. See new migration capabilities as well as Microsoft's new contributions to the open-source community, including DiskANN, a PostgreSQL extension for Azure OpenAI Service, and much more.
speakerNames: Aditi Gupta, Abinav Rameesh, Krishnakumar Ravi

title: What’s new in Azure Databricks
description: Azure Databricks is a first-party service on Microsoft Azure, offering seamless native integration with vital Azure Services and workloads that add value. Join us to learn about what is new in Azure Databricks. We'll also share how Azure Databricks unlocks the power of AI, enabling businesses to leverage machine learning for predictive insights, automation, and innovation—ultimately driving smarter decision-making and long-term business growth.

title: Help your customers’ AI transformation with unified analytics
description: Customers are embracing unified data and analytics to achieve more with their data and get ready for AI transformation, opening up a large and high growth opportunity for Microsoft partners. Microsoft’s expanding set of AI-powered toolset, including Fabric and Azure Databricks, provide open and extensible platforms for customers to accelerate their AI journey. Understand the narrative, and the resources for positioning yourself to profit from this opportunity.

title: Outages are inevitable and here's what you should know
description: Outages are inevitable, so effective preparation and response are crucial. In this session, we’ll discuss how both Microsoft and customers can think about resilient systems, and how outages can be used to harden systems. We’ll discuss key Microsoft investments, and also showcase how customers can enhance their applications' resilience using Azure’s resiliency services. This session will highlight that while outages are inevitable, impact does not have to be.
speakerNames: Sami Kubba, Rochak Mittal, David Steele

title: Operate infrastructure across distributed locations with Azure Arc
description: Do you run mission critical applications across distributed locations? Join us to learn the best practices to deploy Azure’s distributed hybrid infrastructure solutions – from the public cloud to customer operated locations.  Discover how legacy workloads and cloud-native and AI applications run on hybrid infrastructure while leveraging the advantages of Azure’s ecosystem of services like security or centralized cloud-management.
speakerNames: Eleanor Cohen, Cosmos Darwin, Jason Tayler

title: Scale apps and data with Azure Arc, Kubernetes, and Microsoft Fabric
description: Join us for a technical session on how to architect, deploy, and manage applications across cloud and edge. Build deployment pipelines for critical infrastructure and establish a unified data foundation that generates valuable insights across physical operations. Focus on leveraging Azure's adaptive cloud approach, AI solutions, and Azure Arc-enabled patterns. In this demo-heavy session, learn to develop and operate applications using cloud-native services that scale beyond boundaries.

title: Building AI applications that leverage your data in object storage
description: Join this session to learn how Azure Blob Storage offers a secure, scalable foundation for your AI initiatives. Learn why it's the ideal choice for petabytes of unstructured data like PDFs, images, or videos for fine-tuning LLMs or RAG systems. Discover best practices such as using Premium Blob for low TCO and class-leading performance. See how Azure Blob simplifies enterprise data migration and integrates with Azure AI Search and Azure OpenAI to speed up enterprise AI app development.

title: AI supercomputing for training and inferencing​
description: In this session, we delve into optimizing AI supercomputing infrastructure for developing the world's most sophisticated AI and frontier models. We will explore the critical role of leading GPUs like the latest from NVIDIA, and the advanced network topologies Microsoft has implemented to drive unparalleled performance at scale. Gain insights on how Azure's experience can be harnessed to push the boundaries of the AI capabilities you adopt.​

title: Simplify operations with AI: Copilot, Azure Arc, and Azure Monitor
description: In this session, we'll unveil the latest updates to AI-enhanced tools like Microsoft Copilot in Azure, Azure Arc, and Azure Monitor that are designed to help you simplify and secure operations across on-premises, edge, and cloud environments. We’ll demo how you can leverage Azure’s flexible portfolio of management tools to automate configuration and deployment tasks, govern IT inventory anywhere, and observe across the full stack to ensure contingencies for failures.
speakerNames: Tom Jackson, Meagan McCrory, Shiva Sivakumar

title: Future of Cloud - New generation of compute & apps with AI and quantum
description: Solving some of society's most pressing challenges—such as climate change and food insecurity—requires consistent progress in accelerating scientific discovery. This promise comes from a new generation of hybrid applications, integrating advanced AI and classical supercomputing with reliable quantum machines. Learn about core incubations and key strategic investments from Microsoft enabling new discoveries and business disruption across chemistry, energy, life sciences, and more.

title: Exploring the latest innovations in Azure Compute
description: This session unveils the latest compute innovations that make Azure a leader in cloud IaaS, including new developments to VMs powered by the in-house built cloud-native Cobalt 100 processor, advancements in large scale fleet orchestration with Azure Compute Fleet, new confidential VMs, and Azure Confidential Clean Rooms.
speakerNames: Stefanie Lemon, David Meyer, Varun Shandilya

title: Cloud platform security in an evolving threat landscape
description: Cloud platforms now face security threats that weren’t imaginable when the public cloud started taking shape 15 years ago. Learn directly from Microsoft's core platform security engineering leaders about the daily threats they face and key mitigation strategies you can use to protect your workloads on the Azure platform. Discover attack surface reduction techniques used at the platform level and learn how to best secure your workloads within the cloud shared responsibility model.

title: Specialized silicon and hardware optimized for cloud infrastructure
description: In this session we will dive deep into the custom hardware, software, and architecture of Azure’s purpose-built cloud infrastructure, including Azure Maia and Azure Cobalt silicon. We will also discuss how end-to-end systems optimization, gen-AI assisted silicon design and EDA capabilities, and advanced datacenter technologies in cooling, power, and network – form the powerful and reliable foundation of the Copilot Stack that empowers your innovations in the era of AI.​

title: Transforming HPC simulations with AI​
description: Elevate your high-performance computing experience for simulations with the power of Copilot, seamlessly integrated with Azure Batch. Say goodbye to technical hassles— with Copilot automate your setup and resource management for simulation and modelling. In this session, learn how to unlock the power of advanced computing using copilots and boost productivity with streamlined workflows and optimized resources. Experience first-hand how AI can transform HPC simulation across your applications.

title: Technical deep dive on Oracle Database@Azure
description: Now you can bring Oracle databases using Exadata and RAC to Azure by leveraging Oracle Database@Azure to run mission-critical workloads. Join our experts for the latest announcements and live demos showcasing how you can modernize your Oracle data and apps using the powerful combination of OCI and Azure. Explore seamless integrations with Microsoft Fabric, Microsoft Sentinel, and more to achieve exceptional performance, availability, and security with Oracle Database@Azure.

title: Migrate to build, run, and secure Generative AI
description: AI is only as good as the apps it infuses into, the data it uses to model and train, and the infrastructure that powers it. Is your technology estate ready to scale and innovate with AI? Learn how migrating to Azure enables faster time-to-value and code-to-security for your AI solutions at scale. See new capabilities, testimonials and end-to-end demos of migration to Azure, creating a GenAI app in Azure OpenAI Service, and securing it in the cloud with Microsoft Defender for Cloud.
speakerNames: Raushni Gupta, Gopal Shankar, Bob Ward, Patrick Widjaja

title: What’s new in Linux: How we’re collaborating to help shape its future
description: Linux is a fundamental technology for the cloud, a key enabler for open-source technologies like Kubernetes and PostgreSQL, and powers over 60% of customer cores in Azure. In this session, we explore the top innovations across the Linux ecosystem and how Microsoft is collaborating with the partner and open-source communities to help shape the future of Linux. Hear customer stories and see demos of the latest Linux advancements on Azure.
speakerNames: Vincent Batts, Susumu Kariyuki, Chris Quinn, Andrew Randall

title: How to run your VMware workloads in Azure with Azure VMware Solution
description: With Azure VMware Solution, migrate VMware workloads to the cloud using your existing skillsets. Our experts will walk you through every step, including pre-migration assessment, live migration, networking connectivity patterns, and how to implement a Zero Trust security model and RBAC. Our examples will cover SQL Server and Oracle database migrations, including Oracle Database@Azure. With these best practices, you’ll be ready to exit your datacenter and set up your private cloud in Azure.

title: Learn what you can do today with Microsoft AI for SAP applications
description: Join us and learn how to architect, set-up and deploy workflows combining AI technologies from Microsoft and SAP. We’ll share how you can use Azure AI with SAP, integrate Copilot for Microsoft 365 with SAP Joule for improved productivity and streamline SAP workflows by building your own Copilot with Microsoft Copilot Studio. This session also includes best practices and real-world examples.

title: Adaptive cloud: Unify hybrid, multi-cloud and edge with Azure Arc
description: Join this session to explore our latest investments in hybrid, edge, and multi-cloud technologies, designed to advance your adaptive cloud strategy. Discover how to leverage both existing and new capabilities to enhance your skills and build a well-rounded industry-specific approach. We demo how Azure's extensive product suite including Azure Arc, Windows and SQL server, AKS, Copilot & more empower AI-driven central management, app development, and scalable solutions for distributed operations.
speakerNames: Bernardo Caldas, Angie Tran, Satya Vel

title: Anatomy of an outage and evolving our cultures towards transparency
description: Transparent communication during outages is crucial. This session will outline our evolving approach to incident communication, emphasizing openness and trust with customers. We’ll review recent impactful outages, key principles guiding our strategy, and our process from initial response to post-incident reviews. Attendees will gain insights into our handling of real-world incidents and the steps we’ve taken to enhance clarity, accountability, and learning across the organization.
speakerNames: Sami Kubba, Rochak Mittal, David Steele

title: Windows Server 2025: New ways to gain cloud agility and security
description: What difference will Windows Server 2025 make for your business? Through demos and discussions with both engineers and executives, you'll be among the first to see new features in security, hybrid and edge innovations with Azure Arc, and even AI and ML use cases made possible through GPU partitioning. Learn how your team can scale quickly, save time on tasks like patching, get more from Windows Server in Azure, and gain efficiencies with storage and business-critical workloads like SQL Server.
speakerNames: Dan Cuomo, Douglas Phillips, Jeff Woolsey

title: Application centric assessment and guided migration with Azure Migrate
description: As you explore migrating to the cloud, you should ask a critical question, is your IT estate ready to land and scale securely at optimal cost? Learn how you can migrate to Azure with the new intuitive UI and application centric approach of Azure Migrate. You can assess your IT estate with cost estimates at the application level and benefit from a secure platform with faster time-to-value. Learn more about migration of Windows/Linux stacks from connected sessions to help you move with confidence.
speakerNames: Kiran Madnani, Roopesh Nair, Dave Rich

title: Unveiling the latest in Azure Networking for a secure, connected cloud
description: As cloud adoption grows, robust network infrastructure is crucial. Please join us as we explore the latest innovations in Azure Networking, designed to enhance security and efficiency in the cloud. We’ll discuss new updates, including the "secure by default" initiative, addressing security concerns and supporting AI workloads. You’ll gain insights into network connectivity, security, and performance, helping you optimize your cloud strategy and build a future-ready network for your organization.

title: Proactively design and build resilient workloads on Azure
description: Start resilient, stay resilient. Explore the architectural features needed to uphold stringent uptime requirements for critical deployments. Learn how to design resiliency into workloads and environments by implementing Azure landing zones, Azure verified modules, and the Well-Architected Framework. We will  demo the new Azure Proactive Resiliency Library and show how Azure Monitor baseline alerts, Azure Advisor and Azure Monitor can help you minimize outage impacts and increase productivity.
speakerNames: Ben Brauer, Rob Kuehfus, Shweta Rohilla

title: How to run a successful Azure data analytics project
description: Moving a data analytics workload to Azure can unlock a world of new capabilities. Join us to hear about how customers are leveraging a modern analytics platform and the top best practices to make your project a success. Microsoft experts will present our learnings and tell you how to get expert help on your project.

title: How Microsoft Azure ensures high Quality releases with Agility
description: Want to know how Azure releases changes to Production while maintaining high Quality and Agility? Azure implements hundreds of changes daily without customers noticing, yet they benefit from new capabilities swiftly. Learn about the quality stages for Azure and how we are learning with our customers to ensuring we continuously enhance platform automation and processes to ensure Azure service changes have zero impact on customer workloads.
speakerNames: Igal Figlin, Sudha Mahajan, Rochak Mittal

title: Inside Azure innovations with Mark Russinovich
description: Join Mark Russinovich, CTO and Technical Fellow of Microsoft Azure. Mark will take you on a tour of the latest innovations in Azure architecture and explain how Azure enables intelligent, modern, and innovative applications at scale in the cloud, on-premises, and on the edge.

title: How AI is transforming the migration economic opportunity for partners
description: Discover how partners can leverage Azure's leadership in AI, security and Adaptive Cloud to recast the economics of migrations and capture new workloads. Energize and educate your team on the full spectrum of Azure advantages and activate your business with Azure's powerful migration and modernization offers designed for partner success.

title: Capturing the market moment with Azure VMWare Solution
description: Discover why Azure is the preferred cloud for VMware migrations, understand the partner opportunities surrounding the VMware changes made by Broadcom and how Azure VMware Solution (AVS) alleviates pricing concerns and other business risks. Learn about the use cases and advantages of AVS and how Azure Migrate and Modernize offerings help capitalize on this unique opportunity.

title: Transform your customer SAP estate by unlocking AI innovation
description: Microsoft is helping partners to do more with SAP workloads by innovating with AI and other Microsoft Cloud capabilities. Discover how investments into partner success have brought together a compelling set of offerings and incentives to help partners build top of funnel demand, stay competitive and migrate more SAP workloads to Azure.

title: Deploying AI with Sovereign controls
description: Learn valuable insights about using AI in Microsoft Cloud for Sovereignty. The session will explore the opportunities and solutions for implementing AI in environments with strict data sovereignty and compliance requirements. Additionally, the session will cover the best practices for data security, regulatory compliance, and optimizing AI performance in secure cloud environments.

title: Accelerate Cloud Adoption with Software-Defined Sovereignty
description: Learn about the capabilities and roadmap of Microsoft Cloud for Sovereignty. Microsoft Cloud for Sovereignty offers trusted public sector solutions designed to help governments harness the innovation and cybersecurity benefits of the hyperscale cloud while meeting national and regional requirements for data sovereignty.

title: Empower Nonprofits with AI: Data Management with Microsoft Fabric
description: Data management is key for nonprofits organizations to unlock the power of AI to drive their missions forward. In this session, we will showcase how your organization can use Microsoft Fabric to streamline and centralize your data, making AI adoption easier. Attendees will explore best practices, evaluate current data systems, and create a roadmap. You’ll also hear from a nonprofit on how Microsoft Fabric has helped them gain better control on current data estate and utilize the power of AI.
speakerNames: Mark Ghazai, Clark Osborne, Sean Riordan, Dr. Bryan Zimmerman

title: Improve the telecommunications subscriber experiences with Customer Experience Platform
description: Telecoms can turn customer experience challenges into business opportunities, leveraging AI capabilities to reduce costs, improve efficiencies, and deliver a more personalized customer experience. Attendees will see how the Customer Engagement Platform from Amdocs and Microsoft can enhance operational efficiency, improve customer engagement, and drive business growth. We will present a series of live demonstrations together with a joint customer.
speakerNames: Rick Lievano, Mustafa Oyumi, Lionel Schonberg

title: Sustainability reduction and calculation compliance simplified with Copilot Studio and Microsoft Sustainability Manager
description: In this presentation, we showcase the powerful combination of Large Language Models (LLM) and data aligned with the Cloud for Sustainability schema through the creation of Copilot Studio templates. These templates are designed to bring sustainability standards, such as the EU Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM), to life by assisting practitioners in estimating carbon adjustment fees. Additionally, the templates can help set goals using the Science Based Target (SBTi) methodology, which can then be seamlessly imported into Microsoft Sustainability Manager for tracking.

title: Innovative Energy Solutions: Gen AI and Copilot in Action
description: Join us for a presentation on GenAI and Copilot capabilities to gain greater value from your data that unites applications and partners across the energy enterprise data landscape. Learn how to create a comprehensive digital twin to collaborate seamlessly and leverage GenAI and Microsoft Copilot to evaluate different configurations, emissions, risk, economics, and technical complexity ensuring real-time project insights are always available.​
speakerNames: Jyothsna Bijjam, Todd Nelson, Vishal Sabharwal

title: Harness the power of data and AI in healthcare and life sciences
description: As AI innovation advances, healthcare organizations are leveraging AI to extract insights from data and benefit their workforce, clinicians, and communities. Discover how AI is transforming healthcare by optimizing workflows and enabling impactful outcomes. Explore Microsoft Cloud for Healthcare, including healthcare data solutions in Microsoft Fabric, AI solutions in Microsoft Copilot Studio, and AI models in Azure AI Studio, to understand how to adopt AI responsibly.
speakerNames: David Ardman, Will Guyman, Mike Lonze, Miriam Ney

title: Experience the value of Copilot across healthcare
description: Discover the power of copilot capabilities in healthcare and see how these AI companions are revolutionizing workflow, enhancing efficiency, and improving patient care. Learn how DAX Copilot goes beyond AI notes to automate clinical workflows, streamlining tasks and save time. Find out how to build copilot experiences that ensure successful and accurate healthcare outcomes.

title: Accelerate AI Innovation with Microsoft Cloud for Financial Services
description: Learn about Microsoft’s strategy and investments in Microsoft Cloud for Financial Services, which helps financial services organizations transform customer experiences, empower their employees, manage risk and compliance, modernize core systems, and create a sustainable future. This presentation provides a broad overview of platform capabilities including the latest data and AI tools, security and compliance features, Azure infrastructure accelerators, and partner integrations with demos.

title: Elevate the retail experience with copilot template for personalized shopping
description: The Microsoft Cloud for Retail copilot template for personalized shopping elevates the digital shopping experience by leveraging gen-AI to provide intent-based, conversational, and personalized product discovery, recommendations, and seamless checkout. Join us for a technical exploration of the features, architecture, deployment, and extensibility of this versatile, composable template of AI services.
speakerNames: Andrii Mykhailiuk, Anil Purushotham, Vishal Sarkar

title: Empower the retail workforce with copilot template for store operations
description: The Microsoft Cloud for Retail copilot template for store operations leverages gen-AI to assist retail employees with their tasks and questions. It provides answers to common queries about products, inventory, and procedures using natural language processing and semantic search. Additionally, it allows employees to create and manage tasks through voice or text commands, enhancing productivity and collaboration. Join us for a technical exploration of the features, architecture, deployment, and extensibility of the copilot template for store operations.

title: Democratize data-driven decision making across factory operations with AI
description: Manufacturing is a data intensive industry. Unifying IT and OT data can seamlessly integrate factory systems to deliver actionable insights through advanced AI capabilities. Learn how Microsoft can help connect your factory operations, enhance productivity, and accelerate your journey with the Microsoft Cloud for Manufacturing data solutions in Microsoft Fabric and copilot template on Azure OpenAI Service.

title: Accelerate industrial transformation with Azure IoT operations
description: AI gives all data value. Together with modern infrastructure and compute, maturing AI allows every organization unprecedented access to the information that enables transformation. Learn how Azure IoT Operations can propel visibility at scale by unlocking OT and edge data historically trapped within industrial assets and processes.

title: Implementation best practices for Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability
description: During this session we will share how partners can join the growing network of Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability (MCFS) partners, provide technical insights to sharpen your skills, and share lessons learned from existing deployments.  You will hear about new opportunities to differentiate yourself while getting access to tools and resources.

title: Collaborating with partners for digital sovereignty in the cloud
description: In this session, you will learn how to go to market with partners to achieve digital sovereignty in the hyperscale cloud using Microsoft Cloud for Sovereignty. This session will explore strategies and best practices for collaborating with partners to create digital sovereignty solutions for customers, ensuring that customers can leverage the full potential of the hyperscale cloud while maintaining control over their data.

title: Empowering the financial services partner ecosystem with Generative AI
description: Explore Microsoft's AI strategy within the realm of financial services data ecosystems and discover the latest data and AI tools and services designed to expedite your journey. Gain insights into how other partners have developed integrated solutions to drive significant business outcomes, whether it's enhancing customer experiences, empowering the workforce, managing risk and compliance, modernizing core systems, or fostering a sustainable future.

title: Accelerating industry partner growth in the age of AI
description: Join us for an insightful session exploring the vast industry opportunities for our SDC and SI partners. We’ll highlight the critical role partners play in our ecosystem and reaffirm our commitment to their success. This session will help partners maximize the value of AI and grow their businesses across: GTM Strategy, technical capabilities, and partner program benefits. This session will empower partners aiming to align with Microsoft’s vision and drive impactful industry customer engagements.
speakerNames: Kathleen Mitford, Julie Sanford, Satish Thomas

title: Accelerating AI solutions on the Copilot stack for software companies
description: Achieve better precision and higher quality outcomes by building Copilot experiences with a deep understanding of industry and role-specific needs. In this session, we'll demonstrate how partners can rapidly develop business and industry solutions on the Copilot stack, driving ecosystem-wide innovation and accelerating the transition to a Copilot-first approach for both partners and customers.
speakerNames: Merav Davidson, Vall Herard, Pavandeep Kalra Kalra

title: Building solution practices for Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability
description: This session highlights how Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability partners leverage Microsoft technologies to implement and build solutions to solve sustainability challenges. You will hear firsthand from KPMG and the business they are building around sustainability.  Sustainability is a global challenge, and partners play a key role in data collection, understanding opportunities, and implementing solutions to drive sustainable alternatives.

title: How healthcare partners accelerate cloud and AI innovation
description: Explore the impact of joining the Microsoft Cloud for Healthcare partner ecosystem. Discover how partners are engaged in delivering cutting-edge cloud capabilities to their customers, driving healthcare's digital and AI transformation on a global scale. Gain insights into real-world success stories and understand how you can leverage Azure and AI to help your customers achieve their goals and modernize healthcare.

title: Retail partner opportunities across the value chain
description: Explore key ways partners are finding success with AI across the Microsoft Cloud for Retail. This session will help partners understand recent evolutions in Microsoft’s approach to empowering the Retail industry. We’ll also discuss how Industry for AI designations can help partners maximize their customer opportunity through increased discoverability. And we’ll dive deep on Microsoft’s “solution areas” and how retailers can best align to Microsoft Retail prioritization.

title: Prepare your data for Microsoft Copilot with new tools
description: Do you have concerns about oversharing? Discover how well-managed data can unlock the full potential of generative AI while supporting your security and compliance needs. Our experts will share the latest admin capabilities in Copilot, SharePoint Advanced Management (SAM), and Microsoft Purview that can help you more effectively manage permissions, enhance security, and implement robust content governance practices.
speakerNames: David Minasyan, Alex Pozin, Erica Toelle

title: Follow the prompt! Tracking and managing Copilot prompts at hyperscale
description: Do you know where your Copilot prompts are going? In this admin-focused, demo-filled session we’ll follow a series of prompts as they journey through the Copilot stack. Along the way we’ll stop to take closer looks at where and how prompts are processed, stored, and secured. We’ll also talk about the impact of grounding, orchestration, and extensibility– and maybe add a surprise along the way.  You’ll leave with new information and resources that elevate your Copilot management expertise!

title: Explore technical details and applications of Microsoft 365 Copilot Pages and Business Chat
description: In September we introduced the concept of Web + Work + Pages. Copilot's ability to bring these components together into a single product represents the foundation of a new way of working, with Copilot at the center. In this session we'll dive deeper into the products and technology underlying this new way of working, giving you a richer understanding of its capabilities. We'll also share real world opportunities to redefine working patterns in your organizations with Business Chat and Pages at the center.

title: Ground Microsoft 365 Copilot in your business knowledge
description: Unlock the full potential of Microsoft 365 Copilot by grounding it in more of your enterprise data with Copilot connectors. This technical session will guide you through indexing your business data and content into Copilot and Copilot agents, with strict enforcement of your data governance policies. Join us to learn how to maximize the impact of your data, make Copilot smarter for every role in your company, and scale business value.

title: Microsoft 365 Copilot advantages: How does it compare with other AI solutions
description: In the rapidly evolving landscape of artificial intelligence, it's crucial to understand the unique capabilities and advantages of different AI solutions. This session will provide a deep dive into Microsoft 365 Copilot, highlighting how it stands out from other AI offerings in the market.

title: Get ready for the AI era with a modern CRM
description: In the age of AI, customers are choosing to bet on customer experience solutions that help them take a platform-centric approach to CRM to move away from data silos. With better data comes better AI. In this session, hear from customers who have moved to Dynamics 365 Sales from legacy CRM systems and transformed their sales organization by modernizing their CRM platform; placing big bets on AI and winning with more personalized customer engagements and accelerated pipeline growth.

title: Transforming content management with agents in SharePoint
description: Your organization's content is growing exponentially in the era of AI. How do you get the information you need, when you need it, to help you make decisions that drive your business forward? Join one of Microsoft’s most distinguished leaders — known for spearheading the development of SharePoint — to find out. From Copilot in OneDrive, to Copilot agents, to SharePoint Advanced Management, and more, you’ll learn how SharePoint leverages AI to unlock knowledge and put your content to work.
speakerNames: Adam Harmetz, Jason Moore, Jeff Teper

title: Unlock smart collaboration with Microsoft Teams
description: Discover how intelligence, coordination, and collaboration meet to transform how and where you work.
