Learn how our investments in security, simplicity, and flexibility are laying the groundwork for the future of Microsoft Teams. With live demos of Teams, Microsoft 365 Copilot, and Microsoft Places, you’ll see the capabilities that are making communication smarter and will transform your workplace. You'll hear how both customers and Microsoft are using the latest AI solutions to empower teams.
speakerNames: Ilya Bukshteyn, Daniela Chocron, Pete Daderko, Kerry Perez Heffernan

title: IT Strategies for Copilot Administration
description: Join us to understand the essential steps to ensure your organization is ready to adopt Microsoft Copilot and Microsoft 365 Copilot with confidence. Learn about organizational and IT readiness steps for IT admins and innovative product experiences in the Microsoft 365 admin center to make it easy. This session will cover topics around the role of cloud app discovery, enterprise data protection and more. Walk away with a comprehensive guide to optimize both your organization's AI adoption.
speakerNames: Shilpi Sinha, Caroline Stanford, Tiffany Treacy

title: Copilot in Excel: transforming data analysis
description: Businesses rely on Excel to manage their data and make decisions. In this session, we will explore how the latest product innnovation, including Copilot in Excel with Python, will help you gain deep insights and make data-driven decisions.

title: Reimagining employee experience with AI and agents
description: In the era of AI, agent evolution is poised to radically transform the future workforce experience. In this session, we’ll debut the latest purpose-built employee agent in Microsoft 365 Copilot designed to enhance employee experience and boost IT and HR back-office productivity. Also discover how Microsoft Viva is equipping organizations to accelerate their journey towards an AI-driven workforce, with powerful insights, employee communications tools and skills-based learning.
speakerNames: Lucy Hitz, Sunita Khatri, Karyl Singh

title: Building a smart, simple, more secure frontline
description: Frontline workers make up 80% of the world's workforce and deserve to benefit from Microsoft's newest groundbreaking technology. In this session, learn more about custom AI solutions, like Copilot Studio and Extensions in SharePoint, and new security offerings, like Windows365 Shared Device Mode and Working Time, built to increase efficiency and support of your frontline.

title: Boost productivity with Copilot in Microsoft 365 apps
description: Discover how Copilot in Microsoft 365 apps like Word, PowerPoint, Planner, Outlook, and OneNote can help you organize information, manage projects, improve communication, and create work-specific content. Whether working solo or in teams, Copilot transforms how you work.

title: Empowering IT with the latest Microsoft 365 innovation
description: Join us to explore the latest Microsoft 365 innovations. This session offers insights on deploying and managing new features to boost productivity and unlock new ways of working. Learn how these updates can optimize IT infrastructure, enhance performance, and improve security. Discover upcoming Copilot features for admins to streamline daily tasks. Stay ahead by understanding what’s coming to Microsoft 365 to empower your IT team and drive excellence.

title: Get ready for End of Support (EOS) and the future of AI at work with Windows 11 and Copilot+ PCs
description: As we approach the end of support (EOS) for Windows 10 on October 14, 2025, it's crucial for organizations to transition to Windows 11. In this session, we will explore how Windows 11 and Copilot+ PCs serve as the canvas for a new era of AI at work. Learn about Copilot+ PCs the fastest, most intelligent and secure Windows PCs ever  as well as the latest AI-enhanced features in Windows 11, including advanced security measures, innovative AI experiences, and seamless integration with Microsoft 365. Join us to understand the benefits of upgrading to Windows 11 and how to prepare your organization for the future of AI.

title: Transform end-user computing experiences with Windows, Windows 365 and Intune
description: Discover the benefits of modernizing your end-user computing with Windows & Intune. Enhance productivity with the latest Windows and Copilot features on a range of devices from Copilot+ PCs to a new simple and secure solution for Windows 365. Learn how Copilot in Intune and automation can streamline management. Gain valuable insights and innovative ideas from a cross-industry panel of IT leaders on modernizing endpoints to meet increasing demands for security, flexibility, and reduced total cost of ownership (TCO).
speakerNames: Leo Brito, Melissa Grant, Scott Manchester, John McVay, Jeff Mendelsohn

title: How to update your endpoint strategy for Windows 365
description: Learn how to modernize your endpoint strategy for Windows 365 so you can get seamless connectivity that is simple to manage and secure by design.

title: Your secure and resilient Windows strategy
description: Join us for an overview of how Windows, from client to cloud, can support your strategy for secure identity, access, and data, as well as ongoing business continuity needs leveraging Windows 11, Windows 365, Azure Virtual Desktop, and more.

title: Intune Cloud-native Management: Prepare for AI and Next-Gen Cloud PCs
description: Now with complete visibility across your physical and virtual device inventory in Microsoft Intune, empower your IT teams with full device context and AI assistance for expert, simplified management. Secure by default, the new generation of AI PCs are here. Learn why a cloud native approach is the way to build a foundation for your AI-enabled future.

title: Grow your small business with new tools from Microsoft 365 and Teams
description: Join us for an insightful session designed specifically for small and medium businesses (SMBs). While we often think of Teams and Microsoft 365 as ways to communicate inside your company, discover how these solutions can help you enhance collaboration and grow your customer base. Learn about new tools that turn your productivity software into revenue growth engines.

title: Maximizing ROI with AI-first strategies for small and medium businesses
description: Discover how businesses are unlocking new ROI opportunities with Microsoft 365 Copilot. Join our session to explore innovative use cases and key outcomes from AI-first businesses revealing how they use Copilot to fuel growth, drive innovation, and gain a competitive edge.

title: Unleashing AI productivity with Surface
description: Discover how Surface devices boost productivity with AI. Discover our AI journey and watch live demos on leveraging our hardware and Windows to experience and develop AI. Elevate your workforce and customer productivity with innovative AI solutions.
speakerNames: Jack Cowett, Chauncey Larsen, Jacob Rhoades

title: Enhance collaboration with Teams and Surface Hub 3
description: Explore live demos of how Teams Rooms and Surface Hub 3 transform collaboration, creating more intuitive and efficient meetings. Gain insights on seamlessly navigating next steps and improving teamwork with the latest technology from Microsoft.
speakerNames: David Alexander, Frank Buchholz, Kate Canfield, Chauncey Larsen

title: Secure your endpoints with Surface
description: Explore demos of how Teams Rooms and Surface Hub 3 transform collaboration, creating more intuitive and efficient meetings. Gain insights on seamlessly navigating next steps and improving teamwork with the latest technology from Microsoft.
speakerNames: Frank Buchholz, Chauncey Larsen, Jacob Rhoades

title: Empowering neurodivergent employees with Copilot
description: Discover how Microsoft 365 Copilot empowers neurodivergent workers, who represent roughly 20% of today’s workforce, through demos and the latest research. Learn how you can use Copilot as powerful tool for inclusivity in your organization to level the playing field and maximize potential whether you are neurodivergent, an ally, or a people manager.
speakerNames: Angela Byers, Jenny Lay-Flurrie, Lesley Pink, Tara Roth

title: Maximize partner opportunity with Modern Work solutions powered by AI
description: The AI transformation wave is creating expanded partner opportunities across the Modern Work solution portfolio, with solutions that are redefining the future of work! Join us as we talk about the FY25 GTM strategy, partner opportunity, and investments/resources to enable you to enhance your GTM plans for Modern Work solutions.
speakerNames: Sela Gu, Nicole Herskowitz, Mayank Kapur, Chris Large, Uriel Rootshtain

title: Capitalize on Microsoft 365 Copilot partner opportunity in Enterprise
description: Find out how Copilot is enhancing partner revenue streams in Modern Work and Business applications. Join us to understand how Copilot is transforming customer business conversations and discover key resources to help you showcase business value of Copilot to your customers. Don't miss the opportunity to leverage the AI wave to spur your growth.
speakerNames: Ananthram Balakrishnan, Christopher DePalma, Seth Patton, Gloria Sanchez

title: Accelerate your CSP business in the era of AI and Copilot
description: Learn how to boost your Modern Work CSP business by leading with AI and Copilot. We’ll share new ways to go to market to upsell Microsoft 365 E3 and Business Premium for better data security, use Copilot to enhance business value, and attract new customers to the Microsoft 365 cloud. Don’t miss this chance to grow your business by leveraging new offerings in markets.
speakerNames: Marcelo Dichtchekenian, Matt Goddard, Sela Gu, David Suhrie

title: How partners can monetize and deliver value with Copilot Extensibility
description: Every customer has unique business needs and processes.  Come explore how Copilot Extensions enable you to connect, extend, and customize Microsoft Copilot to internal and third-party applications to create seamless and more efficient workflows. Join us to understand how to build your extensibility practice and monetize solutions with Copilot extensions and Copilot Studio to unlock the value of AI for the unique needs of your customers.
speakerNames: Thomas Abel, Uriel Rootshtain, Jojo Wright

title: WSL your enterprise ready tool to run Windows and Linux simultaneously
description: Security and control are becoming increasingly important in today's enterprise environment. Join the Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) team to get a deep dive into enterprise specific security enhancements including integration with Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Intune, Entra ID and more! We will explore new and better ways for your enterprises to install, configure, update, and manage your WSL distributions. You will also learn about WSL architecture and tips to bring WSL to your enterprise.

title: Bring on-device ML to enterprise apps with Windows Copilot Library
description: Introducing latest on-device machine learning APIs in Windows Copilot Library. This session will showcase the power of these APIs and guide you in integrating advanced AI capabilities running locally on Windows into your line-of-business and enterprise apps.

title: Modernize commercial apps with Win32 and the Windows App SDK
description:
Transform your commercial app with the latest modernization techniques using Win32 and the Windows App SDK. We'll highlight how Office uses the Windows App SDK and how you can too!
In this session, you will learn how you can revitalize your app with modern touches to ensure they stand out in today's competitive landscape. Learn about the architecture, AI in the Windows Copilot Library, React Native, WebView2, Content Islands, and more. We will provide the insight and tools you need for success.

title: Deploy AI models in your apps & scale across Windows PCs with DirectML
description: With so many API options out there to enable AI on Windows, where does one begin? Join us to learn how DirectML, foundational to Windows Copilot Runtime, helps you simplify how to scale AI innovations with popular ML frameworks like PyTorch, WebNN, and ONNX Runtime and works across different hardware architectures and local accelerators, all through a single DirectX API. We will show you how to get started with our samples, tools, and documentation.
speakerNames: Keicha Myers, Adele Parsons, Jacques van Rhyn

title: Build custom actions for your apps to increase reach and engagement
description: Come, learn how to build AI powered app actions that will allow your Apps functionality to surface across various Windows surfaces. You will learn how to register you Apps' actions and have it be available to the millions of Windows users, giving your apps greater visibility and traffic via Windows.

title: Transform your security with GenAI innovations in Security Copilot
description: Microsoft Security Copilot is your generative AI-powered assistant that helps teams improve security across organizations. Discover how Security Copilot enables you to protect at the speed and scale of AI by leveraging global threat intelligence, industry best practices and organizational data from Microsoft and others to deliver tailored insights. Learn about the latest innovations, including AI-driven automation capabilities and new use cases that elevate security organization-wide.

title: Optimize with Security Copilot: Real-world insights and expert advice
description: Discover how to unlock Microsoft Security Copilot's full potential. This session offers deep dives into valuable case studies, the latest efficiency data, and practical tips from product experts. Learn best practices and insider tricks to maximize Copilot’s benefits, ensuring quick value realization and enhanced security and IT operations.

title: Innovating security operations with Microsoft Sentinel
description: Learn about the latest innovations in Microsoft Sentinel, aimed at making management of your security operation simpler and less expensive. Highlights include improved migration support, how to use our newest, least expensive data tier, product-generated recommendations to improve your security and expanded access to Microsoft's unified security operations platform experience. Hear about Microsoft Sentinel learning and certification opportunities to get skilled up on the latest technology.

title: Simplify your SOC with the unified security operations platform
description: As threats evolve in speed, complexity, and sophistication, SOC teams must enhance their defenses. Join us to explore the latest advancements in Microsoft’s unified security operations platform, combining Microsoft Sentinel SIEM with Microsoft Defender XDR, the broadest native XDR spanning endpoints, email, identities, and more. We'll also feature a fireside chat with security experts to clarify common challenges and current topics in the security landscape.
speakerNames: Sherrod DeGrippo, Brandon Koeller, Rob Lefferts, Allie Mellen

title: Accelerate your multicloud security strategy
description: As cloud-native application adoption accelerates, security teams are challenged to craft a holistic code-to-runtime security strategy that effectively addresses the evolving threats across multicloud and hybrid environments. This session will explore how Microsoft Defender for Cloud can enhance your security posture and enable rapid threat remediation through an integrated platform approach.

title: Break down risk siloes and build up code to cloud security posture
description: Today’s expansive alphabet soup of security posture tools challenges Defenders to gain prioritized visibility into risks and remediate them. With unified cloud security posture across compute, data, API, and AI workloads from development pipelines to multicloud environments, Defenders can address their most impactful risks. Join this session to learn about the building blocks and new innovations to harden your security posture across the development lifecycle with Microsoft Defender for Cloud.

title: Secure access for any identity to any resource with Microsoft Entra
description: Dive deeply into identity and network security solutions to establish Zero Trust access controls; secure access for employees, customers and partners; and secure access in any cloud. Plus, see how generative AI and admin center tools boost efficiency and scale for your team.

title: Secure access for your workforce with the new Microsoft Entra Suite
description: Identity is your first line of defense. But when identity and network access solutions operate in isolation and not in tandem, they can lead to increased complexity and inconsistent policies. Join us to learn how unifying Conditional Access across identities and network can help simplify your Zero Trust architecture. Find out how the Microsoft Entra Suite can streamline employee onboarding, modernize remote access and secure access to on-premises applications and internet resources.
speakerNames: Jef Kazimer, Melanie Maynes, Irina Nechaeva

title: Integrating data security into your Security Operations Center
description: Today, the silos between the data security and security operations teams can leave organizations underequipped to investigate and respond to data security incidents quickly & at scale. As cyber threats grow more complex and impact of a data breach grows more costly, teams need improved visibility, collaboration, and context to defend threats faster. In this session, we’ll explore how Microsoft Purview & Defender XDR integrate to help organizations build better security resilience.
speakerNames: Nathalia Borges, Arun Kumar, Sravan Kumar Mera

title: One goal, many roles: Microsoft Security Copilot use cases for all
description: Experience how Microsoft Security Copilot supports multiple cybersecurity roles through practical, real-world incidents. This session highlights Copilot's seamless integration with Microsoft’s security suite—Entra, Defender, Purview, and Intune - and its ability to provide tailored solutions that address a broad range of security functions beyond traditional SOC roles.
speakerNames: Nick Goodman, Ryan Munsch, Manish Patel, Daler Sayfiddinov

title: Secure and govern your data estate with Microsoft Purview
description: In the era of AI, data security, governance, compliance, and privacy are more critical than ever. The need to use business data for innovation, the volume and velocity of cyberattacks, increasing regulations and fines and the ever-expanding data estate are all challenging how organizations safeguard their data. Join us to learn how Microsoft Purview enables unified data protection and explore how our latest innovations can help you secure and govern your data.

title: Secure data across its lifecycle in the era of AI
description: With the growth in data sphere fueled by rapid adoption of GenAI, organizations face frequent and costly security incidents. Moreover, the fragmented solution landscape creates blind spots, putting organizations at risk. To protect data and maintain competitiveness, organizations need a holistic approach. Learn how Microsoft Purview integrates data and user context to help organizations discover hidden risks, protect and prevent data loss, and mitigate data security risks, while leveraging Security Copilot to empower teams to achieve more.
speakerNames: Nathalia Borges, Shilpa Bothra, Maithili Dandige, Talhah Mir

title: Simpler, smarter and more secure endpoint management with Intune
description: Discover new ways to strengthen the security of your digital estate. Learn how Microsoft Intune and AI helps you analyze large volumes of data to optimize endpoint performance and take action to mitigate risks. Learn what’s new in Intune to simplify daily IT and security workloads with Copilot, giving teams the tools they need to stay secure and efficient—without the heavy lift.

title: Enhance IT expertise and efficiency with Copilot in Microsoft Intune
description: Explore how Copilot in Microsoft Intune assists admins in managing complex workflows with new policy management and troubleshooting generative AI functionality. Copilot provides deeper insights from your data, offers actionable guidance, and enhances IT expertise, leading to a more secure environment and efficient, informed decision-making.
speakerNames: Amit Ghodke, Archana Devi Sunder Rajan, Sangeetha Visweswaran

title: Secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot and beyond
description: Data security and privacy are the top concerns for 80% of security leaders when adopting AI. This session will explore how Microsoft can help secure and govern data in AI applications like Microsoft 365 Copilot and other third-party SaaS applications. We will introduce new capabilities that address primary AI challenges, such as data oversharing, leakage, compliance, and safety. After this session, you will gain the confidence and tools needed to accelerate AI adoption.
speakerNames: Charley Barth, Shukra Kichambare, Aashish Ramdas, Manjunatha Sivanna, Tina Ying

title: Secure and govern custom AI built on Azure AI and Copilot Studio
description: 66% of organizations are testing, planning, or already developing GenAI applications, with an average of nearly 14 applications simultaneously. This can introduce new and increasing security threats. In this session, we will demonstrate how Microsoft can help you enable data security and compliance controls for your custom AI apps, manage vulnerabilities in your AI stack, and detect and respond to emerging AI threats such as prompt injections and model theft.
speakerNames: Neta Haiby, John Israel, Shilpa Ranganathan, Greg Schellenberg, Gopal Shankar

title: Unify your security data to protect pre- and post-breach
description: Are you looking to safeguard your entire digital estate and gain a comprehensive, end-to-end view of your security infrastructure, including non-Microsoft investments? Join this session to preview new Microsoft solutions designed to enhance your ability to protect, detect, defend, and respond to the most complex cybersecurity threats.
speakerNames: Rohan Kumar, Rob Lefferts, Hammad Rajjoub

title: Proactive security with continuous exposure management
description: Learn how you can continuously assess, monitor and manage your cyber threat exposure to proactively identify and remediate attack paths that pose the greatest risk. Microsoft Security Exposure Management unifies disparate data silos for visibility of end-to-end attack surface, providing automatic ongoing generation of possible attack paths to critical assets and context-based prioritized recommendations to improve security posture across on-premises, hybrid and multi-cloud.

title: AI-Driven Ransomware Protection at Machine Speed: Defender for Endpoint
description: Over the past year, we saw a 2.75x rise in ransomware attacks, but a >3x decline in the number of Defender for Endpoint customers that were encrypted. Discover a key secret to this success, automatic attack disruption, which stops attacks at machine speed using industry-leading machine learning and threat intelligence. Since servers are a key target in ransomware attacks, we'll also discuss disruption on servers. Discover how to make the most of new features and UI.
speakerNames: Christine Coll, Noam Hadash, Edan Zwick

title: Accelerate your Zero Trust Journey: Unify Identity and Network Access
description: Discover how to accelerate your Zero Trust journey with a unified approach across identity and network. We will explore how Microsoft’s identity-centric Security Service Edge solution can help you secure access to all private, on-premises, internet, and SaaS applications and resources from anywhere. Join us to learn about Microsoft’s technology partnerships, where you can further enhance your organization’s security posture.
speakerNames: Sinead O'Donovan, Abdi Saeedabadi, John Savill

title: Secure and govern your data with Microsoft Fabric and Purview
description: It is often said that Data is the fuel that powers AI, but it can also pose challenges for leaders adopting analytics platforms like Microsoft Fabric to do more with their data. In this session, you will learn how Microsoft Purview works together with Microsoft Fabric, offering a comprehensive approach to secure and govern data in the era of modern analytics and AI helping organizations confidently activate their ever-growing digital landscape.

title: Making Zero Trust Real: Top 10 Security Controls you can implement now
description: Learn practical security controls you can implement today using tools you likely already have. This session offers technical guidance to make Zero Trust actionable and prepare your security for the AI era. We'll cover the top 10 controls that help your team—or 'accidental security experts'—quickly improve your security posture. You’ll also see how these measures align with Zero Trust and vendor-neutral frameworks like NIST and the Open Group.
speakerNames: Ulf Larsson, Daler Sayfiddinov, Mark Simos, Murugiah Souppaya

title: Scott and Mark learn responsible AI
description: Join Mark Russinovich & Scott Hanselman to explore the landscape of generative AI security, focusing on large language models. They cover the three primary risks in LLMs: Hallucination, indirect prompt injection and jailbreaks (or direct prompt injection). We'll explore each of these three key risks in depth, examining their origins, potential impacts, and strategies for mitigation and how to work towards harnessing the immense potential of LLMs while responsibly managing their inherent risks.

title: The Power of Diversity: Building a stronger workforce in the era of AI
description: As cyber threats become more sophisticated with speed and scale - we need to be as diverse as the threats we are defending.  Join our expert panelists as we uncover the countless roles shaping our digital defenses in the era of AI. Learn how important it is to bring in defenders from all different backgrounds, LGBTQ+ and cultures to protect our organizations from nation state threat actors and global cybercriminals.

title: Security Partner Growth: Harness the Power of AI in Security Copilot
description: Discover new Security Copilot product capabilities built to enable partners to run their managed services business and expand their ISV solutions. Find out how Partners can maximize the capabilities of your technical resources to support customers more effectively. You will receive a preview of the new partner benefits and product developments coming next year and learn how you can get ahead of the curve.  Don't miss this chance to stay ahead in the ever-evolving security landscape.
speakerNames: Ayse Altay, Vicki Beizer, Marcus Burnap, Mona Ghadiri, James Key, Debac Manikandan

title: Security Partner Growth: The Power of Identity with Entra Suite
description: Exclusive session unveiling partner opportunities with the Microsoft Entra Suite. Learn how the suite helps simplify Zero Trust architecture with unified identity and network access controls. Explore future security initiatives and position your business at the forefront of identity security. Don't miss this chance to build your business around this exciting new Microsoft offering.
speakerNames: Amelie Darchicourt, Jef Kazimer, Robbert Kelder, Ysais Martinez, Irina Nechaeva

title: Security Partner Growth: Trends on Customer Needs in Security
description: Hear about the latest customer trends and how Microsoft’s most successful partners have expanded their Security business this last year. You will learn, as a valued partner, how to grow your business into new categories and leveraging new incentives focused on customer needs. You will leave this session with the latest information on Microsoft’s investments focused on driving your managed services offerings and ISV solutions.

title: Security Partner Growth: Scale AI with customers while Securing Data
description: As customers embrace AI and Copilot technologies, partners helping safeguard the data estate is more critical than ever. Join us to explore the comprehensive features of Microsoft Purview that are designed to protect data in this new era. You will leave this session understanding how to leverage Microsoft Purview to accelerate Copilot adoption, utilizing partner GTM investments.
speakerNames: Jim Banach, Shilpa Bothra, Parri Munsell

title: Security Partner Growth: Managed Services with Defender & Sentinel
description: Customers need modern threat protection to secure their organization’s technology. As a trusted Security solution provider, they rely on you every day. Learn how to attach your managed services to the millions of customers leveraging Microsoft Defender and Microsoft Sentinel. Microsoft continues to invest in helping our MSSPs adopt, deploy and manage customers’ environments. You will leave this session with the latest information on GTM investments to grow your Microsoft security practice.

title: Security Partner Growth: Help Customers Modernize Security Operations
description: Microsoft Sentinel is the first SIEM built for cloud. This year is providing unique opportunities for Microsoft partners to help customers migrate off legacy platforms.  In this session, we’ll delve into the partner opportunity for Modern SecOps. We’ll provide valuable insights to build a profitable practice and guide you on how to best leverage our GTM investments to capture this market opportunity.

title: Grow your business with Microsoft AI Cloud Partner Program
description: The Microsoft AI Cloud Partner Program unharnesses the power of what we can do when we deliver together. Join us to learn what's coming in the year ahead and how to create success in this rapidly expanding addressable market.
speakerNames: Taylor McAlear, Julie Sanford, Chris Stanton, Steve Thomas

title: Accelerate Growth through Partner Incentives
description: In this session we explore the significant investments available to partners in FY25. Learn more about our FY25 incentives portfolio strategy to discover how you can take advantage of these offerings and grow your business.​​

title: How Microsoft can help you build and sell differentiated AI apps
description: Learn how to unlock more possibilities with pioneering AI, innovate faster with developer tools and grow your business to the next level. Discover exciting Azure product announcements that will help you stand out, increase developer productivity and expand your reach globally.
speakerNames: Jason Graefe, Mike Hulme, Mandy Whaley

title: Partnering for Growth across the Device and AI Cloud
description: Hear how Microsoft can help partners sell the new age of modern work leveraging modern AI PCs. As Windows 10 approaches its end of support, it creates an unprecedently opportunity for partners to create unique, value add AI experiences built on new hardware technology that connects the edge to cloud using with the most advanced Windows security.
speakerNames: Yann Calvez, Gabe Gravning, Mark Linton, Analisa Roberts

title: Transforming Co-Selling with Microsoft: A New Era of Collaboration
description: Discover how to enhance collaboration, optimize joint efforts, and drive success in shared initiatives. Gain insights into improving interactions with Microsoft sellers and leveraging opportunities, along with guidance on proactive co-selling to align your goals with Microsoft's for sustained growth.

title: Activating the channel opportunity through the marketplace
description: The Microsoft commercial marketplace supports every partner in meeting customer’s cloud needs through a variety of dealmaking scenarios. Discover how to activate the ecosystem with partner-to-partner selling opportunities. Get guidance on additional ways to monetize with features like multiparty private offers and professional services that boost marketplace success.
speakerNames: Alison Buggia, Robert Phillips, Jason Rook

title: Putting security first!
description: The session covers the status of security on the Microsoft partners’ channel. With SFI, Microsoft has put security first and this is an opportunity to learn more about our approach, what is changing and how partners can benefit from a security first approach.
speakerNames: Julie Gray, Naj Shahid, Gina Yong

title: Grow your business with Microsoft AI Cloud Partner Program
description: The Microsoft AI Cloud Partner Program unharnesses the power of what we can do when we deliver together. Join us to learn what's coming in the year ahead and how to create success in this rapidly expanding addressable market.

title: Accelerate Growth through Partner Incentives
description: In this session we explore the significant investments available to partners in FY25. Learn more about our FY25 incentives portfolio strategy to discover how you can take advantage of these offerings and grow your business.​​

title: Tapping into the SMC market opportunity
description: Join Kevin Peesker, President WW SMC and Alex Babakoff, GM WW SMC Strategy to discuss the opportunity for partners in our mid and small market segment.  We will outline how we have organized our teams for optimal success and coselling, increased incentives and resources available for partners to drive repeatable business and profitability.  Learn from leaders showcasing our "Together We Thrive" Microsoft + customer + partner wins.
speakerNames: Carissa Allen, Alex Babakoff, Kevin Peesker

title: What’s new in ISV Success - AI benefits for software companies and more
description: Learn about ISV Success’ new AI benefits and cash incentives designed to help you build innovative AI experiences, provide hands-on technical guidance and grow your business globally through marketplace. Hear how other companies are using these benefits to develop differentiated apps and reach new customers.

title: Intentionally inclusive: Co-creating products and experiences to make the impossible, possible—for everyone
description: To design transformative technology that solves unmet and unarticulated needs for every person on the planet, we must begin and end with inclusion. In this conversation with Microsoft’s Chief Accessibility Officer and Microsoft’s Chief Diversity Officer and CVP of Talent and Learning, explore how inclusion is driving innovation in this unprecedented era of AI through product design, talent motions, community partnerships, cultural preservation, employee experiences, and more.

title: Strategies for Enterprises to Fast-Track AI Adoption
description: Join us for an insightful fireside chat on strategies and methods from industry leading startups who have worked hand in hand with global Enterprises to expedite the integration and widespread use of artificial intelligence across various industries. This session will explore innovative approaches, practical steps, and potential challenges that Enterprises might encounter in their journey to harness the power of AI.
speakerNames: Shlomi Avigdor, Surojit Chatterjee, Tom Davis, Gil Perry

title: Implementing AI Responsibly and Securely
description: Designed to bring together AI enthusiasts, enterprise leaders, startup founders, data scientists, and security experts. The session will explore AI implementation in enterprises, sharing real-world examples and strategies for overcoming challenges. It will also address startup-specific issues like limited resources, ethical considerations, and building scalable AI solutions, offering practical tips. Additionally, the session will cover planning and executing AI projects, emphasizing clear objectives, collaboration, and continuous improvement. It will highlight the importance of ethical and secure AI, focusing on fairness, accountability, transparency, and robust security measures.
speakerNames: Annie Pearl, Sam Dover, Adriano Koshiyama, Kevin Magee, Tahseen Shabab

title: 10,000 organizations want to talk to you about Copilot
description: In this session, we'll meet you where you are in your AI journey by sharing what we've learned and help you sidestep common issues with your Copilot for Microsoft 365 rollout. CDW brings their insights from realizing amazing outcomes of 10,000 organizations by supporting their subscription needs. We are also a solution provider with over a dozen Delivery Consultants and Adoption Specialists who have engaged on over 200 engagements around Copilot for Microsoft 365 readiness and deployment.

title: Explore everything infrastructure with AMD EPYC on Azure
description: Since 2019, AMD and Microsoft have partnered to enhance computing on Azure. Join us to explore how AMD EPYC™ CPUs can advance your infrastructure, covering general purpose, confidential computing, storage, visualization, and high-performance computing. Discover how upgrading to AMD EPYC CPU-based VMs on Azure can save costs, accommodate AI workloads, safeguard confidential data, and maximize cloud performance.

title: Efficiently process complex AI workloads with ND MI300X v5 technology
description: Join us for an in-depth exploration of the Azure ND MI300X v5 VM series, a groundbreaking addition to Azure’s AI infrastructure. This session will highlight how these VMs, equipped with industry-leading high-bandwidth memory (HBM) and exceptional compute performance, are designed to meet the demands of advanced AI workflows. Discover how the ND MI300X v5 series accelerates innovation by enabling fast and efficient processing of complex AI models workloads.

title: Lead in AI's next wave with future focused ArrowSphere Assistant
description: Revolutionize your cloud business with Arrow. Witness AI-powered innovation transforming partner operations today. Discover ArrowSphere Assistant: our Azure-powered AI turns weeks into minutes: boosting sales, security, and cost efficiency. Be first to explore features redefining the industry. Uncover hidden opportunities and amplify your potential. Don't just adapt to the future—shape it. Experience the next evolution in cloud management making waves across the channel. #ArrowSphere

title: Unlock the growth gear for SMBs
description: Discover how to become the Partner of the Future with the Microsoft AI Cloud Partner Program. Learn strategies and tactics winners use to grow revenues and reduce costs in their Microsoft Cloud Practice. Get the keys to maximizing the return on your investments, futureproofing your business and creating true differentiation from your competitors.
speakerNames: Jan Jofra, Dan Rippey, Ana Stranaghan

title: Unleash unified security and observability with Splunk on Azure
description: Risk and the complexity of IT environments are ever-increasing. Unified visibility is key to quickly addressing threats and troubleshooting issues across your entire stack to ensure that when issues occur, your business and end users are affected as little as possible. This talk will explore how Splunk’s Unified Security and Observability Platform accelerates detection, investigation, and response enabling digital resilience on Microsoft Azure to unlock more value from your cloud.

title: Exploring the future of AI with multi-agent systems and LLMs in action
description: Join us to dive into the latest advancements in AI, focusing on two transformative technologies: agent-based systems and LLMs. We will break down how AI agents work together to solve complex problems and share insights into the future of AI, with a live demo of an end-to-end decision augmentation use case from scratch with Cognizant's agent-based platform, Neuro AI.

title: Dell and Microsoft AI solutions from device to datacenter and cloud
description: Discover how Microsoft and Dell transform living, working, and business securely. Learn about the Dell AI Factory and our approach for fast, repeatable outcomes through AI-ready products, solutions, and services from desktop to cloud. Explore flexible hybrid cloud strategies with Dell’s storage software and Microsoft Azure, prioritizing efficiency and security. Enhance your workflow with Dell Latitude Copilot+ PCs featuring unique AI Windows features, top performance, and long battery life.

title: Optimize Azure cloud operations with end-to-end IT automation
description: The average enterprise today uses multiple clouds and manages thousands of physical assets while generative AI is predicted to create over 1 billion new applications. This growing complexity, combined with limited visibility across systems and distributed workforces, leads to inefficiencies, increased risk, and waste. In this session, hear from clients and experts on how to gain end-to-end visibility, reduce complexity, and manage tech spend with the Apptio portfolio, Turbonomic and Instana.

title: Imagine, adopt, and succeed with Insight’s AI Design Framework
description: Don’t hypothesize how AI can improve business outcomes — make it happen. Learn how other companies are already creating value from AI, and the steps they took to get there, with Microsoft and a top generative AI partner, Insight.  In this interactive session, expert AI practitioner Meagan Gentry will lay the foundation for a high-impact AI roadmap that delivers repeatable business value and high ROI.

title: You’ve been breached, now what? Recover fast and minimize impact
description: You’ve likely made good investments in cyber security defense, but do your teams know what to do if a breach occurred? A cyberattack is not a matter of “if” but “when.” Insight CISO Jeremy Nelson steps through the best practices and disciplines to prepare your teams for calm, swift recovery after an incident. You’ll learn how to scale your security response at mass — and how to keep the impacts of a breach to a minimum.

title: Accelerating real-world AI for today and tomorrow
description: AI is revolutionizing how we work and play from everyday shopping experiences to scaling AI innovations across the enterprise. Learn how advancing hardware, software and solutions can help accelerate your AI initiatives from AI PCs to the data center and cloud. This expert panel will explore real-world use cases and demonstrate how AI can be securely and efficiently deployed with the power, flexibility and performance you need today and how advances in AI will help drive solutions in the future.
speakerNames: Nuri Cankaya, Brian Rogers, Saurabh Tangri, Jeff Woolsey

title: Imagine the future of edge computing and prepare for the AI revolution
description: The future of AI is at the Edge, where data generation is booming. As more data is generated at the Edge, it’s essential to equip our customers and partners with the right solutions to help their businesses thrive. Sustainability, environmental, form factor, security, flexibility, management, and ruggedness are key factors to the success of implementing AI at the Edge. With Lenovo and Microsoft “The Art of Possible is at The Edge” Let’s innovate together!

title: Harness the power of RTX AI PCs to elevate next-gen AI applications
description: NVIDIA RTX AI provides an end-to-end, GPU-accelerated platform for building and deploying state-of-the-art AI models and applications across PC and cloud. Developers can use RTX to build on-device AI that keeps your data and applications private, while tapping into the power of AI on your PC. This talk will showcase and guide developers on the end-to-end suite of tools to streamline development and deploy outstandingly fast, AI-enabled applications for the 100M+ Windows RTX PCs.

title: The new era of industrial digitalization and manufacturing innovation
description: Join Microsoft and NVIDIA experts to learn how the latest advancements in computer graphics, data interoperability, generative AI, and accelerated cloud computing are enabling manufacturers to digitalize their operations. Explore how Azure IoT Operations, powered by NVIDIA Omniverse Cloud APIs and OpenUSD, equips enterprise developers and operations teams with new real-time monitoring, collaboration, and physically-based visualization capabilities to gain new insights into production.
speakerNames: Drew Dudek, Sean Parham, Ganesh Sivaraman

title: Embrace the opportunities of the AI-enabled partner of the future
description: Explore AI's transformative potential for partners with Pax8 experts David Powell and Eric Stevens. Discuss AI's role in security, Marketplace enhancements, and future partner empowerment. A fireside chat will cover practical applications and the vision for AI-enabled partners by 2026. Gain insights into leveraging AI for strategic advantages and future trends.

title: Revolutionizing customer experience with Azure TTS Avatar and OpenAI
description: Uncover how CDW harnessed the power of Azure TTS Avatar, Azure OpenAI, and agentic architecture to deliver an unparalleled customer experience. Learn about our innovative solution, showcased at a live event, enabling customers to effortlessly order coffee through natural language interactions. Witness the fusion of Large Language Models (LLMs) with Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) for real-time, contextually rich responses to CDW-related inquiries.

title: Get from pilot to production the quick, easy, optimized way
description: Explore the latest development of NVIDIA NIM microservices within Azure AI Studio to help get your generative AI application into production successfully. We will share how NVIDIA and Microsoft's joint advanced AI capabilites, streamline workflows, and enhance performance. Hear from NVIDIA and Microsoft experts and see first hand the latest features available to help you get from pilot to production the quick and easy way.

title: Accelerate generative AI adoption with NVIDIA AI on Azure
description: Discover how enterprises can leverage the NVIDIA accelerated computing platform on Azure to transform business with Generative AI. Explore the full spectrum of the NVIDIA AI platform, Discover how enterprises can leverage the NVIDIA accelerated computing platform on Azure to transform business with Generative AI. Explore the full spectrum of the NVIDIA AI platform, featuring cutting-edge infrastructure that delivers high-level performance and offers confidential computing capabilities to secure AI workloads. Learn how these solutions, along with enterprise-grade software and services, optimize performance, reduce TCO, and accelerate time-to-solution.

title: Driving Growth Together
description: Join Judson Althoff, Nick Parker, Nicole Dezen, as they discuss how Microsoft is investing for partner success, new opportunities for partners to accelerate growth and help customers with AI transformation.
speakerNames: Judson Althoff, Nicole Dezen, Nick Parker

title: Microsoft Ignite Keynote
description: Satya Nadella and Microsoft leaders share how Microsoft is creating new opportunity across our platforms in this era of AI.
speakerNames: Charlie Bell, Scott Guthrie, Rajesh Jha, Satya Nadella

title: Build a multi-agent AI assistant with Azure OpenAI
description: In this workshop attendees will be introduced to the concept of Agents, combining thought and action using LLMs and tools to achieve a desired goal. Participants will learn how to build a Python app that takes a topic and instruction from a user, and then calls four agents (a Web research agent, a product information agent, a writer agent, and an editor agent) to refine the article that's finally presented to the user.

title: Build a retail copilot code-first with Azure AI Studio
description:
In this lab, attendees will be introduced to the concept of GenAIOps, and learn to build a custom RAG-based retail copilot end-to-end, code-first on the Azure AI platform.

Using the provided sample, attendees learn to prototype, evaluate and deploy a customer support chat AI for a retailer. The sample uses a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture to implement a retail copilot solution that responds to customer queries with answers grounded in the product catalog and customer data.

title: Interacting with multimodal Generative AI models
description: Innovate with Azure OpenAI's GPT-4o multimodal model in this hands-on experience. Learn the core concepts to and best practices to effectively generate with text, sound and images. Create AI assistants with function calling that enhance user experiences and drive innovation.

title: Unlock AI potential with fine-tuning strategies for SLMs and LLMs
description: This lab introduces the concept of fine-tuning for pre-trained language models for both large and small language models such as Phi and Azure OpenAI, explores the benefits and challenges of this approach, and provides guidance on when and how to use fine tuning to improve the performance of your generative AI models.
speakerNames: Kinfey Lo, Graeme Malcolm, Lee Stott

title: Assess apps with Azure Migrate and replatform to Azure App Service
description: Join us at Ignite for an immersive lab experience where you'll learn how to assess your applications using Azure Migrate and replatform them to Azure App Service. This session will guide you through the process of discovering your app, accessing your app, and leverage GitHub integrated code remediation capability in Azure Migrate to refactor the code and replatform to Azure App Service. Don't miss this opportunity to transform your app landscape and unlock new potential with Azure
speakerNames: Mayank Jain, Yutang Lin, Gaurav Seth

title: Build intelligent Apps with Azure Functions and Azure OpenAI
description: Learn how to build an intelligent application that summarizes audio files using Azure Functions and Azure OpenAI. You'll utilize the new Flex Consumption tier of Azure Functions, which provides a flexible and secure way to run serverless workloads. You'll leverage Cognitive Services and OpenAI to transcribe audio files into text and generate summaries from the transcribed text. All communication will be secured using managed identities and Role-Based Access Control (RBAC).
speakerNames: Damien Aicheh, Iheb Khemissi, Aarthi Murugan

title: Found means fixed: Diminish security debt with GitHub Advanced Security
description: Leverage GitHub Advanced Security (GHAS) to bolster the security posture of your GitHub repositories. Through a series of tasks, you will explore and learn about enabling, configuring, and managing security features across various tasks, such as secret scanning, dependency scanning, and code scanning. See how AI-assisted security can assess your codebases, prioritizes the most critical fixes, generates suggestions for each fix, and helps you strategize remediation into manageable sprints.

title: Integrate GenAI capabilities into your .NET apps with minimal code changes
description: Create applications on Azure App Service that incorporate generative AI features, including Azure OpenAI LLM and SLM models. In this lab, you'll develop an application that utilizes Phi-3, a family of open AI small-language models by Microsoft. You will learn how to make the language model work with your organizational data. You'll leave with strategies to modernize your applications by incorporating new features such as observability and caching using the benefits of a fully managed PaaS.
speakerNames: Tulika Chaudharie, Stefan Schackow, Gaurav Seth

title: Making cloud deployment easier with GitHub Copilot for Azure
description:
Gain a comprehensive understanding of GitHub Copilot for Azure through three key phases: learning, deployment, and troubleshooting.
Learning: Master foundational concepts and best practices to enhance coding efficiency.
Deployment: Implement applications on Azure with seamless integration and scalability.
Troubleshooting: Use advanced tools to diagnose and resolve issues, ensuring reliable performance.
You’ll confidently build, deploy, and maintain high-quality applications.

title: Put the guardrail in 'self-serve with guardrails' with Microsoft Dev Box
description: This lab will guide you through how to deploy Microsoft Dev Box for your development teams. To begin, we’ll look at what sets Dev Box apart from other VDI services in terms of developers self-service, ready-to-code environments. Then, you’ll build a deployment from the ground up and explore patterns for configuring networks, strategies for securely customizing dev boxes, and more. Leave with a clear understanding of what's possible and what's required to bring Dev Box to your organization.

title: Streamline operations and developer onboarding with AKS Automatic
description: Are you looking for ways to automate many administrative tasks in Kubernetes and make it easier for development teams to deploy their apps while maintaining security and compliance? Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) Automatic is a new mode of operation for AKS that simplifies cluster management, reduces manual tasks, and builds in enterprise-grade best practices and policy enforcement. This session is perfect for platform operators and DevOps engineers looking to get started with AKS Automatic.

title: Build new AI applications with Azure SQL Database
description: Join us for a hands-on workshop showcasing the latest Azure SQL innovations to supercharge your applications. Learn how to harness generative AI alongside Azure SQL Database to elevate your data strategies with AI concepts like language models, prompt engineering, Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and streamline with Microsoft Copilot. Whether you're a developer, architect, or IT professional, this workshop is your ticket to mastering SQL and AI to stay ahead in the data-driven landscape.

title: Empowering data developers: Crafting adaptable custom logic and APIs
description: Are you looking to build and reuse custom business logic in your intelligent applications' medallion architecture? In this lab, you’ll get hands-on experience with common patterns in building intelligent data applications in Fabric. Learn to create, implement, and integrate custom business logic using Python user-defined functions and build flexible APIs for accessing Fabric data via GraphQL. Elevate your skills and transform your data solutions!

title: Get real with Real-Time Intelligence to transform data into action
description: Dive into the world of Real-Time Intelligence with our hands-on lab designed to equip you with practical skills essential for today's data-driven landscape. Learn how to connect to real-time data streams, capture and transform data, explore and query the data, and visualize insights. Discover how to turn these insights into actionable strategies. By the end of this lab, you'll be able to implement solutions that enhance your business's ability to drive impactful action.

title: Elevate your data workflow with Microsoft Fabric, Copilot, and Azure Databricks
description: Get ready to unlock your data’s potential in this interactive lab session focused on data ingestion, transformation, and analytics, equipping you to implement your own robust data solutions for growth. You’ll harness advanced data processing to drive efficiency and utilize AI-driven assistance for productivity and decision-making. By the end of the lab, you’ll be equipped to implement robust data solutions for growth, enhancing your skills to handle complex data scenarios.

title: Serverless GenAI Apps with Semantic Kernel, Azure Cosmos DB & .NET Aspire
description: In this hands-on lab, participants will build serverless AI agent-based, RAG applications using .NET Aspire, Semantic Kernel and Azure Cosmos DB's vector with DiskANN and full-text search capabilities! Designed for C# developers, attendees will learn how to implement Semantic Kernel OpenAI Plug-ins, NoSQL connectors, semantic caching, agents and more! Gain practical insights into how to design, build, deploy and scale RAG pattern applications in Azure!

title: Transform your apps with AI-driven features for PostgreSQL
description: This immersive lab session with the Microsoft PostgreSQL team will show you how to revolutionize your applications using the AI capabilities integrated into Azure Database for PostgreSQL. Dive deep into features like vector indexing, Azure AI extensions, in-database embedding generation, and more. By leveraging Azure Database for PostgreSQL, you'll benefit from robust performance, scalability, and security, ensuring your applications run smoothly and efficiently.

title: Accelerate Windows Server modernization and migration with Azure Arc
description: Learn best practices for creating a business case to migrate, secure and manage your Windows, SQL and Linux servers running anywhere. In this demo, we’ll create a business case for both migrating and modernizing in place your most business critical workloads with Azure Arc and Azure Migrate.

title: Fast track your Linux migration journey with Azure Migrate
description: Embark on a seamless journey to migrate your Linux workloads to Azure with this hands-on lab session. This session is designed for IT professionals and cloud enthusiasts looking to accelerate their migration projects. Discover how Azure Migrate simplifies the migration process, from assessment to optimization. You’ll gain practical experience with tools and best practices that ensure a smooth transition, minimize downtime, and enhance performance.

title: Hands on using Azure services securely with Azure VMware Solution
description: Use your existing skillsets while adopting new cloud competencies when you switch from on-premises VMware to Azure VMware Solution (AVS). This lab will guide you through the entire process, from migration to innovation. You’ll gain hands-on experience in setting up networking between AVS and Azure services to establish secure and private access. You’ll also learn how to AI-enable your existing VMware applications by leveraging proximity to Microsoft’s leading data and AI services.

title: Leverage Azure availability zones for your critical workloads
description: During this hands-on lab session, participants will learn to apply architectural best practices for multi-zonal and multi-regional redundancy in their critical workloads. You will rearchitect a Contoso workload by reviewing architectural decisions and implications under the technical expertise of a Microsoft Sr. Cloud Solution Architect. Gain the skills you need to start resilient and stay resilient.

title: Securing and managing mission critical Windows Servers with Arc
description: Implement best practices for managing and governing your Windows Servers with Azure Arc’s Hybrid management capabilities around Security, Governance, Policy and infrastructure management. In this lab you will learn how to enable your critical Arc solutions such as Microsoft Defender, Azure Update Manager and Machine Config and leverage Azure CoPilot to get deep insights.

title: Build and extend agents with Microsoft Copilot studio
description: Get hands on with Copilot Studio and learn how to build and publish your own custom agent. You’ll also see how with Visual Studio you can create custom connectors to integrate with your line of business systems.

title: Build an agent with your enterprise knowledge in Copilot Studio
description: Learn how to build an agent in low code that will consume existing business data stored in Microsoft Dataverse, and add uploaded files, to provide quick access to important information for natural language queries. Then understand how to share the agent to ensure appropriate access control for intended users across your organization.

title: Mastering Enterprise Website building with Power Pages
description: Learn to build Power Pages sites from the Power CAT experts. Take your skills well beyond the self-paced Power Pages in a Day course by diving into complex business processes using Multi-Step Forms, add font-end code, APIs and server-side logic. Learn from requirements-based tasks. You will use Power Pages Studio, Visual Studio Code, Power Platform CLI, Pages Web API, Liquid code, JavaScript, and more. Walk away armed to take on real-world projects. Understand applicable architecture patterns.

title: Mastering Model-Driven Power Apps
description:
Welcome to our workshop on mastering building model-driven Power Apps! 
This hands-on workshop is designed to empower you with the skills and knowledge to create sophisticated, data-driven applications with ease. By the end of the session, you’ll be equipped to transform your ideas into copilot-enabled functional apps that will delight end users. Join us for an exciting journey into the world of modern app development!
speakerNames: Nick Doelman, April Dunnam, Angeliki Patsiavou

title: Build real-time collab experiences with Fluid and Copilot
description: Join us to learn how you can develop AI/Copilot-charged real-time collaborative experiences with Fluid Framework. Fluid Framework has been powering real-time collab in Microsoft experiences like Microsoft Loop, Teams Live Share and Power Platform. At Build, we announced Fluid Framework 2 that includes our most flexible data model called SharedTree. In this session, we will cover improvements to SharedTree and preview new Fluid AI and Presence APIs to build apps with SharePoint Embedded.

title: Code-first development workshop for Copilot agents
description: Get hands-on experience integrating Copilot agents into Microsoft 365 and connecting them seamlessly into your Teams and Microsoft 365 Copilot workflows. We will cover everything you need to know about code-first development in Visual Studio Code, equipping you to create both custom and Copilot agents. Join this session to be a forward-thinking developer who will walk away with the ability to transform work experiences with groundbreaking agent technology.

title: Build scoped, secure Copilot agents in a few clicks
description: Learn how to enable secure AI adoption with your users that provides you governance-friendly options to drive AI-powered productivity and collaboration. This session introduces you to Copilot agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot and SharePoint, a new way to create tailored Copilot experiences in just a few clicks. Learn how to customize Copilot agents scoped to selected data, for specific projects, teams, or for the entire organization.

title: Hands on with Windows 11 & cloud-native management
description: With Windows 10 EOS just a year away, we want to help you jump-start Windows 11 upgrades and cloud-native management projects as a joint effort. This technical skilling lab will help you quickly assess upgrade readiness and contingency planning. Walk away with tangible steps to keep you moving forward in a tightly integrated way with security and productivity at the forefront of your efforts.

title: Microsoft Places: Turn hybrid work into insights
description: Join a hands-on workshop of Microsoft Places, in Public Preview, to learn how to set up your locations, onboard onto Places, and dive into space analytics. Understand how our customers are using Places to enhance workplace collaboration with their hybrid workforce, and experience how AI helps improve team coordination, days in the office, and future workplace planning.

title: Part 1:2 Declarative Agents: Build Agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot
description: In Part 1 of 2, you will use a hands-on development environment featuring Visual Studio Code to build, test, and publish declarative agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot to infuse AI-powered enhancements directly into your organization’s workflows. Get practical experience and enhance productivity with declarative agents, delving deeper into instructions, data, actions and the developer tooling. Perfect for developers eager to leverage Microsoft 365 Copilot’s extensibility and agentic capabilities.

title: Part 2:2 Custom Engine Agents-Build Agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot
description: In Part 2 of 2you will use a hands-on environment with Visual Studio Code, Azure AI Studio etc. to learn to build, test, and publish custom engine agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot enabling customizable AI enhancements directly into your organization’s workflows. This lab offers a step-by-step guide to build custom engine agents, delving deeper into language models, instructions, data, actions and the tooling. Perfect for developers wanting to add custom AI functionality to Microsoft 365 Copilot.

title: Part 1:2 Build AI into your apps with Microsoft Surface
description: Infuse AI into your business with Microsoft Surface. In Part 1 of this lab, learn how to integrate AI-backed APIs from the Windows Copilot Library and target NPUs for enhanced performance and privacy. Gain hands-on knowledge by integrating AI directly on a Surface Copilot+ PC. Be sure to attend Part 2 (LAB448) to gain the full experience!

title: Rapid and secure provisioning of Windows 365 Cloud PCs
description: Discover how to set up a fully functional Windows 365 Cloud PC equipped with Microsoft 365 so that your employees can be immediately productive. This lab provides detailed walkthroughs on configuring provisioning policies using Microsoft Hosted Network and Entra Joined Devices. By following these steps, you can achieve rapid and secure Windows 365 provisioning, ensuring that your end users can swiftly collaborate across Teams and Microsoft 365 applications.

title: Simplify Microsoft Teams management with Copilot
description: Teams admins are being asked to do more than ever - balancing the management of their organization's communication and collaboration, all while helping their employees leverage Copilot.  Learn how Copilot and new reporting tools can help admins securely manage and optimize organization-wide Teams configurations. This live interactive tutorial will illustrate how Teams gives admins greater insights into their tenant health, scaling management and end user protection.

title: Using Windows 11 to land Copilot & AI experiences
description: With so many new Copilot and AI experiences landing across the suite of Microsoft products, there's no better place to start than with Windows 11. We'll examine prescriptive "aha!" how-to's that show critical business value and show you how to thoughtfully incorporate emerging technologies like Copilot into your hardware refresh cycle.

title: Getting started with Microsoft Sentinel
description: In this session you will get hands on experience configuring your Microsoft Sentinel environment, building queries and detections and using them to perform an investigation.

title: Improve your organization's security posture with Microsoft Intune
description: It is important to keep managed devices secure and up to date while helping to protect data from compromised devices. In this skilling lab you can effectively configure security policies in Intune to improve compliance across all your endpoints, get AI assistance with Copilot during incident investigation and integrate with Microsoft products to bring Security and IT teams closer to protect endpoints.

title: Microsoft Cybersecurity Architect Lab – Infrastructure Security
description: Learn how to utilize Microsoft Secure Score to improve your security posture by managing recommendations and delegating actions. Establish secure networking using Azure App Proxy and Entra ID to ensure secure access to file servers using Global Secure Access. Design and implement policies to restrict the storage of company data on unmanaged devices with Data Loss Prevention. Deploy endpoint security baseline policies, antivirus on macOS devices, and encrypt macOS devices to secure endpoints.

title: Mitigate threats using Microsoft Defender for Cloud
description: This lab delves into using Microsoft Defender for Cloud, emphasizing its capabilities in providing robust security for Azure, hybrid cloud, and on-premises workloads. It aims to equip professionals with the skills to manage and protect their cloud environments effectively.

title: Secure Azure services and workloads with Microsoft Defender for Cloud
description: This focuses on mitigating various security risks, including posture and vulnerability management, endpoint security, data protection, and network security. It involves configuring Microsoft Defender for Cloud and enabling just-in-time virtual machine access.

title: Secure your data with Microsoft Purview
description: Learn how to detect, protect, and prevent data loss with Microsoft Purview. Build policies to gain visibility and uncover risk in your entire data estate, and leverage AI-driven insights, analytics, and alerts to hone your security. Understand how to discover, classify, and protect sensitive data with out-of-the-box, automated, or custom data classification. Discover your data’s user activity context to prevent its accidental and unauthorized use and mitigate insider risks.

title: Supercharge your SOC with Microsoft Defender
description: Get a step-by-step walkthrough for Microsoft Defender XDR and learn how to implement key capabilities. Learn how to assign preset security policies for Exchange Online Protection (EOP) and Microsoft Defender for Office 365. Protect your endpoints using Microsoft Defender Endpoint by onboarding devices and configuring roles and device groups. Lastly, dive into the advanced attack mitigation features for your devices using Defender for Endpoint to effectively investigate alerts and incidents.

title: Transform industries with Azure IoT, AI, Edge and operational excellence
description: Join us in a hands-on workshop on industrial and retail transformation. Explore Azure IoT Operations, Kubernetes, and AI-driven solutions like real-time footfall inferencing, intrusion detection, and loss prevention, enhanced by Edge computing. Discover how these innovations, alongside Azure Arc and Microsoft’s adaptive cloud approach, drive operational excellence across industries. Through labs, explore AI and IoT strategies for safer, more efficient, and responsive operations.
speakerNames: Luis Castillo Lopez, Kiana Harris, Muhammad Nabeel, Mike Rhoads

title: Azure Machine Learning and MLOps
description: In this interactive workshop, we will explore how Contoso Bank is leveraging Azure Machine Learning and OpenAI to revolutionize its marketing strategies. The bank, aiming to expand its customer base and improve engagement, is undergoing a significant digital transformation. By integrating Azure Machine Learning, they can analyze historical data to predict which customers are most likely to convert. Azure OpenAI will be used to generate personalized marketing content tailored to these potential customers. This workshop will cover the steps involved in building and deploying these models, automating MLOps for continuous improvement, and retraining models to optimize future campaigns. By the end of the session, you’ll learn how this AI-driven approach empowers businesses like Contoso Bank to enhance customer experience, drive data-driven marketing, and foster growth.

title: SharePoint Advanced Management: What's new and next
description: SharePoint Advanced Management is an essential add-on for Microsoft 365 that equips IT administrators with a powerful suite of tools to bolster content governance throughout their Microsoft Copilot deployment journey. In this session learn about the benefits of SharePoint Advanced Management, what's new, and what's next to help accelerate your data governance journey in the era of AI.

title: Business continuity with fast backup and recovery
description: When disaster strikes, you need to recover in hours - not days or months. Come learn how Microsoft 365 Backup delivers high-performance backup and recovery solutions for critical active data across OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange. We'll also show you how you can use Microsoft 365 Archive as a cost-effective solution for long-term storage of your SharePoint content without compromising on manageability, security, or compliance standards.

title: Are you ready for Office 2016/2019 end of support?
description:
Microsoft 365 has seen nearly a decade of innovation since the launch of Office 2016, which is retiring next year along with Office 2019. Security risks and other issues can arise by continuing to use unsupported software.
This session will share what's new and how to navigate your organization's transition, as more than a dozen Office and Windows products approach end of support in 2025.

title: AI for the Public Sector with M365 Copilot GCC
description: Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC is coming to US Public Sector customers in the GCC (Government Community Cloud) environment. Come explore how Copilot will support public sector leaders and strategists as the next-generation tool for mission success. This session will focus on the role of AI in Public sector, product details, public sector use cases, responsible AI practices and data privacy, and next steps to prepare your public sector agency for mission success with Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC

title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: a power-user masterclass
description: Join us for an insider's guide to maximizing your use of Copilot within Microsoft 365 apps: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and more. In this session, Microsoft employees will share common scenarios in which they use Copilot in their daily work, along with best practices. Discover how to leverage Copilot to enhance productivity and streamline your workflow. Don't miss this opportunity to learn how Copilot can be your daily work assistant.

title: Measure AI adoption and value with Copilot Dashboard
description: As organizations increasingly adopt AI-driven tools, understanding their impact and optimizing their usage becomes crucial. Discover how to use the Microsoft Copilot Dashboard to improve adoption and impact across your organization. Dive deeper with advanced reporting in Viva Insights to create custom reports, analyze trends, and measure business outcomes associated with Copilot usage. This session is designed for analysts and leaders who want to maximize the value of their Copilot investment.

title: What’s next with the new Outlook for Windows
description: Dive into the latest updates on the new Outlook roadmap, where we will talk about how we are bringing the best of the classic app into modern, agile architecture. We'll share an update on timelines and our efforts on how we are helping prepare for organizations to migrate.

title: New AI-powered innovations in Microsoft Teams
description: Join us for a session where we explore the latest product innovations in Microsoft Teams Phone, Teams Rooms, and Teams Premium. Discover new AI capabilities that can help your team work together effectively across all the ways you communicate in Teams. Learn how you can enable efficient call handling and customer engagement, maximize engagement through immersive events, and overcome hybrid work challenges with intelligent workplace solutions.

title: Microsoft Teams: new chat and channels experience
description: In today’s fast-paced digital world, communicating and collaborating effectively is more important than ever. We’ve reimagined the chat and channels experience in Microsoft Teams to help you collaborate more efficiently and effectively. Join us to learn more about this streamlined experience and how you can organize conversations your way.

title: A new AI-powered calendar for a flexible workplace
description: Reimagine how and where you work with Microsoft 365 Copilot, Teams, Outlook, and Places. Discover how our latest innovations come together to increase coordination, enhance collaboration, and optimize spaces in the workplace of the future. Learn how to seamlessly manage your schedule to maximize connections by ensuring you are in the right place, at the right time, with the right people, and how to make every one of those connections as collaborative and inclusive as possible.
speakerNames: Mark Grimaldi, Vani Soff, MAHESH SRIDHARAN

title: Employee communications for the AI workforce
description: Discover how communications solutions in Microsoft Viva are revolutionizing the way leaders manage change, roll out AI, and coordinate company campaigns. Learn how these cutting-edge tools are driving technology adoption and unlocking knowledge sharing across your entire organization, from the C-Suite to the frontline. We'll explore real-world product scenarios, share practical examples of driving business outcomes, and unveil the latest integrations and roadmap.

title: Windows 11 security and resiliency
description: Learn how Windows 11 secures your organization now, and in the future. We'll focus on Safe Deployment Practices, security baselines, secured-core PCs and new tools and features that ensure you stay up and running in today's ever-changing cyberthread environment.

title: What's new and what's next for Azure Virtual Desktop
description: Explore the latest updates, both recently released and upcoming, designed to help you optimize your Azure Virtual Desktop deployment, deliver the best user experience, and enhance the security and scalability of your virtual environments.

title: Responsible AI Innovation on Windows Copilot+ PCs
description: Every company needs to comply with laws and regulations while delighting customers with new and beneficial AI-powered experiences. This session gives an overview of the Windows approach to responsible innovation. Ben and Michael share how this approach—spanning privacy, security, digital safety, fairness, transparency, accountability—shapes the entire development and deployment process, as well as the latest advances, examples, and best practices for responsible innovation with AI Copilot+ PCs.

title: Universal Print: Print from anywhere - literally.
description: Although the idea of “print from anywhere” might seem ambitious, Universal Print makes it a reality. With support for everything from Windows and macOS to mobile devices and anything with web connectivity, you can print securely from anywhere. Microsoft's cloud printing solution not only removes the need for on-premise print servers, but it also helps secure your endpoints and offers safe serverless printing from any device. Listen in and learn how Universal Print is truly "universal".

title: Embark, monitor, and manage your journey with Microsoft Dev Box!
description: In a fast-paced environment, it’s critical to know how to effectively manage and monitor development resources. Discover how you can set up dev teams for seamless onboarding experiences and find out how to monitor enterprise-wide usage, connectivity, and key metrics with Dev Box. Gain insights from telemetry to make the right decisions for your enterprise, whether it's increasing capacity, controlling costs, or expanding into new regions. Do what's best for your team with Microsoft Dev Box.

title: Edge for Business: safeguard against cyber threats and AI risks
description: Edge for Business is more than just a browser—it’s a complete security and productivity solution. As a secure enterprise browser, optimized for AI, it leverages the comprehensive tools included in your Microsoft 365 subscription to ensure your enterprise stays protected against today’s threats, without sacrificing productivity. And with generative AI powered by Copilot built in, you can safely equip your organization for the future. Tune in to learn the latest advancements in Edge for Business.

title: Communications transformed by Copilot
description: Leveraging Copilot as a differentiator to further build out and accelerate your Converged Communications business. AI is driving a foundational shift in collaboration, how can you use this to grow your strategic footprint, services and market share in customers.  What are those key pillars that you will need to take this advantage and what are the tools and programs that will support you. Listen to some partners that have been early to embrace and their perspectives.
