speakerNames: CYNTHIA BATZLI, Alexander Oddoz-mazet, Leon Wright

title: Unleashing the power of Agentic AI for data
description: Discover how Agentic AI is revolutionizing data-driven decision-making! In this video, we explore how AI agents autonomously manage, analyse, and optimize data workflows, unlocking unprecedented insights and efficiency. From solving problems like data virtualization and data quality to business intelligence and predictive analytics, learn how this cutting-edge technology is reshaping the future of AI-powered data management.

title: Turn the tables with GenAI on your advanced threat response model
description: Hackers are already using GenAI to punch holes through your proactive IR security defense strategy, causing headaches for CISOs and security teams, and threatening missing-critical applications. In this session, you will learn how Aviatrix has partnered with the Microsoft Copliot for Security team to leverage GenAI and LLM data enrichment from across the Microsoft security landscape to pinpoint potential threats across the entire network and recommend adaptive defensive policies in real-time.

title: Unlock Copilot with Purview data security and BDO Digital
description: Getting productivity advantage from advanced AI tools like Microsoft 365 Copilot requires a solid foundation for simplifying repeat tasks and sparking synthesis. Join BDO to explore where Artificial Intelligence projects flounder in value case development and data security concerns. Prepare the foundation of successful Copilot adoption with a cost efficient, yet robust data security and governance envelope and a solid value realization plan.

title: Boosting your Azure cloud strategy with Nutanix
description: As organizations refine their Azure strategy,  Nutanix simplifies workload migrations and enhances data insights. Nutanix also supports Azure Arc for Kubernetes and data services, further elevating your enterprise cloud strategy. Join us to learn more.

title: Confidential AI with Ubuntu on Azure
description: Enterprises are concerned about data privacy and intellectual property in cloud-based machine learning, which limits the use of valuable private data. Confidential AI provides a hardware-rooted execution environment for CPU and GPU, protecting AI data and code against privileged software. On Microsoft Azure, this uses Ubuntu confidential VMs with AMD 4th Gen EPYC processors and NVIDIA H100 GPUs. Join us to explore memory confidentiality, integrity, and remote attestation in securing AI workloads
speakerNames: Jehudi Castro, Antoine Delignat-Lavaud, Ijlal Loutfi

title: Leveraging AI for better security outcomes
description: Generative AI has already been adopted by your employees. The question is: how will your organization going to meet these challenges? Shadow AI, prompt injection, and data loss are just three of the new risks companies face. This session will provide an overview of the challenges in the modern AI world, how to “fight AI with AI,” and best practices to implement AI-driven security in your organization to stop AI-powered threats, remediate risks, and meet the demands of compliance.

title: Deliver powerful experiences with Citrix, Windows 365, and Azure
description: Ready to deliver cloud desktops to your enterprise? Discover how Citrix unlocks the full potential of Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop. Learn how to protect your business, seamlessly integrate your ecosystem, optimize your budget, and enhance user satisfaction in one powerful session.

title: Operationalize data governance and master data management with GenAI
description: Discover how CluedIn, combined with Microsoft Purview, Microsoft Fabric, and Azure AI Studio, is helping organizations meet the growing demand for secure, governed, high-quality data. In a world first, we’ll be demonstrating how proactive copilots and AI agents are making data governance smarter, easier, and more accessible to the business. We’ll show you how to deliver ready-for-anything data, faster than ever.

title: Understanding & accelerating business decisions for M365 data using AI
description:
Enterprises are leveraging AI to accelerate their business but face challenges integrating diverse, siloed data into AI services. AI models need to be trained on enterprise data spread across multiple environments to deliver valuable insights. The solution- Bring AI to the data wherever it resides. 
Learn how Cohesity with Microsoft Azure OpenAI and NVIDIA generative AI, provides instant, high-quality insights from secondary data, helping businesses address critical questions faster.
speakerNames: Nave Algarici, Stephen Engler, Theresa Miller

title: Protect Microsoft 365 data from cyber attacks
description: Your company has made significant investments in Microsoft 365—through licenses, solutions, and dedicated staff. With growing threats to the Microsoft ecosystem, it's crucial that you understand your role in responding to cyber attacks. Every Microsoft 365 professional needs to be aware of the NIST 2.0 framework and the expectations of your role to ensure a swift, effective defense. In this session, you'll gain key insights to protect your organization and enhance your response to cyber attacks.

title: A future where AI and humans work together with AI, Copilot and agents
description:
Our panel of experts discuss how the convergence of gen AI capabilities, low-code platforms, and RPA are creating opportunities for businesses to innovate and enhance efficiency with advanced CRM and ERP.

Discover how AI is evolving role-based functions with Microsoft Copilot for Sales, Service, and Finance, and how companies leveraging functional Copilots alongside Microsoft Dynamics 365 are driving savings and improving customer satisfaction.
speakerNames: Antonella Candido, Steve Ebrahimi, Vishal Sarkar, Tricia Sinclair

title: Engineer for AI to optimize all your enterprise solutions
description: Enhancing enterprise solutions with cloud, data, and AI.

title: Securing and delivering AI workloads in Azure with F5
description: As organizations increasingly adopt AI to drive innovation and efficiency, securing workloads in cloud environments becomes paramount. F5 solutions on Azure enhances the security and performance of AI applications and solves the unique challenges posed by AI workloads. By leveraging F5’s advanced security features and network delivery, organizations can ensure the integrity and availability of their AI services.

title: Unlock generative AI excellence; Fivetran's Managed Data Lake Service
description: Fivetran’s Managed Data Lake Service, designed for Microsoft destinations like Azure Data Lake Storage and OneLake, offers a scalable foundation for generative AI by providing automated access to centralized, cleansed, and governed data. In this session, you will learn about common barriers in data preparation and management for GenAI workloads, best practices for ensuring your data lake is properly governed, and how our Managed Data Lake Service provides a scalable foundation for GenAI.

title: Give legacy phones a second life in a modern Microsoft Teams world
description: Everyone has some legacy technology in their environment. We get it. So, how do you move into the modern AI-infused Microsoft Teams world while you are getting more use and value from your existing legacy desk phones, conference room systems, and analog (ATA) devices? Do you know how to make this happen? Spoiler alert! We will be talking about firmware updates, about your network’s ability to support a SIP Gateway and more. Join us to hear how to avoid common pitfalls on the path to modern.

title: Modernizing your Infrastructure with HPE Hybrid IT technology
description: In today's ever-evolving IT landscape, we understand timing is everything. To truly power innovation, you need solutions that are easy to deploy, easy to scale, and even easier to manage. From our award-winning rack and tower servers to our industry-defining converged and HCI systems to our networking and edge solutions — Hewlett Packard Enterprise spans from the Edge to the Datacenter to the Cloud to drive Digital Transformation.
speakerNames: Anthony Dutra, Michael Harding, Wendy Harms, Karen Mares

title: Innovation motivation: A pragmatic roadmap for manufacturing's future
description: Manufacturing is at a critical crossroads where challenge and opportunity lie ahead in almost equal measure. But if your business is more focused on figuring out how to adapt rather than understand why change is necessary, you could be asking the wrong questions. Learn how placing renewed focus on learning to innovate beyond silos, increasing accuracy early, and devising new ways to bridge workforce skills gaps and accelerate time to market, can be the key to future success.

title: Unleash the power of AI with Hitachi industry innovations
description: Discover the cutting-edge innovations spearheaded by Hitachi in key industries like Energy, Manufacturing, and Mobility, all driven by the power of Artificial Intelligence. With decades of experience in both Operational Technology (OT) and Information Technology (IT), Hitachi has deep expertise in both. In this session, you will gain insights into real-world applications of AI and explore the latest breakthroughs in GenAI research and development.

title: Deploy next generation technologies today with HP Poly Teams solutions
description:
HP Poly offers a comprehensive range of solutions for Microsoft Teams, designed to enhance collaboration and communication across various work environments. 
•	Meeting Room Solutions: Certified Microsoft Teams Rooms 
•	Audio Solutions: Certified Microsoft Teams Phones 
•	Personal Solutions: Certified Cameras and Headsets  
•	Management and Support Services: Poly Lens Management and HP Managed Collaboration Services

title: Empower the Enterprise with Trusted, GenAI-Ready Data
description: Production-ready enterprise grade gen AI solutions require a trusted data foundation that provides scalability, data quality, seamless data and application integrations, governance and security to deliver relevant, trustworthy and accurate outcomes. In this session, hear from Customers, Microsoft leaders, and Informatica’s team about how Informatica delivers a trusted data foundation for the Era of AI.

title: Building the right data foundations to grow your business with AI
description: Before enterprises can effectively capitalize on new AI technologies, they must first establish the right foundations that support their business goals. This includes creating a strategy to modernize existing applications, data landscapes, and incorporating security/compliance measures from the ground-up. Learn how Kyndryl’s modernization framework and end-to-end services help enterprises prioritize and create a strategy to modernize and integrate new AI capabilities, including generative AI.

title: Simplify RAG with MongoDB Atlas + Azure AI Studio for gen AI apps
description: Embrace Microsoft enabled integration with MongoDB Atlas, a world leader in document databases, in Azure AI Studio. Build gen AI applications that are deeply rooted in your enterprise data in MongoDB Atlas, providing more accurate and richer user experiences. Join this session to learn how to construct exceptional gen AI applications by leveraging the Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) model. Witness a demo of the integration to see the power of data unleashed with advanced AI models.

title: Unleash MongoDB Atlas with Azure for extensive AI-powered integration
description: In this session, we'll explore the latest MongoDB Atlas and Microsoft Azure integrations, providing a high-level understanding of how MongoDB Atlas operates on Azure and integrates with services like Power Apps, Power BI, Microsoft Fabric, Azure Databricks, Azure OpenAI, Azure Virtual Network, and Azure KeyVault to enable developers to build modern, intelligent, secure applications.

title: Eliminate employee friction at work with an enterprise-wide AI agent
description: Learn how technical and business leaders at over 400+ leading organizations are providing their >5 million employees with a single place to find information and take actions across all their enterprise systems, both within and beyond the Microsoft ecosystem. Moveworks’ reasoning-first approach leverages the best stack of LLMs in combination with a novel developer platform to bring a conversational AI agent to your entire company in Teams, Copilot, Sharepoint, or any other collaboration tool.

title: Transform transportation with AI, drive efficiency and satisfaction
description: Join us for a demo on how a leading UK transport organisation transformed its operations with Nasstar's AI Document Intelligence Platform using Microsoft Azure and AI services. This solution reduced costs, streamlined efficiency, and enhanced customer experience by automating tasks and reducing errors. We'll also highlight the partnership between Nasstar & Microsoft, showcasing the technological advancements and innovative solutions that drive operational excellence and customer satisfaction.

title: Future proofing your business with an enterprise data platform
description: In this replay from Nasuni CloudBound24, Nick Burling - Nasuni's SVP of Product - runs viewers through a high-level view on what future-proofing means for leader, why legacy approaches to unstructured data management won’t cut it and how Nasuni on Azure fits in the picture to help businesses future-proof their data strategy! Watch the rest of the conference ON DEMAND at https://registration.nasuni.com/cloudbound-2024/

title: Ensure efficiency, create simplicity, and lower Azure costs with Nerdio
description: Nerdio Manager for Enterprise allows customers to leverage the significant investments Microsoft is making into Azure Virtual Desktop, Intune, and Windows 365 services. Nerdio delivers hundreds of features that simplify management, ensure efficient operations, and lower Azure compute and storage costs by up to 80% via automation. Join us for a demo where we will walk through product features and functionality.

title: Innovate faster and maximize uptime on Azure with New Relic
description: Discover New Relic’s Intelligent Observability platform for Azure! Learn how to monitor & troubleshoot apps, infrastructure & services with automatic relationship mapping, pre-built dashboards & AI-powered anomaly detection. Plus, see a demo of how to get started with New Relic on Azure.

title: Unlock efficiency with process intelligence, automation & app dev
description: Need to consolidate business systems and scale your IT team? Discover how AI-driven automation can boost efficiency, allowing both IT and business analysts to build and manage processes. Streamline work, generate documents, and ensure compliance using a unified platform that integrates with Microsoft and beyond. See a demo of a loan origination process where AI captures current steps and effortlessly automates complex, cross-department workflows, making operations more efficient.

title: Explore Oracle Database@Azure use cases and benefits
description:
Oracle Database@Azure brings the power and versatility of Oracle Database services running on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) 
inside Microsoft Azure data centers, simplifying the cloud migration of latency sensitive applications. This session will explore use cases from early adopters and the benefits of this multicloud partnership, including the flexibility to use existing Azure investments to run Oracle Exadata Database Service and Autonomous Database natively in Azure.

title: How Pure Storage optimizes migrating to Azure VMware solution
description: Azure VMware Solution (AVS) lets you seamlessly run VMware environments in the cloud. Join us to explore how Pure Storage takes AVS to the next level by decoupling storage and compute, giving you the freedom to scale efficiently. Discover how this flexibility leads to smarter resource usage, reduced complexity, and significant cost savings—so you can get more out of your VMware cloud environment.

title: Automating the enterprise with AI Agents in action
description: Join Rackspace as we explore the "Power of Three", Microsoft Co-pilot in Power Platform, Microsoft 365, and Azure OpenAI. Through real-world use cases, discover the potential of agent-based solutions, using conversational AI assistants to revolutionize knowledge management, customer service, and business process automation that can integrate, retrieve, and act on data securely from diverse enterprise systems. See Rackspace Intelligent Technology Assistant (RITA) in action.

title: Integrating Gen AI into business-ready applications to accelerate ROI
description: This session is a deeper dive into Red Hat discussion on the use of Generative AI code translation/transformation enabling the modernization of legacy applications with the ML/Ops and DevOps pipeline integration of Red Hat OpenShift for DevOps with Azure AI, OpenShift AI and Watsonx offerings to accelerate application delivery.

title: Redefining virtualization with the Alternative VM platform you seek
description: Industry changes have prompted demand for alternative virtualization solutions. Breakthroughs in AIOPs and next-gen hyperconvergence can offer legacy VM users of all sizes increased efficiencies at lower costs. Scale Computing is the top-rated VM alternative for end-users and channel partners alike. Learn how easy it is to migrate to a new platform, on-prem or at the edge, with integrated high availability, disaster recovery, and remote management – delivered at price points suitable for all.

title: Smarter workflows with ServiceNow Now Assist and Copilot integration
description: Discover the integration between ServiceNow Now Assist and Microsoft Copilot. Experience firsthand how these powerful GenAI assistants come together to empower employees, enabling them to complete everyday tasks effortlessly. Maximize productivity with Now Assist’s ability to understand the user’s intent and automatically drive actions in Microsoft Copilot. Join us to see how this dynamic duo transforms productivity!

title: Artificial intelligence and the Microsoft ecoverse
description: Join SHI as we explore Microsoft's AI ecosystem, discussing how Copilot boosts productivity, low-code enables customization of models and agents, and Azure OpenAI addresses complexities. While these tools provide substantial benefits, they require a shift in thinking and habits. We'll highlight how visibility into your data estate can enhance data management, security, and value. Discover insights to implement AI effectively and thrive in the rapidly evolving landscape of intelligent technology.

title: Harness AI innovation to power a collaborative journey
description: The Siemens and Microsoft partnership aims to enhance product lifecycle management (PLM), design, manufacturing, and other industrial processes by leveraging Microsoft's cloud and AI technologies. Manufacturing companies have shared that 78% of quality events go unreported, and 16% are significant defects. The Siemens Xcelerator portfolio on Microsoft Azure allows manufacturers to communicate issues faster to the right people to fix the issues.

title: Secure and streamline data engineering workloads with open storage
description: Snowflake and Microsoft have developed deep integrations that result in better performance for all your data engineering needs within the most secure framework. In this session, we’ll show you how to leverage Azure Data Factory and Microsoft Fabric with Snowflake to streamline your architecture and simplify pipeline use cases. We’ll also cover how to access one copy of data bi-directionally between Snowflake and Microsoft Fabric through Apache Iceberg.

title: Transform your security strategy with AI and platformization
description: Discover how AI-driven data security and compliance can transform your business. Join Softchoice for a technical review of their Data Governance, Data Security, and Modular Zero Trust solutions, and learn how these services address your most critical needs as you prepare for AI. Bring order to the chaos of security sprawl with platformization to ensure a seamless & robust defense.

title: St. Luke's secures Microsoft 365 with Rubrik
description: St. Luke’s University Health Network will talk about how they are safeguarding their critical data, which enables them to save lives. Get inspired by their story of resilience and learn how to follow their lead with your own data. Walk away with a mental roadmap on how to reinforce your Microsoft 365 data security.

title: Microsoft defense against the emergence of infostealer malware
description: The emergence of the SYS01 infostealer malware, often spread via Facebook, raises significant cybersecurity concerns due to elusive social engineering techniques that deceive users into downloading malicious payloads. This session will explore SYS01's propagation, system impacts, and Microsoft Defender’s role in defending against it. Learn how real-time protection, heuristic analysis, and behavior monitoring in Defender can be configured to counter SYS01 and enhance your cybersecurity posture.
speakerNames: David Broggy, Shawn Kanady, Jennifer Weems

title: Unlocking business value with data and AI powered finance and tax
description: Discover how EY uses data and AI to help Finance and Tax teams drive business value through improved connectivity and insights. Using the power of AI, Microsoft Fabric and Microsoft Copilot we can harness data across operational silos, improve productivity, speed to value and empower business users. This is how data becomes knowledge which becomes business advantage: with Humans at Center, Technology at Speed and Innovation at Scale.

title: Fortifying Azure Data Resilience with Veeam Data Cloud
description:
Explore how Veeam Data Cloud (VDC) revolutionizes data protection across Azure and Microsoft 365. This session, co-presented by senior Azure product management and Veeam, covers:
VDC for Microsoft 365: Backup Storage and AI-powered features
Azure protection: Hyper-V, Azure Stack HCI, AVS, native VM backup, AKS, and Vault.
AI advantages: Malware detection, predictive analytics, and automated management
Future-proofing: Integrating with emerging Azure services and AI initiatives

title: Dive Into MDEP-enhanced conference solutions
description: In today’s hybrid work environment, reliable and easy-to-use conference solutions are critical to businesses of all sizes. How can we ensure a safer and smoother user experience and make device management easier？In this session, you will explore how Yealink’s latest MDEP-powered product, MeetingBar A40, enhances security and streamlines deployment and how the AI-powered A40 transforms user experiences in hybrid meetings. Watch the session and get the chance to win a special gift!

title: Go passwordless and boost cyber resilience with Yubico and Microsoft
description: In light of recent high-profile outages, it’s clear that high availability and disaster recovery are critical, yet often overlooked in authentication. Join us as we explore how YubiKey integration with Microsoft solutions can enhance your cyber resilience. Learn about passkey implementations, resilient authenticators with Entra ID, and strategies for designing robust authentication flows. Prepare your organization for the Azure MFA Mandate and leverage the new Entra ID FIDO2 registration API.

title: How Amgen solves complex enterprise challenges with Microsoft Copilot
description: Learn how Amgen is revolutionizing business operations with Microsoft Copilot. Partnering with ZS, Amgen leverages Microsoft Copilot Studio to create customized solutions that address specific business needs, streamline processes, accelerate decision making, and deliver impactful results. Discover how Amgen maximizes the full potential of Microsoft Copilot to drive impact across various use cases.
speakerNames: Eric Flores Acosta , Satish Jha, Anjana Khedkar, Keyanu Maloney, Swaroop   Suresh

title: Accelerate AI/ML Development with Teradata AI Unlimited on Fabric
description: Join Janeth Graziani, Developer Advocate at Teradata, as she explores Teradata’s AI Unlimited Workload on Microsoft Fabric and shares how AI Unlimited empowers data analysts, engineers, and scientists to experiment, test, and deploy innovation fast, securely, and cost-effectively! AI Unlimited is available in preview on Microsoft Fabric and via Azure Marketplace. Learn more: https://bit.ly/3Yq1Wq3.

title: Accelerate AI development with Visual Studio Code and Azure AI
description: Learn how to start building your AI app using Azure AI capabilities in Visual Studio Code. Streamline the development cycle and switch between models and tools using a single unified endpoint.

title: Trace and debug your GenAI apps to continuously improve performance
description: Maximize the potential of your generative AI applications with Azure AI 's advanced tracing and debugging capabilities. Join us for live demonstrations and practical insights into how Azure AI advanced tracing features can elevate your AI projects, offering robust support for diverse models and frameworks while driving continuous improvement and operational excellence.

title: A journey into open-source Hugging Face Models on Azure AI
description: Explore 1550+ Open-Source Hugging Face models on Azure including highly-ranked multilingual, SLM and biomed models. Learn their use cases, capabilities and how customers are using these models.

title: Accelerating creative workflows with DALL-E
description: Witness the transformative power of DALL-E in a rapid 12-minute demo! We will showcase how DALL-E can generate high-quality visuals from textual descriptions, revolutionizing creative workflows in design and marketing. See firsthand how to integrate DALL-E into your projects to enhance creativity and efficiency, while enabling watermarks for transparency.

title: Secure your GenAI project in 15 minutes with Azure AI Studio
description: Discover how to set up your Generative AI projects with top-tier security best practices. In this session, you'll see real-world implementations of critical security measures, including network isolation, least privileged access, and encryption, ensuring your GenAI projects are protected from the ground up.

title: Track and manage GenAI project risks in Azure AI Studio
description: In this demo, we'll explore ways that cross-functional teams can document, review, and track key information about their AI applications throughout the development lifecycle for more streamlined AI governance, risk, and compliance workflows.

title: Transform your business with Azure AI and Microsoft Fabric
description: Discover how Azure OpenAI Service, Azure AI Studio, Azure Machine Learning, and Microsoft Fabric can revolutionize your business KPIs. This demo showcases innovative AI solutions, including an AI shopping assistant, churn prediction, and contact center support. Learn how Contoso, a fictional retailer, transformed its KPIs using these technologies to enhance in-store experiences.

title: Reduce security debt with Copilot Autofix in GitHub Advanced Security
description: Overcome challenges in your application security debt with segmented, strategic remediation campaigns that unify developers and SecOps in GitHub Advanced Security. Divide and conquer any volume of security debt with AI-assisted security that assesses your codebases, prioritizes the most critical fixes, generates suggestions for each fix, and helps you strategize remediation into manageable sprints.

title: GenAI app assessment and code remediation with CloudAtlas
description: Accelerate modernizing applications to Azure leveraging GenAI code remediation with CloudAtlas. Learn how CloudAtlas identifies issues, optimizes performance, and ensures compliance with industry standards. Gain insights into best practices for maintaining and improving GenAI applications. Perfect for developers, IT professionals, and product managers looking to enhance their projects.

title: GenAI Gateway capabilities in Azure API Management
description: We’ll demonstrate how GenAI Gateway capabilities in Azure API Management can tackle scalability, security, monitoring, and resource allocation challenges in GenAI app development. You’ll learn how to configure API Management to authenticate and authorize LLM endpoints, enforce token consumption limits, monitor usage, and implement load balancing across multiple LLM endpoints—all while continuing to use the tools you're already familiar with.

title: Streamline your Kubernetes operations with Microsoft Copilot in Azure
description: Did you know Microsoft Copilot in Azure can generate Kubernetes YAML files, run cluster commands, and manage cluster backups?  Discover how Copilot can simplify your Kubernetes workflows and make it easier to work with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) clusters. The demo session will show how can get started using Copilot in Azure skills for AKS and spend less time on setup and configuration.

title: Effortless sustainability tracking with Microsoft Fabric
description: Discover how you can effortlessly track sustainability progress with our out-of-the-box ESG data model, connectors, and reporting tools. This session will highlight the simplicity and power of Microsoft Fabric, demonstrating how you can quickly gain valuable insights and drive your sustainability initiatives forward. Don't miss this opportunity to see Fabric in action and learn how it can transform your approach to sustainability tracking.

title: Power BI in action: from data to insights
description: Experience the cutting-edge capabilities of Power BI in this demo session. Discover how Power BI empowers individuals, teams, and organizations to make data-driven decisions at scale. We'll showcase the transformative capabilities of Copilot, leveraging advanced AI to automate report creation and accelerate intelligent insights. Join us for an exciting journey into the future of analytics and witness how Power BI, combined with Microsoft Fabric, is revolutionizing the way we work with data.

title: Drive insights with PostgreSQL
description: Discover how to use Azure Database for PostgreSQL to create richer insights. In this session you will learn how to connect PostgreSQL to Microsoft business intelligence and analytics technologies such as Power BI Desktop. See how easy it is to explore your data, create rich visuals, and use natural language to provide insights.

title: Deliver a frictionless migration experience for SQL workloads
description: See the latest tools and experiences in action built to give you tailor-made recommendations and guidance on how to modernize your SQL estate. We’ll show you how you can migrate workloads to Azure in minutes in one frictionless experience.

title: Getting started with SAP data in Microsoft Fabric
description: Data silos are a common challenge for companies, as business-related data continues to grow. SAP systems hold valuable data and team members seek insights not raw data, whether from ERP systems like SAP ECC or SAP S/4HANA, from SAP’s data warehouse products, or SAP’s SaaS solutions. In this demo session, learn how to integrate your SAP data into Fabric, combine SAP and non-SAP data, and drive AI-powered insights with Copilot to boost productivity, optimize efficiency, and create new value.

title: Accelerate deployment of open-source applications with Copilot in Azure
description: Experience the synergy of AI and human creativity in this engaging demo of Microsoft Copilot in Azure. Observe how Copilot transforms the way we work by assisting with executable docs, optimizing deployments, and customizing solutions in real-time. Explore interactive scenarios that highlight its integration with VS Code and the groundbreaking capabilities of GitHub Copilot. By the end, you’ll be equipped to deploy, modify, and optimize your Azure workloads with confidence and precision.

title: How to unlock data and AI capabilities with Oracle database@Azure
description: Discover how to unlock AI-driven insights from your Oracle data using Microsoft Fabric, and Oracle Database@Azure. Join Microsoft experts as they demo seamless integrations with Microsoft Fabric and data governance solutions, showcasing how tools like Microsoft Copilot can enhance your data and applications.

title: Modernizing Azure VMware Solution workloads with Azure services
description: This demo will showcase how to lift and shift an on-premises application to the cloud using Azure VMware Solution. We'll configure Azure networking for secure, private access to services, migrate the database to Azure SQL Managed Instance, and update the connection string. Finally, we'll publish the application through Azure Application Gateway for end-user access.

title: Fortify critical applications with Azure Business Continuity Center
description: In this demo we will showcase how the latest advancements in Azure Backup and Azure Site Recovery (Azure BCDR) help protect and secure your cloud native workloads and fortify mission critical applications against ransomware & large-scale outages. We will also focus on how Copilot in Azure Business Continuity Center helps you manage your estate as scale and enhances protection and resiliency against escalating risks.

title: Deploying confidential VMs with H100 GPUs​
description: Azure confidential VMs with NVIDIA H100 GPUs are the first generally available VMs in the industry that pair an 4th gen AMD EPYC confidential VM with an NVIDIA H100 Tensor Core GPU to help ensure that sensitive data in CPU or GPU memory is inaccessible to Azure operators and unauthorized third parties. Learn how to deploy these VMs from the Azure portal or CLI and how they unlock new uses cases in confidential AI.​

title: Boost your AI and Copilot skills with Microsoft Learn
description: Tailored skill-building resources that support everyone in your organization, from developers to IT professionals to business leaders and users are available on Microsoft Learn. Take the next step in your AI transformation journey. During this session, we’ll demonstrate essential training content for individuals and organizations available across Microsoft Learn.

title: Achieve your goals with Microsoft Learn
description: Elevate your technical expertise and career with Microsoft Learn's tailored learning experiences. Discover how to harness the power of AI and Copilot to enhance your skills and stay ahead in the tech industry. Join our product experts in this session to explore advanced tools and techniques designed to accelerate your growth and success.

title: Prove you've got in-demand skills with Microsoft Credentials
description: Microsoft Learn can help you boost your technical skills and expand your career opportunities. In this session, you can explore variety of training and preparation materials to help you pursue role-based Microsoft Certifications and project-based Microsoft Applied Skills credentials.

title: Build security skills for the present and future
description:
Defending against cyberthreats starts with people, their skills, and their knowledge—Microsoft Learn can help. 

Join us to explore how a truly successful security transformation can only be achieved by implementing the right balance of technical security skills and a learning-first culture. This session will highlight essential skill-building resources within Microsoft Learn, catering to everyone in your organization, from Security and IT teams to developers and business users.

title: The next frontier in customer engagement - Hyper realistic interactive AI avatars
description: Join D-ID's VP of Product, Eli Cohen, as he introduces the revolutionary interactive AI avatars and explores how they are redefining real-time digital engagement. Discover the shift from traditional methods to our vision for the future, where interactive AI avatars enable more authentic, dynamic interactions. Whether for marketing campaigns, learning and development, or customer engagement, these avatars will serve as the primary interface, facilitating seamless, natural, and intuitive real-time connections. Learn about the cutting-edge technology behind lifelike digital twins that authentically represent you, your brand, or anyone else, and see how this innovation is transforming real-time interactions with digital environments in the most natural way possible.

title: Optimize Device Management with Devicie: Automation at Scale
description: Devicie automates the entire device lifecycle, leveraging the power of Intune to streamline modern management. From deployment to retirement, Devicie ensures visibility, optimized productivity, and enhanced security. With pre-built modules, continuous updates, and clear compliance reporting, your organization can stay ahead of changes without the burden of manual workload—empowering teams to focus on strategic initiatives.

title: Securing Non-Human Identities: Live Demo of Automated Management
description: Join us for a live demonstration on managing and securing the lifecycle of Non-Human Identities (NHIs). We’ll showcase how Oasis's platform provides holistic visibility, posture monitoring, and automated remediation to secure NHI proliferation in modern enterprises. Attendees will learn how to mitigate risks from unrotated secrets, over-privileged accounts, and mismanaged NHIs across cloud and on-prem environments.

title: Get started with Windows Copilot Runtime easily
description: Securely integrate AI in your apps by using on-device AI backed APIs or open-source AI models. Get inspiration from sample codes, access documentation at your finger tips, all in one place to quickly get started.

title: Check out new AI capabilities coming to Windows
description: Enhance your productivity with new AI-powered capabilities such as document summarization, image manipulation, and more, right in your workflow on Windows.

title: Accelerate your productivity with Windows Developer tools
description: Accelerate your productivity by leveraging Windows developer tools such as Windows Subsystem for Linux, Terminal, Dev Drive, PowerToys and more, in your workflow.

title: Discover how Copilot Agents in Dynamics 365 transform customer service
description: Watch a demonstration to see the transformative impact of the latest innovations in customer service! Join us to explore how Copilot Agents and other advanced capabilities in Dynamics 365 Customer Service and Dynamics 365 Contact Center deliver next-level experiences, boost performance and productivity of service teams and drive operational efficiency.

title: Experience how Copilot agents boost sales outcomes.
description: During this demo, you will see the transformative capabilities of Copilot agents and how they can revolutionize the way sales organizations work. Discover high impact sales use cases that supercharge the seller experience and accelerate business outcomes with the power of AI agents.  Join us to discover how Copilot agents can empower your sales team, streamline workflows, and drive innovation.

title: Getting the most out of the new Power Platform Admin Center
description: Power Platform Admin Center has been updated to make administration of Power Platform even easier! Learn about all the changes and how Power Platform governance is ready for enterprise-scale.

title: How to discover, install and publish your agents in Copilot Studio
description: This session is for those who are building agents in Copilot Studio and wondering how a customer can use the agent for their business. The session will also showcase how these agents can be customized for specific use cases to drive further business value. Please come and learn the new discovery, acquisition, and customization flows for Copilot Studio agents.

title: Where's the ROI?  We've got you.
description: Still wondering how to prove the business value on AI? We'll walk through our research, process mapping, and value calculation and how to get to an achievable plan.  Then talk through three customer cases that show impact and how IT built strong ties to the business.  Be the architect, not the plumber.

title: Keep business running with fast backup and recovery
description: Want to experience recovery speeds that are up to 20 times faster than conventional methods?  Come learn how Microsoft 365 Backup delivers high-performance backup and recovery solutions for critical active data across OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange. We'll also show you how you can use Microsoft 365 Archive as a cost-effective solution for long-term storage of your SharePoint content without compromising on manageability, security, or compliance standards.

title: Discover how Copilot helps scale small and medium business operations
description: During this demo, you will see how Copilot in Dynamics 365 Business Central can help businesses scale operational processes.  Discover use cases that empower teams and improve customer experience with the power of AI

title: Take action with real-time data and insights in Microsoft Intune
description: Join this session to witness how the combination of data, insights and device action with advanced analytics and AI in Intune gives you the power to ease troubleshooting, fortify endpoint security and improve user experience.

title: Configure Edge for Business to help protect against cyber threats
description: Not all browsers are the same, especially when it comes to security. With users spending the majority of their time browsing at work and newly emerging threats, you need a browser you can count on. Enter Microsoft Edge for Business, a secure enterprise browser optimized for AI. Learn how to easily secure managed and unmanaged devices with Intune policies and MAM, safeguard data with data loss prevention, and configure AI services such as Copilot with enterprise data protection.

title: Detect and respond to next gen email threats with Defender for Office 365
description: Defender for Office 365 can protect against and respond to the latest collaboration threats including phishing and business email compromise. Learn how your SOC team can be more effective using the power of AI and XDR, and how to build end user resilience against new and emerging threats.

title: Investigating threats with Microsoft Sentinel
description: A live demo of Microsoft Sentinel that shows the latest experience for users in the Defender portal, SOC optimizations, threat intelligence capabilities and how customers can use our new, low-cost data tier with summary rules.

title: Threat Intelligence at machine speed with Microsoft Security Copilot
description: Threat intelligence is crucial for protecting against evolving threats, but extracting actionable insights from vast data can be overwhelming. Join Microsoft expert Ryan Munsch to discover how Security Copilot's generative AI streamlines threat intelligence. He'll show how Copilot acts as a research assistant, analyst, and responder, using guided experiences and prompts to simplify threat management and reduce the time, resources, and stress involved in defending your organization.

title: Bring passkey into your passwordless journey with Microsoft Entra ID
description: Many of our customers are either already deploying passwordless credentials or planning to do so in the next few years. Meanwhile, the industry is buzzing with excitement about passkeys. But what exactly are passkeys, and what do they mean for your organization’s passwordless journey? Join the Microsoft Entra ID product team as we explore the impact of passkeys on the passwordless ecosystem, share insights from Microsoft's own passkey implementation and customer experiences.

title: Future-proofing AI-driven migrations with Microsoft Defender for Cloud
description: As AI-driven cloud applications fuel digital transformation, they also increase the complexity and attack surface during cloud migrations. Managing and securing hybrid and multicloud environments has never been more challenging. Join this session to see how Microsoft Defender for Cloud provides an integrated posture management and threat protection experience for multicloud, hybrid, and on-prem resources.

title: A day in the life of a clinician and how Microsoft Cloud for Healthcare helps them
description: Clinicians perform many tasks throughout their day. Administrative burdens and inefficiencies are a leading cause of burnout and dissatisfaction. Discover how Microsoft Cloud for Healthcare can improve operational efficiencies, clinician satisfaction, the patient experience and financial outcomes.

title: Use Azure Open AI to design an intelligent telecommunications network
description: Integrating AI into operations and network management contributes to employee efficiency and increased customer satisfaction.  Discover how telecoms are leveraging their network data to shift the value chain, benefit from dynamic and smart resource allocation, and are achieving comprehensive observability and business intelligence through a single pane of glass.

title: Harness the power of GenAI to combat telecom network threats
description: Gen AI stands as a beacon of resilience, empowering organizations to safeguard the integrity and security of their 5G networks. Nokia and Microsoft have partnered to create the Gen AI assistant to boost operational efficiency by 35% and speeds up incident response times by 50%. Join this session to watch a demo and learn about customers taking advantage of this solution.

title: Navigating the IoT and Edge Security Landscape
description: IoT devices introduce real-time visibility to complex OT assets and processes. When not properly monitored, these same systems can create serious security and business risks. Learn about recent regulations may impact IoT, Edge, and OT devices in your industrial environments, and how Microsoft can help address emerging IT requirements.

title: Building Multimodal Applications using GenAI
description: A multimodal GenAI application seamlessly generate high-quality content across text, images, video, and audio, all at once. In this demo driven, fast-paced session, Microsoft AI and Business Applications MVP and Microsoft Certified Trainer Prashant G Bhoyar will cover developing robust, scalable multimodal applications using Azure OpenAI, and Azure AI Services, focusing on industry requirements and best practices.
speakerNames: Prashant G Bhoyar, Microsoft MVP (AI & Copilot Studio)

title: Reason over video with GPT-4o and Whisper
description: Do you want to get more than just a summary, but also in-depth analysis from a video? Now you can do that with GPT4o. In this quick demo, we'll show you how to feed and process a video and give you advice on how to get the best insights from your video by using GPT4o and Whisper.

title: Multi Agentic framework with Semantic Kernel and AutoGen
description: This work introduces an innovative application of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with Semantic Kernel and AutoGen in the FMCG sector, aimed at significantly enhancing sales agent target setting and performance to achieve substantial sales increases. Knowledge Graphs, managed through Neo4j or Cosmos Db, provide robust capabilities for organizing and querying complex data structures within the FMCG industry, crucial for optimizing inventory management, market analysis, and sales strategies.

title: Tokens 101: Making sense of tokenization in AI
description:
Tokenization is a fundamental concept for large language models, but what exactly is a token, how do tokenizers work, and why would we want to use tokens in the first place?

Join this session and together we will unravel the mechanisms behind transforming textual data into machine-understandable formats.

title: Developing Cloud Native: Azure Functions on Azure Container Apps
description:
Think about the practical uses, benefits and enhanced flexibility you and your development team can achieve by creating event-driven and cloud-native applications, with the added advantage of hosting them on containers in the Azure cloud platform.

Build .NET applications on Azure Functions with a twist. Learn how to combine and integrate serverless development with the cloud native technologies today for microservices and event-driven cloud native apps.

title: Building Cloud Native Applications with Dapr and Radius on Azure
description: Developing cloud apps often leads to vendor lock-in via specific SDKs. Dapr provides standardized microservices patterns, reducing boilerplate for components like state stores and message brokers. Radius Project separates infrastructure concerns with Recipes and supports Dapr Components for easy integration. This session will introduce both Radius and Dapr, and include a live demo showing how to build distributed architectures using these frameworks.

title: Build smarter automation with AI Builder and Power Automate
description: Discover how to supercharge your automation with AI Builder and Power Automate. In this session, you'll learn how to leverage AI Builder models to automate tasks like file processing and data classification. Explore how AI enhances workflows and maximizes productivity through practical examples and a live demo. Ideal for anyone aiming to elevate their automation with AI.

title: Build Smarter Copilots: 5 Better Bot Best Practices in Copilot Studio
description: When someone asks how good your custom Copilot is, do you answer "50% of the time, it works all the time?" Does it know a lot but answer very little? Are you wasting too many precious message credits in each conversation? Is GenAI either doing too much or too little? Anyone can build a Copilot, but it takes experience and some best practices to make Copilots that users will keep coming back to.

title: Harness Power Apps Copilot to Talk with Your Dataverse Data
description: In this session, learn how to configure and leverage Power Apps Copilot to seamlessly interact with your Dataverse data. Discover how Copilot’s advanced AI capabilities can enhance the user experience by simplifying data queries, streamlining workflows, and automating processes within Power Apps. I’ll guide you through the setup process and demonstrate how to unlock the full potential of Copilot to create smarter, more responsive apps that drive efficiency and productivity.

title: Providing ROI to organizations with AI in Business Applications
description: Organizations can baulk at the adoption of AI, citing security and other concerns. This session will cover how to engage with the right levels within organizations to demonstrate and prove the ROI benefit of adopting and using AI tools, including Copilot, within the Microsoft Business Applications platform. Hear real-world examples showing the usage and benefits of doing so, to scale and empower users and customers at all levels.

title: What's available for Fabric CI/CD
description: Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) offers several key benefits for modern data analytics teams, enhancing both productivity and reliability in delivering insights and data-driven solutions. Many new CI/CD capabilities have been delivered for Fabric over the last year. Join this session to get a comprehensive overview of current options and many pointers on available resources.

title: Planning for a VMware vSAN Migration to Azure Stack HCI
description:
How do I go about migrating our VMware vSAN environment to Microsoft's Azure Stack HCI hyper-converged infrastructure solution?
Join Microsoft MVP Philip Elder as he goes over the various aspects of evaluating the existing vSAN infrastructure relative to what is needed to implement Azure Stack HCI. From storage, compute, memory, and networking he will take you through the process step-by-step.

title: Smart, efficient, and well-architected IaC with Azure Verified Modules
description: In addition to learning how to avoid a lot of frustration, we will look at how you can effectively use Azure Verified Modules as a part of your Infrastructure as Code flow to achieve the best possible collaboration in organizations that require full end-to-end control over cost, security, availability, management, and performance in Microsoft Azure projects.

title: Top Tips for Optimizing Copilot with SharePoint Advanced Management
description: Explore the most effective tips for enhancing your Microsoft 365 Copilot deployment using SharePoint Advanced Management including reporting, securing, and ongoing policies to optimize your content governance estate. We will cover some real world scenarios to go through why SharePoint Advanced Management is a great set of solutions in our Copilot world.

title: Upgrading to Windows 11 using Microsoft Intune - Tips and Tricks
description: Join longstanding Microsoft MVP Johan Arwidmark in a session with lessons learned from upgrading Windows 10 PCs to Windows 11 using Microsoft Intune. You will learn about common preparation and planning, gotchas, and workarounds, as well as implementing configurations to improve the upgrade experience and reduce the failure rate.

title: How to leverage the Queues app in Microsoft Teams phone system
description: In this session, we will quickly show how agents and supervisors can utilize the Queues app to more effectively answer calls and discern the workload for a particular call group. We'll highlight the features of the Queues app such as Analytics and Real-time queue data.

title: What's new in Microsoft 365 Copilot in YOUR tenant?
description: Learn how to track what's new in Copilot and all the other changes coming to *your* tenant.  Meet Message Center in the M365 Admin Center and learn how to turn Message Center triage into a team sport using Planner.

title: Mastering Meeting Efficiency with Microsoft 365 Copilot
description:
Discover how Microsoft 365 Copilot can streamline meeting processes with intelligent prompts and automation. Learn practical applications, tips for effective prompts, and automating meeting workflows to save time and boost productivity. 
-Transform meeting management with Copilot
-Practical tips and best practices for crafting effective prompts
-Automating meeting workflows to save time and enhance collaboration
Time to enhance your productivity and meeting efficiency with Microsoft 365 Copilot!

title: Real World Cyber Attacks Illustrated: Rapid Response Techniques
description: With the shift toward cloud computing, attackers have been fast to respond - adapting their modus operandi to target enterprise data, applications, and infrastructure in the cloud. In this session we share insights into the latest attack trends, new vectors seen in the cloud, and the top three methods that Microsoft Sentinel, Copilot for Security and Site Recovery employs to Identify, Protect, Detect, Respond and Recover.  Come to this session to be inspired and gain key insights for your business.

title: Securing Microsoft 365 Copilot using Microsoft Intune and Defender XDR
description: Microsoft 365 Copilot is your UI for AI, which will give you access to data and insights with an unprecedented ease. However, with great power comes great responsibilities. If the wrong person get access to your device or account, the risk of data exfiltration is higher than ever. In this demo you will learn the essential security measures to take when implementing Microsoft 365 Copilot, and how Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Defender XDR is essential for your success.

title: GitHub Copilot can do that!?​
description: Learn how to get the most out of GitHub Copilot, including a few ways that might surprise you! Join our VS Code and GitHub Copilot experts as they walk through some of the newest and least-expected ways to use GitHub Copilot to reduce more of those mundane tasks you’ve been avoiding.

title: Step up your planning with GitHub Issues
description: GitHub Issues are becoming more powerful than ever. In this quick session, you'll learn about new features like advanced search, issue types, sub issues, and more. Learn how to take your team to the next level with the latest and greatest updates around GitHub Issues, and bring all of your advanced project planning into one powerful suite.

title: GitHub Enterprise Administration at Scale
description: Get up to speed on how to set up and operate a private, dedicated instance of GitHub for your company. In this session you will learn how to configure GitHub with Entra, deployment best practices and how to set-up your CI/CD infrastructure to scale into the future

title: Create your first GitHub Copilot extension
description: Discover how GitHub Copilot Extensions can supercharge your Copilot Chat experience by integrating external tools, services, and custom behaviors. In this session, we'll guide you through building your first Copilot Extension, enhancing your workflow across all supported IDEs and GitHub.

title: Level Up with GitHub Copilot: Certifications and Applied Skills
description: In this lightning talk, we’ll explore how GitHub Copilot is transforming development workflows and how GitHub’s certification programs, combined with supporting resources on Microsoft Learn, can help developers and teams excel. We’ll also dive into the new Microsoft Applied Skills for GitHub Copilot, focusing on how these courses enhance application development by integrating AI-driven coding support into the learning journey.

title: Unveiling new solution accelerators using Azure AI Language and LLMs
description: Azure AI is helping accelerate GenAI app development using task-optimized models from Azure AI Language. Join us to learn how customers are these models to address common challenges in building GenAI apps, including using task-optimized entity extraction models to reduce hallucination from LLM-generated summaries, intent identification models when building AI agents, and PII redaction to ensure data privacy.

title: Simulate, evaluate, and improve GenAI outputs with Azure AI Studio
description: In this deep dive for AI developers and data scientists, we'll explore how to use evaluations to make data-driven development decisions and mitigate risk. We'll explore pre-built evaluators for quality and safety, how to build custom evaluators, the tradeoffs of various evaluation parameters, what makes a good test dataset, how to generate a good test dataset, and finally how to run an evaluation and make decisions based on the results.

title: Boost edge AI: Accelerate model inference with ONNX Runtime and NPU
description: NPUs bring high-performance AI capabilities to edge devices. As AI models become more complex, NPUs offer a scalable solution to handle increasing computational demands without a significant increase in power consumption or processing time. ONNX Runtime, equipped with NPU accelerator, enables developers to efficiently deploy state-of-the-art models on edge devices including mobile phones.

title: Monitor and optimize your GenAI app in production with Azure AI Studio
description: Deploying to production is just the first step! Join us for a demo of monitoring capabilities and best practices for your generative AI applications. We'll walk through the monitoring metrics and capabilities you get out of the box in Azure AI Studio, how to customize monitoring experiences and run custom queries, and discuss ways that customers are using monitoring insights to improve their application's performance over time.

title: Boosting IT productivity: Streamlining operations with Cohere on Azure
description: This demo showcases how Cohere with Microsoft Azure enhances business process automation, driving productivity in the IT/software industry. Featuring Atomicwork’s AI assistant (Atom AI), powered by Cohere’s models, integrated with data sources like SharePoint and Confluence. The demo highlights faster, more accurate IT support through efficient data retrieval. Atomicwork saw a 20% accuracy boost and 75% latency improvement using Cohere, outperforming competitive models like GPT-3.5.

title: Enhancing loan term sheet drafting with Jamba on Microsoft Azure
description: This demo showcases how Jamba on Microsoft Azure transforms the term sheet drafting process for financial professionals. Automating the creation of accurate, compliant, and compelling term sheets, it streamlines loan approvals, boosts productivity, and reduces errors. Key features include summarization, automated generation, and tailored recommendations, ensuring alignment with industry best practices. See how this solution can unlock new revenue opportunities for banks.

title: Energy AI with ENMAX: RAG at scale
description: Join this demo to see how ENMAX is pioneering GenAI experiences in the energy industry with Azure AI. You will also learn how Azure AI Search makes it easier to get started with RAG. Learn how to add data to your AI application, embed multimodal data for vector and hybrid search, and use Copilot studio to build an end-to-end RAG app.

title: Fine-tuning AI models with Azure OpenAI Service
description: Dive deeper into the art of fine-tuning AI models with Azure OpenAI. Mahsa will conduct a live 25-minute demo, guiding you through the process of customizing AI models to suit specific industry needs. Learn best practices and see how fine-tuning can significantly enhance model performance for specialized tasks.

title: Streamlining customer service with AI-powered assistants
description: Azure AI is helping accelerate GenAI app development using task-optimized models from Azure AI Language. Join us to learn how customers are these models to address common challenges in building GenAI apps, including using task-optimized entity extraction.

title: Parloa's Agent Management Platform powered by Azure AI
description: Join Maik Hummel from Parloa to witness the evolution of call center platforms in the age of GenAI. Maik will walk us through Parloa's new Agent Management Platform (AMP) built entirely using Azure AI services on Azure. Learn how Parloa is revolutionizing end-to-end call center applications starting with multilingual, real-time assistance to customer service reps all the way to helping call-center managers derive meaningful post-call insights and ensure compliance.

title: Transforming healthcare: TELUS Health's AI for patient-centered care
description: Using GPT-4o and Azure AI Search, learn optimization strategies for indexing documents and how to overcome common challenges in retrieval quality and data ingestion.

title: Enhancing app infra with Azure Deployment Environments extensibility
description: Join us for a hands-on demo where you’ll see how Azure Deployment Environments empowers developers to quickly, easily spin up and manage application infrastructure. Discover how the service's extensibility model enables you to standardize and tailor deployments to fit your organization’s specific needs, using any preferred IaC framework. Plus, learn how to leverage built-in security and cost management capabilities to confidently meet enterprise-level compliance and governance requirements.

title: How GitHub Copilot is redefining development in VS Code
description: We all live in the age of AI-assisted coding. How far can GitHub Copilot go in taking over your coding tasks? This session explores Copilot's evolution in VS Code, including new and preview features pushing the boundaries of AI in development. With a hands-on approach, we’ll uncover the real impact Copilot has on daily coding, backed by insights from its creators. As developers, we’re always seeking tools to reduce repetitive tasks—how much can AI streamline your workflow?

title: Modernize your apps with AI without completely rewriting your code
description: Adding GenAI is one of the highest priorities for enterprise customers with large app estates. Learn how to integrate new features such as caching, observability, and AI models into your existing web application while minimizing the changes to the primary application code.

title: Fast and frictionless Kubernetes with AKS Automatic
description: AKS Automatic allows you to scale your applications automatically based on demand, ensuring high availability and optimal performance. In this session, we'll demonstrate how to deploy and manage Kubernetes clusters with minimal effort, leveraging built-in best practices and safeguards. You'll see firsthand how AKS Automatic simplifies deployment, automates cluster management, and provides a seamless experience for both developers and platform operators.

title: Kickstart your AI development journey with AI app templates
description: Dive into the world of AI apps with pre-built templates designed to accelerate your development process. This session will introduce you to a variety of AI app templates available on platforms like Azure. Learn how to deploy these templates quickly, customize them to fit your specific needs, and integrate them into your existing workflows.

title: Unlocking efficiency: mirroring and shortcuts in Microsoft Fabric
description: As organizations seek greater efficiency in data management, using the right tools is crucial. This session explores Microsoft Fabric's mirroring and shortcuts features and how they streamline data, reduce complexity, and enhance efficiency. You'll learn how mirroring ensures consistent data access and reliability while shortcuts simplify navigation. By the session's end, you'll understand how to fully leverage Microsoft Fabric to optimize data operations.

title: From Copilot to code-first: the power of Microsoft Fabric and AI
description: Join us for a hands-on exploration of AI and Microsoft Fabric. Learn about the power of Fabric as the foundational platform that not only manages data but also enables the creation of custom AI experiences. See how Fabric enhances productivity with built-in generative AI, from Copilot to code-first, transforming your data into actionable insights. We'll highlight new features in Copilot, AI skills, and much more.

title: Secure, govern, and manage your data with Microsoft Fabric and Purview
description: Join us for a deep-dive demo where we will showcase the seamless integration of Microsoft Fabric and Microsoft Purview to create a secure and governed data estate. Discover how easy it is to leverage Purview's powerful security, compliance, and governance capabilities to manage, control, and protect your OneLake data at enterprise scale. Learn best practices for implementing security in your organization and see firsthand how to achieve a robust and compliant data governance framework.

title: Innovate faster and build intelligent apps with Microsoft Fabric
description: Explore the myriad data connections available in Microsoft Fabric, where seamless setup and integration empower you to quickly harness the power of an AI-driven analytics platform. See how easy it is to create AI-powered applications with the right data foundation, where security and governance are built in.​

title: Next-gen retail with Azure Cache for Redis and GenAI
description: Unlock the power of Azure Cache for Redis and GenAI to transform retail operations. Discover how Azure Cache for Redis delivers real-time recommendations for seamless customer experiences. Learn how integrating GenAI provides intelligent product suggestions, driving top-selling items. Join us to explore how these technologies can revolutionize decision-making, increase sales, and deliver actionable, data-driven insights.

title: Boost TCO and modernize your MongoDB workloads with Azure Cosmos DB
description: Discover how innovations in vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB can help you achieve incredible TCO, instant scalability, and full vector database capabilities for AI apps. In this 25-minute session, we'll demo new features and take you through a step-by-step migration to benefit from improved elasticity and performance, while saving costs. You'll gain confidence to manage your MongoDB modernization journey effortlessly and maximize the value of your MongoDB workloads.

title: Enhance cloud native troubleshooting with Azure Monitor & Chaos Studio
description: Learn how the latest features in Azure Monitor can help troubleshoot faster. We’ll demo a troubleshooting workflow powered by new AIOps capabilities and highlight how Azure Monitor is simplifying the experience with Application Insights auto-instrumentation, new dashboards, and more. You’ll also learn how to enable effective resolution with proactive experimentation and achieve resiliency at scale with Azure Chaos Studio.

title: Enhancing VMware private clouds with common Azure integrations
description: After deploying your Azure VMware Solution private cloud in Azure, you’ll want to design for scale, optimize performance with efficient resource utilization and low-latency, and ensure that your applications remain responsive and recover quickly from failures. In this demo, we'll show you how to integrate Azure Arc with Azure VMware Solution and on-premises VMware environments, expand storage independently of compute, and implement an effective disaster recovery strategy.

title: Empower decision making with Microsoft Fabric and Cost Management
description: Discover how to answer contextual business questions using Microsoft Fabric and PowerBI, enhanced by Microsoft Cost Management and Copilot for Azure. Learn how export functionalities can augment your cost management capabilities. This product combination enriches data analysis and visualization, empowering users to make informed decisions backed by comprehensive business intelligence.

title: Protect SAP systems with Microsoft Security: See new features in action
description: Security is a top priority for organizations, with cyber attacks costing millions and damaging reputations. Ensuring secure and operational systems for mission-critical workloads like SAP requires significant skills and effort. Join this session to learn how to stay ahead of attackers and enhance business continuity for SAP using Microsoft Sentinel and Entra ID. Discover how to eliminate blind spots, secure SAP environments, and gain key insights with AI-powered Microsoft Copilot for Security.

title: Simplify AI and HPC Infrastructure deployments on Azure
description: Join us for an engaging and empowering demonstration of how our AI and HPC solutions can be rapidly deplyed at scale using Microsoft Azure CycleCloud and CycleCloud Workspace for Slurm. Learn about key features and capabilities from Azure that can bring up these sophisticated workloads in minutes. This session includes a walkthrough of CycleCloud Workspace for Slurm, and how you can deploy and scale your open-source tool chain to deliver results efficiently.

title: Bringing the power of Azure AI to your adaptive cloud environments
description: In this demo session, we show two ways we are bringing the power of Azure AI to your edge environments. First, we will demonstrate a new capability to use generative AI and language models to search your on-premises data. Finally, see how Copilot in Azure can help manage your on-prem Windows, Linux and VMWare estate by performing AI-assisted anomaly detection and failure analysis for efficient diagnosis of issues within your edge environments.

title: Use the new Azure Migrate UI to migrate Win/SQL in an app centric way
description: Demo that uses the new guided user interface (UI) in Azure Migrate to assess readiness and estimate value for a right-sized Win/SQL application stack migrating to Azure.

title: Cost benefits of using Elastic SAN for your workloads
description: Join us for an engaging session that showcases the power of Elastic SAN in optimizing a diverse range of workloads and highlights the cost benefits of dynamic resource sharing. This session is ideal for customers running database workloads like SQL and Oracle, as well as those running data-intensive applications on Azure VMware Solutions or Azure Kubernetes Solutions. Discover how Elastic SAN can consolidate block storage to simplify service management and achieve better price-performance.

title: Scalable AI solutions for climate science on Azure with NVIDIA and Esri
description: Critical flooding in Germany inspired Esri to utilize ArcGIS Pro, powered by Azure and NVIDIA, to simulate and predict flooding in Stuttgart. The solution leverages real-time data and advanced reality capture techniques to enhance flood risk assessments. High-resolution 3D models of the city are created and analyzed, integrating real-time environmental data to simulate flood scenarios. This collaboration introduces highly accurate climate science prediction models scalable globally.

title: Windows Server plus Azure Arc - Three new ways to save time
description: Looking for new ways to save time, gain better visibility into your hybrid and multicloud environments, and manage Windows Servers with higher flexibility and lower effort? Join this quick-fire demo session to see what you will be able to do when you get your hands on Windows Server 2025 and enable it with Azure Arc.

title: How to run your Oracle workloads in Azure with Oracle Database@Azure
description: In this session, learn how to build and run Oracle workloads on Azure using Oracle Database@Azure. Our experts will guide you through key features and capabilities, demonstrating how to integrate Oracle's powerful database services with Azure’s cloud platform. Through these demos, you’ll discover how to enhance performance, security, and scalability for your mission-critical workloads by leveraging the combined strengths of Oracle and Azure.

title: Secure your enterprise apps with WinGet
description: Learn more about securing your enterprise apps with WinGet Entra ID integration and explore best practices for using a WinGet Configuration file.

title: Delight your users with AI in your Windows apps
description: Enrich your enterprise app user experience by incorporating local AI models, taking advantage of your user's device. Check out scenarios that excites your users while using your app.

title: Unlock the power of Azure OpenAI: A guide to provisioned deployments
description: This session covers the benefits, use cases, and implementation steps for deploying and purchasing Provisioned Throughput Units (PTUs) for Azure OpenAI services. Understand the differences between standard, provisioned, and batch deployments, and learn to estimate, request, and deploy PTUs effectively. Discover how to choose and purchase the right Azure OpenAI service provisioned reservation for optimal performance and cost management.

title: See how Microsoft Copilot and Dynamics 365 is redifining the future of ERP
description: Join us in this demo session where we will showcase how Microsoft Copilot in Dynamics 365 automates critical tasks, empowers workers and enables leaders to focus on strategic growth. From managing supplier emails and automating time and expense entries to streamlining financial close, Copilot is set to revolutionize the way companies operate. See how next generation AI is making autonomous ERP a reality.

title: Managing Power Platform - Your guide to be an effective Administrator
description: Managing your Power Platform environments can be a breeze! Discover the power of the Centre of Excellence (CoE) Starter Kit, explore advanced features from Managed Environments, and use the Power Platform CLI to streamline tasks for both beginners and seasoned administrators. Join this demo-heavy session to dive deep into commonly used tools and features. You’ll leave with a solid understanding of how to govern and secure your environments effortlessly.

title: Building complete solutions with Copilot and Power Apps
description: Join us for an in-depth look at how Copilot in Power Apps is revolutionizing the way makers build complete solutions – from plan to publish. Discover how Copilot can suggest user roles, define use cases, and iterate on requirements – all to help create robust solutions tailored to business needs. We'll explore new capabilities that allow makers and developers to leverage organizational knowledge and configure intelligent experiences for their users.

title: Redefine customer experience of your enterprise portal using AI and Power Pages
description: Learn how you can utilize Gen AI to redefine customer experiences in your portals built with Power Pages.

title: How to secure your Power Pages Portals
description: Learn how to secure your enterprise portals built using Power Pages. In this session, we will cover common security issues as well as their solutions.

title: Leveraging rich visibility to secure AI driven business applications
description: Protect your Power Platform resources at each layer of the stack by leveraging actionable insights to make informed administrative decisions in the Age of AI. We will discuss how to monitor utilization at scale with comprehensive visibility and detailed metrics. From there, we will curtail a security strategy with thoughtful user provisioning, data exfiltration prevention, network isolation, and more to ensure that your organization and its data are safeguarded while adopting AI.

title: Power Apps testing, monitoring and troubleshooting
description: In this session, explore how to enhance the quality and performance of your apps with Test Studio, Azure Application Insights, and Power Apps Monitor. Learn to automate testing, diagnose performance bottlenecks, and monitor real-time app activity. This session will equip you with tools to identify issues before they impact users, ensuring a smooth and efficient app experience. By mastering these techniques, you’ll level up your app development process and deliver robust, reliable applications.

title: Good to great: Building Copilot Studio plugins
description: Copilot Studio is good, but it can even get better! You can build your own plugins. You might have heard of Large Action Models or Action Based Implementations of Large Language Models and with Copilot Studio you can achieve that. All you have to do is build your own plugins. By building your own plugins you can expose your API's to the rich world of Power Platform and by providing them through Copilot Studio you can provide your users the experience through copilots.

title: How M365 Copilot works: foundational technology and recent advancements
description: Build your understanding of how M365 Copilot works, empowering you to better launch it at your organization, support users' adoption journeys, and simply get the most out of it yourself. Join the experts as they walk through an in-depth exploration of the latest technological advancements behind the evolution of M365 Copilot and Business Chat, along with an exploration of the core technology on top of which Copilot works.

title: Discover a new way of working with M365 Copilot + Pages at the center
description: Experience a new way of working with an in-depth demo of M365 Copilot Pages and BizChat. See how these tools can transform your workflows by placing Copilot at the center of your daily tasks. This session will showcase practical applications and innovative features that enhance productivity and collaboration.

title: Explore top Copilot functional and industry use cases, prompts, and tools
description: Take a deep dive into how to unlock greater value with key Copilot scenarios and prompts. Whether you're focused on reinventing a specific line of business or leading in your industry, learn how to leverage the latest tools to maximize Copilot adoption.

title: Discover tools to drive Microsoft 365 Copilot adoption
