description: Join this live demo for an overview of the reports, tools, and resources for measuring and driving Microsoft 365 Copilot success in your organization. Walk away empowered to uncover and assess insights that support deployment readiness and license allocation, usage, adoption, sentiment and impact.

title: Copilot+ PCs: Your new superpower
description: Copilot+ PCs accelerate productivity for everyone. Come see them in action! Explore the power of being able to search across photos, videos, and docs semantically, create an update for your leadership team that includes highly sensitive data without such ever leaving the device, and more all leveraging the power of the neural processing unit (NPU) built into ever Copilot+ PC.

title: Evolving your workplace with Windows 365 Frontline and Microsoft Intune
description: Learn how to improve productivity and flexibility in your organization with Cloud PCs, with new features in Windows 365 Frontline. We will share how you can expand access easily and affordably, and share best practices for deployment and ongoing management.

title: Your new endpoint strategy for Windows 365
description: Get the essentials on how to modernize your Windows 365 endpoint strategy. Learn how to make it even easier and more secure for people to connect to their Cloud PCs.

title: Mastering custom plugins in Microsoft Security Copilot
description: Dive into the technical intricacies of Microsoft Security Copilot in this hands-on session. Gain practical knowledge on building plugins to customize Copilot for your organization's unique requirements. The session provides detailed instructions on creating custom integrations and automations, with a focus on plugin development. This is tailored for security and IT professionals looking to elevate Copilot's capabilities through advanced customization and seamless integration with existing security tools.

title: Prioritize what matters with comprehensive exposure management
description: Deep dive into Attack Path Analysis. Learn how dynamic attack path generations and critical asset protection helps you continuously assess, monitor and manage your cyber threat exposure to proactively identify and remediate attack paths that pose the greatest risk.

title: Unify security data with new Microsoft solution
description: Subject matter experts will unveil the latest solutions for end-to-end threat detection, robust defense mechanisms, and effective response protocols. Attendees will gain valuable insights into how to fortify their security posture, mitigate risks, and ensure resilience against cyberattacks. This session offers essential knowledge to understand how Microsoft is innovating to help you stay ahead of emerging threats and protect your critical assets.

title: Supercharge Endpoint Management with Microsoft Copilot in Intune
description: Unlock Microsoft Intune’s potential to streamline endpoint management with advanced insights and AI-driven actions. Copilot in Intune transforms tasks like policy management, speeds up issue resolution, and enhances security, empowering informed decisions and maximizing IT impact. Simplify IT complexity, boost performance, and reduce risks with real-time device inventory and actionable insights.

title: Container threat hunting and response with Microsoft Defender for Cloud
description: The advancement of containers, combined with the limitations of traditional security, has challenged organizations to maintain comprehensive visibility and guardrails over container security threats, resulting in delayed detection and response. Discover how Microsoft Defender for Cloud’s integration with Microsoft Defender XDR empowers Security Operations Centers with advanced threat hunting and investigation capabilities through a compelling real-world security incident.

title: Evolving from DLP to Data Security with Microsoft Purview
description: Security teams have long relied on data loss prevention (DLP) to prevent damaging data security incidents. However, many teams today are encumbered by fragmented, reactive DLP solutions & processes as data sprawls across cloud, endpoints, and beyond. In this session, experience how Microsoft Purview DLP integrates with Information Protection & Insider Risk Management to optimize your end-to-end DLP program from policy creation & management to incident investigation to ongoing program refinement.

title: Secure access at the speed of AI with Copilot in Microsoft Entra
description: Discover how Security Copilot and Microsoft Entra revolutionize identity and access management using GenAI to strengthen Zero Trust. Accelerate tasks like troubleshooting and policy management to reduce downtime. Elevate security teams by bridging skill gaps, improving decision-making, and guiding complex tasks, ensuring a strong security posture in an evolving threat landscape. Scale with AI by automating insights and streamlining security operations.

title: Empowering Financial Services with Generative AI
description: Explore Microsoft's AI strategy within the realm of financial services data ecosystems and discover the latest data and AI tools and services designed to expedite your journey. Gain insights into how Microsoft and our partners have developed integrated solutions to drive significant business outcomes, whether it's enhancing customer experiences, empowering the workforce, managing risk and compliance, modernizing core systems, or fostering a sustainable future. This session will feature FSI partner capabilities integrated into the copilot ecosystem.

title: Modernizing healthcare across cloud, data, and AI, starting with EHR on Azure
description: As healthcare organizations are burdened with capital investments and dependence on a large IT workforce to maintain their on-premises infrastructure, many are turning to the cloud to reduce spending and deliver better care with a modern and digitally transformed infrastructure. Healthcare’s cloud-first strategy starts with the migration of the most critical system of record, EHR. In this session, you will hear how Azure supports a reliable, secure and performant platform for hosting your EHR (e.g., Epic) and learn how this migration can springboard a seamless consumption of Data & AI to achieve a complete digital transformation.
speakerNames: Mike Lonze, Radha Madapoosi Ravi, Gopi Sundaresan

title: Configure, Deploy and Manage Landing Zones for Highly Regulated Industries
description: Learn about Microsoft Cloud for Sovereignty’s new Regulated Environment Management, a platform for regulated industries that enables customers to create customized environments to adopt and manage the hyperscale cloud faster and easier, while also helping meet legal, security, and policy requirements. You'll discover how to accelerate Azure onboarding and management with a simple interface, create an Azure Landing Zone with a few clicks, assess existing deployments, and use a drift analyzer to maintain compliance across your environments.

title: Industry Copilots: model enablers, financial document insights and meeting preparation
description: Industry Partners have a unique opportunity to enable copilot experiences that address critical jobs-to-be-done across domains. Better precision and higher quality outcomes can be achieved when copilot experiences are built with a deep understanding of industry- and role-specific needs. In this session, we will provide three demos focusing on Industry components accelerating copilot experiences for customers and partners: Industry AI model enablers, Industry-specific Document insights and Meeting Prep for Financial Services.
speakerNames: Jeremy Reynolds, Eitam Sheetrit, Ilya Venger

title: Gain more insight into your organization's sustainability KPIs with Copilot
description: In this session, learn how the Sustainability Insights Copilot template enables the users to create copilot and publish it in M365 Teams, utilize company reports or data sources to easily get insights and data about their company's sustainability goals and progress against regulations like CSRD.

title: Explore next-gen industrial transformation architecture patterns
description: Build a next-gen AI solution architecture for edge and cloud that works with industry standard messaging protocols, allowing natural language query of critical manufacturing data, large-scale analysis and forecasting, and custom AI models for process improvement and quality control.

title: Advance accessibility in the era of AI
description: Imagine a world where technology bridges the gap for everyone. AI makes it a reality. Extend your AI strategy to advance accessibility that empowers a culture of inclusion, enhances user experiences, and bridges the disability divide. Gain insights from leaders who understand partner and customer priorities and how evolving accessibility with AI advances impact. Microsoft puts you in the driver's seat with accessible AI solutions and a methodology that empowers action to solve these challenges.

title: Quick Tips to Adopt Accessibility Copilot for an Inclusive Workplace
description: Transform your workplace into an inclusive environment with Microsoft Accessibility Copilot, delivering AI-powered tools embedded within Microsoft 365 apps. From summarizing inaccessible documents to creating presentations and managing communications, these features empower all users to work more efficiently and inclusively. Learn about these incredibly valuable features to enhance accessibility for individuals with disabilities and gain quick tips you can start adopting yourself.

title: Building business value with Copilot functional scenarios
description: Our engaging 25-minute session will show you how partners like you can help customers envision the value that Copilot can create for their organizations. By showcasing key processes by function and identifying high impact KPI metrics, we will demonstrate how to leverage the Microsoft Business Case Builder to calculate ROI and make informed decisions.

title: Secure, develop and innovate in a hybrid world with Microsoft and Dell
description: Highlighted by Gartner as the leader, Microsoft Azure is a hybrid cloud platform that enables customers to secure and govern their applications across on-premises, multicloud and edge environments. The platform is evolving to meet you where you are in your digital transformation journey, leveraging Dell solutions to run your SQL workloads and container apps and managed data services with Azure Arc. Come and see the latest innovations on AI Integration, Windows Server and SQL Server with features for governance & data utility.
speakerNames: Aly Hirani, Kenny Lowe, Jeff Woolsey

title: The AI PC revolution: Unlocking new horizons with Copilot+ PCs & AI PCs
description: In this session, we will explore the transformative potential of Copilot+ PCs and AI PCs in revolutionizing business operations. Partners will discover the advanced features and capabilities of these cutting-edge technologies, understand their commercial benefits and return on investment, and learn effective strategies for communicating their value to clients.

title: Windows 10 end of support: The commercial value in acting now
description: As Windows 10 approaches its end of support, it's crucial for device partners to understand the implications and opportunities that lie ahead for commercial customers. This session will delve into the value of transitioning to Windows 11 now, highlighting its capabilities as a robust platform for AI.

title: Profitable SPLA Modernization for ISVs & Hybrid Cloud Partners
description: Define your profitable path from SPLA to meet your customer needs for secure AI innovation. With Microsoft's adaptive cloud capabilities, position yourself as a strategic tech partner while boosting your profitability across hybrid and cloud solutions.

title: Unlock new growth opportunities with Certified Software Designations for Industry AI
description: Launched in March 2024, Solutions Partner with certified software designations are now available for partners to differentiate their software solutions. These designations require commercial marketplace readiness, customer success, technical interoperability with the Microsoft Cloud, and Industry AI compliance. In this session, we will explain the benefits and how to achieve this designation to unlock new opportunities.

title: Build well architected software and attain certified software designations
description: Launched in March 2024, Solutions Partner with certified software designations are now available for partners who develop software to differentiate their solutions. These designations require that the solution demonstrates commercial marketplace readiness, has a proven track record of success and meets technical requirements for interoperability with the Microsoft Cloud. In this session, we’ll showcase the benefits of these designations and outline how to build well-architected Azure software applications, contributing to your ability to attain certain of these designations.

title: Step-by-step instructions to activate multiparty private offers
description: Learn how channel partners can collaborate with software development companies on custom deals to land bigger sales opportunities by selling multiparty private offers through the Microsoft commercial marketplace. As a channel partner (any partner that resells software solutions to customers), get step-by-step guidance on how to enroll and become eligible to sell multiparty private offers through the marketplace to expand your business and better serve your customers.

title: Infusing AI in Partner Program benefits and legacy end of sale
description: Microsoft Copilot and over 20+ new product benefits are coming to Microsoft AI Cloud Partner Program offers on January 22, 2025. Get the details you need to take advantage of, and navigate through our product benefit evolution including the Action Pack, Silver, and Gold end of sale.

title: Understanding the MAICPP and co-sell approach to capacity and utilization
description:
Take a peek behind the design of Microsoft’s AI Cloud Partner Program. Gather key insights to how this program connects to selling strategy, driving partner capacity and using related insight to ensure the right partners appear in front of Microsoft sellers for co-selling engagements.  Walk away with an understanding of:

· MAICPP role in driving Microsoft sales strategy
· Improving offer and incentive participation
· Increasing your visibility within Microsoft
· How Microsoft is evolving partner identification

title: Showcasing the value of secure productivity
description: Find out how partners can showcase the value of Secure Productivity through the new Secure Productivity Proof of Value engagement. This engagement includes an assessment of the customer’s current environment, envisioning activities to design a management, identity and security blueprint, and business value discussions to help customers understand the cost savings from moving to Microsoft 365 E3.
speakerNames: Ryan Argall, Mario De Ridder, Olga Gordon

title: Global Trade Compliance: Safeguarding Business Partnerships
description: This session highlights the essential role of global trade compliance in our partner ecosystem. Attendees will learn about current global trade laws and Microsoft’s expectations, empowering them to navigate compliance effectively. Through real-world examples and actionable guidance, partners will understand how to leverage compliance to enhance their operations and mitigate risks in their businesses.

title: SMB paths for Solutions Partner designations: Unlock new profitability levers
description: Dive into insights on the forthcoming SMB paths for Solutions Partner designations for both Azure and Security. Get a deeper understanding of this cornerstone partner program offering, what attaining Solutions Partner designations on the SMB paths means, and how attaining designations can drive your business forward. Come away with an understanding of how to qualify for Azure and Security designations on the SMB paths and how designations contribute to your business growth.

title: Stay ahead of cyber threats with Edge for Business
description: With most of a user's workday spent in the browser, securing it against new cyber threats is critical. Enter Edge for Business, a secure web browser, optimized for AI. Join this demo to ensure your customers aren’t left vulnerable to browser-based attacks. Learn to use the Edge management service to control Edge features to meet the unique needs of each organization or use Microsoft Lighthouse to access multi-tenant controls and apply recommended security policies.

title: Elevate Skilling Outcomes with Microsoft Learn and Training Partners
description: Training Services Partners can deliver unparalleled value by offering customized, locally relevant training solutions that drive your organization’s success. This session will highlight how you can leverage Microsoft Learn and Training Services Partner tools to create tailored programs that meet specific team and individual needs, enhancing both customer satisfaction and business outcomes.

title: Panel: Insights to Grow Your Business with Microsoft
description: In this session, we will share how partners can showcase value of Secure Productivity through a Proof of value engagement. This includes assessing customer’s current environment and envisioning the future of management, identity and security. Finally, the engagement will help customers understand cost savings and future value gains by moving to Microsoft’s Secure Productivity solution. ​
speakerNames: Harp Girn, Nina Harding, Priscyla Laham, Jim Lee, Tony Surma

title: Building on LLM's - Lessons Learned from Creating GitHub Copilot
description: Dive into the journey of GitHub Copilot and what's under the hood so that you can apply the same patterns and lessons to building your own solutions based on the next generation of generative AI services available from Microsoft Azure.

title: 5 things you didn't know were possible with GitHub Actions
description: Unlock the full potential of GitHub Actions in this 30-minute demo with Jessica Deen, staff developer advocate at GitHub. Jessica will guide you through advanced features, such as job summaries, matrix jobs, reusable workflows, and OpenID Connect for passwordless cloud deployments. You'll also learn more about artifact attestations and explore starter workflow templates to help streamline your CI/CD processes. You'll see how these powerful tools can enhance your development workflow, boost productivity, and ensure security.

title: Real-world enterprise deployments of Microsoft copilot
description: Microsoft Copilot can revolutionize work by combining AI and large language models with your data for personalized assistance. Effective rollout requires understanding its benefits, stakeholder alignment, and preparation in governance, security, and change management. Join Protiviti to hear about real-world implementation experiences deploying Copilot for Microsoft 365 at enterprise scale. We’ll share practical examples and key considerations in security, data protection, and adoption.

title: AT&T Cloud Voice with Microsoft Teams and AI
description: Join us to learn how AT&T Cloud Voice with Microsoft Teams Phone Mobile, empowered by cutting-edge AI technology, is not just a tool for communication but a catalyst for collaboration, innovation, and efficacy in today’s ever-changing workplace. This session will delve into how AT&T Cloud Voice with Microsoft Teams Phone Mobile is transforming mobile communication for businesses by integrating advanced AI capabilities into AT&T’s powerful 5G network.

title: Elevate your security operations: Microsoft XDR meets human expertise
description: Mastering security operations requires a balance of proactive and reactive strategies. Learn how the Microsoft XDR platform leverages AI and machine learning to enhance detection and scale security teams, providing visibility and automation across your digital estate. While technology alone may fall short, skilled security teams are crucial in identifying and mitigating threats that slip through automated defenses - combine human expertise with advanced tech to elevate your operations.

title: Unleash these top tips to make Microsoft Teams your favorite "Phone"
description: So, you want use Microsoft Teams as your primary communication tool. But do you know how to get started and avoid common pitfalls? How to streamline your business interactions without creating IT headaches? Boost productivity without complexity? Join this session to glean the top 3 insider tips for making Microsoft Teams your favorite, and most effective unified "phone system" taking advantage of some of the latest features.

title: Revolutionizing workflows with Meetaker AI
description: Join us for a live demonstration of Meetaker AI, the cutting-edge tool designed to transform how you capture, organize, and leverage meeting insights. Discover how Meetaker AI integrates seamlessly with Microsoft Teams to enhance productivity and streamline workflows, making it easier than ever to stay on top of your business operations

title: Building a successful AVD and Windows 365 practice with Nerdio
description: Join Nerdio CRO Joseph Landes as he shares how Nerdio can partner with IT professionals to build a successful (and profitable) Microsoft Cloud practice. Nerdio Manager allows partners and IT professionals to accelerate growth by maximizing cost savings and accelerating deployments, achieving faster time-to-value.

title: Elevate meeting experiences with AI-based video and audio
description: AI is changing everything, even the way we collaborate. We’ll explore how AI-based control can enhance the Microsoft Teams experience for in-room and remote participants. From full-body camera tracking for your presenter, to auto-camera switching for your participants, you can improve engagement with Q-SYS VisionSuite. In addition, vision-based control capabilities allows the space to intelligently respond to the needs of the user including managing lighting, shades, and room automation.

title: Partner with a Microsoft Top ISV and grow your business
description:
In this session, discover how Azure NetApp Files (ANF) enhances data mobility for generative AI applications. We will explore the value propositions of Azure NetApp Files and its powerful data-management features that optimize and support your generative AI initiatives, including Copilot integrations.

She will also speak to how Instaclustr by NetApp is used for the database for the GenAI toolkit to include our Intelligent Services.

title: Integrate YubiKeys to meet Microsoft MFA Mandate & strengthen security
description: Discover how YubiKeys and phishing-resistant authentication seamlessly integrates with Microsoft’s cutting-edge solutions and security features to provide unparalleled protection for your organization. Learn about the latest updates in Microsoft’s security landscape and how YubiKey can enhance your security posture, streamline user experience, ensure compliance and can help you with your Zero Trust strategy.

title: Empowering your data strategy practice
description: A good AI strategy starts with a great data strategy. Your customer’s file data is a goldmine, but only if that data is Fit for AI. Join this session to learn how Nasuni has partnered with Microsoft Azure to unlock value within disparate unstructured datasets and deliver a strategic unified platform.

title: Migrate thousands of workstations in minutes without Fresh Start
description: With the drive to all things Cloud, and the increase in M365 tenant to tenant migrations, users and workstations are often after thoughts in this transition.  Come and learn about a way to put the user back in the picture, and to migrate workstations to M365 Entra Join, or between M365 tenants with ease and at scale.

title: Drive new customer revenue and savings with data and Dynamics 365
description:
Join this session to discover how you can generate new opportunities with Icertis for Microsoft Dynamics 365.
- Enable digital transformation by linking contract data and enterprise systems.
- Integrate contracting with procure-to-pay operations, seal cost leakages, and ensure compliance.
- Use Icertis copilots to analyze risks in buy-side contracts.
- Elevate the source-to-contract process.
Take your operations to the next level with Icertis for Microsoft Dynamics 365.

title: Amplify the value of Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams with PanaCast 50
description: Experience how Jabra’s innovative solutions are revolutionizing the Teams Rooms experience, enhancing collaboration with intelligent features designed to elevate your meetings. Don’t miss this opportunity to see firsthand how Jabra is setting new standards for optimizing Copilot within Teams Rooms, learn about our groundbreaking support for Microsoft Device Ecosystem Platform, and maximize the potential of your modern Microsoft Teams Room.

title: Managing Logitech solutions for Teams Rooms enhanced by Copilot
description: Join Logitech in this workshop to master remote room management with Microsoft's tools and Logitech Sync. Learn to optimize platforms like Microsoft 365 Admin Center, Microsoft Teams Admin Center, Intune, Teams Pro Management, and Logitech Sync. Discover how to manage device security, adjust settings, control cameras, and gain insights into room usage. Plus, explore Logitech's Speaker Recognition to enhance Microsoft Teams Copilot. Elevate your skills with actionable insights and expert guidance

title: Empower anywhere access to all apps in a hybrid, cloud, and AI world
description: In today’s hybrid work environment, seamless access to critical applications and resources is more important than ever. Learn how to enhance Azure Virtual Desktop and Windows 365 with secure access to all apps across all platforms. Provide instant access to any application type without interrupting the business. Parallels delivers freedom of choice supporting on-premises, Cloud, and the only Microsoft-authorized Windows on Mac solution, enabling flexibility and productivity in any work setting.

title: Amplify your Azure business with Fortinet hybrid-cloud security
description: For more than two decades, Fortinet has worked hand-in-hand with partners to protect our joint customer’s Microsoft investments across the globe. Let us show you why you should choose us as your go-to partner for Azure and hybrid engagements. You will learn ways Fortinet can help you to bolster your deals, simplify procurement, and add value to your business.

title: Be AI ready with skilling strategies to scale adoption and ROI
description: In the era of AI, success is not just about the technology—it’s about empowering every individual and team to unlock the full potential of AI tools. Delve into enterprise-wide skilling strategies that prepare your workforce to embrace AI across every business function—from IT, Cloud, Data, and Security to HR, Finance, Sales, Operations, and Marketing. Be it developing custom AI solutions or enhancing productivity with Copilot—learn how to drive innovation, scale adoption, and unlock greater ROI.

title: Enterprise sales agents for 25% higher sales productivity
description: Join our live demo session to get a firsthand look at DatabookGPT in action within Microsoft workflows. Featuring real-world enterprise sales use cases, we’ll show how our AI-powered Enterprise Sales Agent leverages trusted insights to boost productivity, speed up decision-making, and drive smarter sales strategies. We’ll outline an effective pathway to engage customers at scale and close deals faster within Microsoft’s ecosystem.

title: Copy-Item -Path “\on-prem\*” -Destination “\Azure\*” We made it!
description: There’s a reason why migration, mitigation, and migraine all start with an M. Cox Enterprises moved most of its workloads to Azure in a project lasting over two years. To avoid typical pitfalls, they used SolarWinds solutions to get it right from the start. Hear from Joshua Coursey, Senior Manager Network Engineering at Cox, about his experience, and let Sascha Giese, SolarWinds Tech Evangelist, offer insights on how to make the most of your existing resources, without alarming your CFO!

title: Create more powerful, future-ready meeting rooms with Lenovo
description: Explore the latest advancements in hybrid work technology with Lenovo's high-performance solutions. Learn how Lenovo ThinkPad, a world leader in PCs, drives the innovation behind ThinkSmart, a portfolio built for modern meeting rooms. Discover the latest ThinkSmart solutions, including AI capabilities, inclusive features, and tools for managing enterprise-grade collaborative spaces.

title: HP Poly PC based MTR solutions and Lens Room
description: Managing Teams Rooms on Windows can sometimes be confusing. When do I use Teams Admin Center? What does Pro Management Portal provide? Why do I need a Device partner’s management tools? Come join HP Poly for a live session discussing how Teams Room management is a Hybrid approach and where HP Poly Lens Room can provide tremendous value with rich, simplified features and capabilities.

title: Use AI-powered data insights for compliance and to mitigate risk
description: Organizations have large amounts of data, and handling it manually is time-consuming and costly. With the challenge of siloed data it can be difficult to access this data’s full potential. Join us to learn more and see a demo about Cohesity Gaia. An AI-powered search tool that combines generative AI using Microsoft’s Azure OpenAI with a modern data platform to deliver instant, high-quality insights for your data (Microsoft 365, NAS and more) – helping businesses address critical questions faster

title: Transform everyday business by unlocking AI's potential with Swagger
description: In this 12-minute session, explore how businesses integrate AI tools like Copilot and OpenAI Azure Services into daily operations. Through real examples, see how companies boost productivity, streamline workflows, and drive innovation. Discover how they overcome concerns and unlock AI's potential, from automating tasks to gaining intelligent insights. This session offers practical tips to help you confidently adopt AI, turning challenges into opportunities for growth.

title: How EY leverages AI at scale for competitive advantage
description: Experience how EY teams are harnessing the power of Microsoft AI at scale to drive competitive advantage. Gain insight into the EY.ai platform which has driven adoption of AI globally across more than 279,000 EY professionals. Experience how the Microsoft AI ecosystem connects AI capabilities and use cases to drive business value. Hear real-world examples of AI-driven programs that have transformed EY’s service delivery and improved client outcomes. Discover how to leverage these strategies.

title: Protect Microsoft 365 data from cyber attacks
description: Your company has made significant investments in Microsoft 365—through licenses, solutions, and dedicated staff. With growing threats to the Microsoft ecosystem, it's crucial that you understand your role in responding to cyber attacks. Every Microsoft 365 professional needs to be aware of the NIST 2.0 framework and the expectations of your role to ensure a swift, effective defense. In this session, you'll gain key insights to protect your organization and enhance your response to cyber attacks.

title: Boosting your Azure cloud strategy with Nutanix
description: As organizations refine their Azure strategy,  Nutanix simplifies workload migrations and enhances data insights. Nutanix also supports Azure Arc for Kubernetes and data services, further elevating your enterprise cloud strategy. Join us to learn more.

title: Copilot adoption case study with WalkMe
description: AI promises big wins for employee productivity and engagement with your Microsoft portfolio. But only if people use it how it’s intended. Or at all. WalkMe helps you deliver on the promise of GenAI and maximize the value of your investment by accelerating AI adoption. Learn how you can make Copilot soar by overcoming learning curves, compliance risks, and change management challenges with WalkMe.

title: Securing critical open source workloads on Azure with Ubuntu
description: Open source software is foundational to modern technology, yet it presents security challenges, especially in industries like healthcare, finance, and the public sector, which require stringent data protection. Join us to discover how Ubuntu enhances security, maintenance, and compliance for open source workloads on Azure through Confidential AI, system hardening, and advanced security features, empowering organizations to scale their AI initiatives and critical operations with confidence.

title: Secure cloud migration, Azure Virtual WAN and Check Point CloudGuard
description: For effective cloud migration, Azure customers are moving to Azure Virtual WAN, reducing the overhead of connecting multiple data centers and technologies, with a single operational interface. But securing these migrations requires implementing industry-leading threat prevention and zero-trust segmentation to best protect their workloads and assets. Join Check Point to learn best practices, common use cases, and reference designs to secure your Azure Virtual WAN.

title: Supercharge your IT agents with TeamViewer AI powered solution
description: Learn how TeamViewer is utilizing generative AI and Microsoft Teams to make crucial technical information easily available to IT agents while they are responding to an incident. In this session, you will learn how to automate the creation of an Incident Resolution Knowledge Base and harness its power to boost your agent productivity. Learn first hand how to transform untapped operational data into impactful Business Insights to optimize your business.

title: Reveal the real sorcery behind tech tools for tomorrow's work
description:
Effective organization-wide collaboration is essential to driving efficiency and growth. Early adoption and integration of innovative technology builds cohesive, productive work environments.
 
Everyone’s busy, how do we do it all? 
Why leveraging the right technology for meetings enhances your team productivity
 
It’s not magic, it’s physics. 
How to enhance collaboration with better audio
 
Keep it simple. 
What solutions from Microsoft and Shure make your life easier and increase efficiency

title: Accelerate your cloud-based digital transformation with NX X
description: In today’s fast-paced mechanical product design environment, SaaS solutions like NX X are transforming how engineering teams collaborate, design, and innovate. Join us to explore the flexibility of NX X, enabling seamless access to powerful design tools from any location or device. Leveraging Microsoft Azure and Azure Virtual Desktop, NX X offers secure, high-performance virtual environments, ensuring faster deployments, centralized management, and enhanced collaboration for distributed teams.

title: Supercharging Microsoft 365 protection with Veeam Data Cloud
description: Discover how Veeam Data Cloud (VDC) revolutionizes Microsoft 365 protection. We'll explore VDC's comprehensive coverage, including M365 Backup Storage, Vault for long-term retention, and AI-powered features. Learn how VDC safeguards your entire M365 ecosystem, ensuring business continuity, compliance, and protection against data loss and cyber threats. We'll also discuss Veeam's partnership with Microsoft in AI-driven data protection. Join us to see how VDC transforms M365 data security.

title: Orchestrate content and experience with brand-aware AI
description: Generative AI is not just boosting productivity—it’s rewriting the rules of digital experiences. In this session, Roger Connolly delivers a bold perspective on the evolving digital experience platform (DXP) landscape, revealing how composable architectures, now supercharged by AI, give IT teams the power to build at unprecedented scale. He’ll also showcase Sitecore’s latest AI-driven innovations, where brand-aware AI empowers marketers and technologists to orchestrate content and experiences.

title: Reinvent the future of work with AI-first mindset
description: In an era of AI automation, cost-takeout and optimization are becoming the norm. Intelligent systems like Now Assist and Co-Pilot set the stage for more. The question is, how will you use the time and resources saved to go beyond business as usual? Join our theater presentation with the Head of Global Innovation, author of Mindshift, as they share insights on the future of work.

title: I’ve spoken to your file data, and it’s not fit for AI
description: From O365 Copilot to deploying and fine-tuning a private LLM, a good AI strategy starts with a good data strategy. Your file data is a potential goldmine, but only if your data is Fit for AI. Join this session to learn how Nasuni has partnered with Microsoft Azure to deliver data protection and management for over 200PB of file and unstructured data for over 650 enterprise customers around the world. Understand what it means to be Fit for AI across your entire file and unstructured data estate.

title: From zero touch to zero trust
description: Zero Trust is not just a buzzword anymore. With today’s remote and non-traditional access to IT systems, simply building a perimeter around your traditional IT is not enough. With increasing cyber attacks as well as costs of breaches, Zero Trust is now the gold standard of security. Join this session, hosted by Microsoft MVP Steve Weiner, on how to maximize Zero Trust security & endpoint management, and how to keep your IT secure from the cybercriminals of today.

title: Revolutionizing healthcare insights with Snowflake Cortex & Microsoft
description: Would you like to enhance consumer experiences and deliver insights at record speed? In this session, we’ll show how a healthcare provider leverages Snowflake Cortex to easily and securely uncover critical insights from vast amounts of patient data in documents. Seamlessly integrated with Microsoft Fabric, this powerful solution delivers fast results while maintaining top-tier security and compliance. Don’t miss this demo to discover how to revolutionize healthcare operations.

title: Operationalize data governance and master data management with GenAI
description: Discover how CluedIn, combined with Microsoft Purview, Microsoft Fabric, and Azure AI Studio, is helping organizations meet the growing demand for secure, governed, high-quality data. In a world first, we’ll be demonstrating how proactive copilots and AI agents are making data governance smarter, easier, and more accessible to the business. We’ll show you how to deliver ready-for-anything data, faster than ever.

title: Harnessing Microsoft Copilot with a full range of Logitech devices
description: Copilot is here—what's next? Learn how to maximize productivity by using Microsoft Copilot alongside Logitech devices. Logitech's AI-powered solutions enhance both personal workspaces and Microsoft Teams Rooms, ensuring clear communication and visibility for all attendees. Join us to revolutionize your organization’s tech landscape and elevate collaboration and efficiency for all Teams.

title: Are you ready for the big change to internet access in Azure?
description: The way VMs access the Internet are changing in Azure. Learn the impact to your business and network design as we examine best practices for cloud-based Internet access, how to protect your applications against the “endless perimeter”, benefits of a distributed security model, and how to reduce the total cost of securing outbound Internet access at scale. Get a sneak peek into how Aviatrix and Microsoft Entra GSA are working together to revolutionize secure Internet access in Azure and beyond.

title: Replicate SAP data ASAP with Fivetran's Managed Data Lake Service
description: Replicating data from business-critical sources like SAP to your data lake is essential to unlock value and drive innovation. Don't miss our 12-minute live demo demonstrating a modern approach to SAP data integration with Fivetran's Managed Data Lake Service for Microsoft. Discover how Fivetran's governed, secure solution for Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS) and OneLake simplifies data ingestion, ensures data quality and governance, and accelerates insights.

title: Deliver reliable enterprise GenAI outcomes from pilot to production
description: Successful adoption of enterprise grade gen AI requires a trusted data foundation that demands scalability, data quality, seamless integration, governance, and security to deliver relevant trustworthy and accurate outcomes. Informatica’s GenAI blueprint empowers enterprise-grade AI solutions using Intelligent Data Management Cloud (IDMC) to provide semantic intelligence and a no-code/low-code integration framework to create high-fidelity data that allows RAG implementations with Azure OpenAI.

title: Nexus copilot to power 3D enabled engineering workflows
description: In the rapidly evolving landscape of manufacturing, the integration of advanced digital tools and artificial intelligence (AI) is pivotal in streamlining operations and enhancing productivity. Learn how Hexagon’s Nexus 3D Whiteboard and Microsoft Teams bring custom Co-pilots to aid collaboration and problem solving in hugely complex engineering and manufacturing workflows.

title: How Pure Storage optimizes migrating to Azure VMware solution
description: Azure VMware Solution (AVS) lets you seamlessly run VMware environments in the cloud. Join us to explore how Pure Storage takes AVS to the next level by decoupling storage and compute, giving you the freedom to scale efficiently. Discover how this flexibility leads to smarter resource usage, reduced complexity, and significant cost savings—so you can get more out of your VMware cloud environment.

title: Secure your AI application ecosystem on Azure
description: Join us to discover how the threat landscape continues to evolve as you build AI applications in your Microsoft Azure environments. AI apps introduce a whole new AI stack composed of models, plugins, inference, and training datasets with access to sensitive internal data. Each new component exposes new risks for attackers to exploit. Explore how Palo Alto Networks helps customers understand and manage these risks at every step of the AI journey.

title: Optimize LLMs on Azure for optimal visibility and reliable deployments
description: Join this technical session to explore optimizing OpenAI and other LLM workloads on Microsoft Azure with New Relic AI Monitoring. Through live demos and real-world examples, learn to identify performance bottlenecks, troubleshoot issues, and optimize cost efficiency and scalability. Discover how New Relic’s unified platform enables seamless visibility across your AI stack for reliable and efficient deployments.

title: Securing and delivering AI workloads in Azure with F5
description: As organizations increasingly adopt AI to drive innovation and efficiency, securing workloads in cloud environments becomes paramount. F5 solutions on Azure enhances the security and performance of AI applications and solves the unique challenges posed by AI workloads. By leveraging F5’s advanced security features and network delivery, organizations can ensure the integrity and availability of their AI services.

title: Accelerate and secure your cloud journey with Wiz and Microsoft
description: Cloud complexity continues to grow in organizations as cloud and AI development accelerate. In response, organizations have transformed their cloud security operating model. Join us to see how Microsoft and Wiz have partnered to democratize security and prioritize risks while securing the entire cloud application lifecycle to bring along developers, DevOps, SOC, and AI teams.

title: Redefining virtualization with the alternative VM platform you seek
description: Industry changes have prompted demand for alternative virtualization solutions. Breakthroughs in AIOPs and next-gen hyperconvergence can offer legacy VM users of all sizes increased efficiencies at lower costs. Scale Computing is the top-rated VM alternative for end-users and channel partners alike. Learn how easy it is to migrate to a new platform, on-prem or at the edge, with integrated high availability, disaster recovery, and remote management – delivered at price points suitable for all.

title: Go passwordless and boost cyber resilience with Yubico and Microsoft
description: In light of recent high-profile outages, it’s clear that high availability and disaster recovery are critical, yet often overlooked in authentication. Join us as we explore how YubiKey integration with Microsoft solutions can enhance your cyber resilience. Learn about passkey implementations, resilient authenticators with Entra ID, and strategies for designing robust authentication flows. Prepare your organization for the Azure MFA Mandate and leverage the new Entra ID FIDO2 registration API.

title: Accelerate data to impact with Hexaware copilots for data insights
description:
Experience AI-powered data insights: Activate copilots that touch every step in your data value chain, making even the most difficult tasks frictionless and simple. Discover the fastest way to real impact, simplifying data for people. Gain confidence over:
- Fabric's unified platform to streamline data management and integration. 
- Strategies for data preparation that ensure AI is built on a solid foundation
- Techniques for enhancing data quality, accessibility, and interoperability.

title: AI for personalized, proactive & productive experiences
description: In today’s digital-first world, exceptional user experiences are essential. This session will explore how AI-driven solutions create personalized, proactive, and productive connected experiences for employees and customers. Key topics include personalized XLAs, proactive digital experience management through AI-powered observability, and productive AI assistants like M365 Copilot. Learn how AI can unify EX and CX, driving innovation and growth across your enterprise in the age of AI.

title: Bring agreements to life with Docusign and Microsoft Copilot
description: Agreements are the foundation of every business. They live in every department and govern day-to-day operations. Yet the way agreements are managed is fundamentally broken. Docusign is pioneering a new solution, powered by AI, to unleash the value of agreement data to power every company. Join us for a session where we introduce Intelligent Agreement Management. We’ll also showcase our latest integrations with Microsoft—including Docusign for Copilot for M365—that keep business moving forward.

title: Accelerate critical workloads with HPE ProLiant DL145 Gen11
description: Learn how HPE’s new ProLiant DL145 Gen11 rugged and compact server helps accelerate your critical workloads at challenging locations including edge virtualization powered by Microsoft Azure Stack HCI.  Our best solution yet for your retail, manufacturing, and any other areas where you high powered, small form factor solutions.

title: Eliminate employee friction at work with an enterprise-wide AI agent
description: Learn how technical and business leaders at over 400+ leading organizations are providing their >5 million employees with a single place to find information and take actions across all their enterprise systems, both within and beyond the Microsoft ecosystem. Moveworks’ reasoning-first approach leverages the best stack of LLMs in combination with a novel developer platform to bring a conversational AI agent to your entire company in Teams, Copilot, Sharepoint, or any other collaboration tool.

title: Unleash the power of AI with Hitachi industry innovations
description: In today’s complex environment of products, platforms, compute options and environments, IT and OT lines of business need experts to help design and integrate cloud-ready data systems and apply insights from Gen/AI to manifest their ideas. Join this session to discover how Hitachi provides scalable end-to-end solutions, including Digital Engineering, AI, Data Analytics, Business Applications, IT+OT System Integration, and Storage Infrastructure services to unleash your AI possibilities.

title: Revolutionize conversational AI
description: Learn how to use Azure OpenAI Service and Elasticsearch to build conversational AI that's deeply integrated with your enterprise data, providing richer, more relevant user interactions. Enrich Large Language Models (LLMs) with precise, contextual information from your business data, ensuring conversations are not only natural but also informed and accurate.

title: How to secure your data for Microsoft 365 Copilot
description: File oversharing, external user access, and incorrect permissions are significant challenges that limit the effective use of Microsoft 365 Copilot. These issues can lead to data breaches, compliance risks, and reduced user trust. Don’t miss this session where you can learn how you can effectively secure your data and confidently leverage Microsoft 365 Copilot.

title: Prepare for the hidden IT reckoning across copilots, people and apps
description:
It seems like a new AI copilot is announced every week. While they may be seen as tools for productivity, this view is short-sighted. Copilots will upend IT, requiring a re-think of enterprise architecture, app portfolios, and how to measure and enable people.
Led by Avanade Chief Technology Officer Aaron Reich, this session will explore the evolution of copilots, the workforce, and your digital core, emphasizing the need to think differently to uncover value across Microsoft investments.

title: 5 ways to turn work into impact with Asana + M365
description: Your team lives in Microsoft 365. But hitting your business goals means knowing who is doing what, by when, and why. Join product experts from Asana - the leading AI work management platform - for a live demo of how Asana and your favorite M365 apps come together to keep your most critical initiatives on track, no matter where work happens.

title: Building GenAI application with MongoDB Atlas and Azure AI Studio
description: Azure AI Studio now integrates with MongoDB Atlas, the leading document database. This integration empowers enterprises to build conversational AI applications with rich, data-driven experiences. In this session, explore how to harness RAG architectures with MongoDB and AWS for powerful AI applications. We’ll also showcase an industry demo to illustrate the transformative impact of AI on enterprise data.

title: Navigating security sprawl with a unified strategy for the AI Era
description: Explore the evolving cybersecurity landscape in the AI era. Discover the rising complexity of threats, the critical talent gap, and the chaos of tool sprawl. Learn how platformization can unify defenses, enhance visibility, and enable proactive threat management. This talk calls you to rethink your security strategies and embrace a consolidated approach to securing your digital future.

title: Taking Windows to the cloud with Nerdio
description: Nerdio Manager helps Enterprise IT Customers accelerate deployment, minimize costs, and reduce complexity of cloud-delivered Windows and Windows applications. Join Nerdio CEO, Vadim Vladimirskiy for a live demonstration of the Nerdio Manager for Enterprise platform.
